That guy's eye!

1148
01:21:12,120 --> 01:21:14,646
No! No, we don't. No, we 
don't need that guy's eye...

1150
01:21:17,240 --> 01:21:19,846
No seriously, I need it!
It's important to me.

1151
01:21:24,520 --> 01:21:29,164
Ronan's fleet has been spotted and 
will arrive in T-minus fifteen minutes.

1154
01:21:29,560 --> 01:21:31,050
Remember, boy.

1155
01:21:31,480 --> 01:21:34,806
At the end of all 
this, I get the Stone.

1157
01:21:34,960 --> 01:21:37,406
You cross me, we kill you all.

1158
01:22:00,040 --> 01:22:01,371
Let's go get 'em, boys!

1159
01:22:10,880 --> 01:22:12,120
This is a terrible plan.

1160
01:22:12,320 --> 01:22:14,720
Hey, you're the one who said
you wanted to die among friends.

1161
01:22:19,480 --> 01:22:20,481
Nova Prime.

1162
01:22:22,040 --> 01:22:24,640
I received a transmission 
from one of the Ravagers.

1164
01:22:25,200 --> 01:22:27,840
He says Ronan's in possession of
something called an Infinity Stone

1165
01:22:27,960 --> 01:22:29,325
and he's headed toward Xandar.

1166
01:22:29,400 --> 01:22:30,606
Good God.

1167
01:22:30,760 --> 01:22:32,683
It's a trick. He's a criminal.

1168
01:22:32,880 --> 01:22:35,326
Did he say why we 
should believe him?

1169
01:22:35,400 --> 01:22:37,759
He said his crew just 
escaped from prison

1170
01:22:37,760 --> 01:22:40,730
so he'd have no other reason
to risk coming to Xandar to help.

1171
01:22:41,560 --> 01:22:44,807
He says that he's an "a-hole".

1173
01:22:45,160 --> 01:22:50,607
But he's not... and I'm quoting 
him here, "100% a dick".

1176
01:22:50,760 --> 01:22:52,046
Do you believe him?

1177
01:22:52,720 --> 01:22:55,803
I don't know that I believe
anyone is 100% a dick, ma'am.

1178
01:22:55,880 --> 01:22:58,804
I mean, do you believe
that he is here to help?

1179
01:23:02,520 --> 01:23:03,521
Yeah.

1180
01:23:13,600 --> 01:23:15,090
A fleet approaches.

1181
01:23:15,520 --> 01:23:17,124
They appear to be Ravagers.

1182
01:23:28,200 --> 01:23:29,281
Fire!

1183
01:23:40,640 --> 01:23:41,801
Cover it down!

1184
01:23:41,960 --> 01:23:43,883
Submerge!

1185
01:23:56,840 --> 01:23:58,046
Rocket, hurry!

1186
01:24:04,560 --> 01:24:05,766
All pilots, dive!

1187
01:24:05,920 --> 01:24:07,081
They're beneath us!

1188
01:24:15,920 --> 01:24:17,331
Evacuate the city.

1189
01:24:17,480 --> 01:24:20,962
Our priority is to get our 
people away from the battle.

1190
01:24:28,000 --> 01:24:29,001
Forward thrust, now!

1191
01:24:42,520 --> 01:24:43,521
Come on!

1192
01:24:45,240 --> 01:24:46,844
Quill! Yondu! Now!

1193
01:25:09,160 --> 01:25:10,650
Aw, hell!

1194
01:25:10,800 --> 01:25:12,245
I'm going down, Quill!

1195
01:25:12,400 --> 01:25:14,164
No more games with me, boy!

1196
01:25:14,320 --> 01:25:17,249
I'll see you at the end of this!

1198
01:25:23,520 --> 01:25:24,965
There are too many of them, Rocket!

1199
01:25:25,720 --> 01:25:27,449
We'll never make it up there!

1200
01:25:42,480 --> 01:25:43,606
Peter Quill.

1201
01:25:43,760 --> 01:25:46,319
This is Denarian Saal
of the Nova Corps.

1202
01:25:46,320 --> 01:25:49,608
For the record... I advised 
against trusting you here.

1203
01:25:49,760 --> 01:25:51,125
They got my "dick" message!

1204
01:25:51,560 --> 01:25:52,721
Prove me wrong.

1205
01:26:00,200 --> 01:26:02,089
Yes!

1206
01:26:23,280 --> 01:26:24,361
Yes!

1207
01:26:27,760 --> 01:26:29,569
We're just like Kevin Bacon.

1208
01:26:33,680 --> 01:26:35,359
The starboard kern 
has been breached!

1209
01:26:35,360 --> 01:26:36,691
We have been boarded.

1210
01:26:36,760 --> 01:26:38,171
Continue our approach.

1211
01:26:38,320 --> 01:26:39,606
But the Nova Corps have engaged.

1212
01:26:39,760 --> 01:26:42,411
None of that will matter
once we reach the surface.

1213
01:26:42,520 --> 01:26:43,521
Seal security doors!

1214
01:26:43,760 --> 01:26:44,807
Now!

1215
01:26:46,520 --> 01:26:48,807
Get out of my way!

1216
01:27:00,040 --> 01:27:01,565
Oh, man.

1217
01:27:01,720 --> 01:27:06,089
All Nova pilots interlock 
and form a blockade.

1218
01:27:06,280 --> 01:27:10,126
The Dark Aster must 
not reach the ground.

1219
01:27:22,640 --> 01:27:23,846
Locked in!

1220
01:27:24,640 --> 01:27:25,846
Locked in.

1221
01:27:27,400 --> 01:27:28,401
We're locked in.

1222
01:28:06,680 --> 01:28:08,887
I can barely see.

1223
01:28:35,240 --> 01:28:36,969
When did you learn to do that?

1224
01:28:37,520 --> 01:28:40,364
Pretty sure the answer is "I am Groot".

1226
01:28:41,520 --> 01:28:44,046
The flight deck is three 
hundred meters this way.

1227
01:28:47,280 --> 01:28:50,648
I want you all to know that I am grateful
for your acceptance after my blunders.

1228
01:28:51,200 --> 01:28:53,550
It is pleasing to once again have...

1229
01:28:54,040 --> 01:28:55,041
...friends.

1230
01:28:56,120 --> 01:28:59,010
You Quill, are my friend.

1231
01:28:59,080 --> 01:29:00,286
Thanks.

1232
01:29:00,480 --> 01:29:03,211
- This dumb tree, he is my friend.
- Mmm.

1233
01:29:04,720 --> 01:29:05,926
And this green whore, she too...

1234
01:29:06,040 --> 01:29:07,565
Oh, you must stop!

1235
01:29:10,440 --> 01:29:13,205
Gamora, look at what you have done.

1236
01:29:13,920 --> 01:29:15,888
You have always been weak.

1237
01:29:16,160 --> 01:29:18,288
You stupid, traitorous...

1238
01:29:23,440 --> 01:29:25,761
Nobody talks to my 
friends like that.

1239
01:29:26,920 --> 01:29:28,001
Head to the flight deck.

1240
01:29:28,160 --> 01:29:30,811
I'll shut down the power
to the security doors.

1241
01:29:38,800 --> 01:29:40,609
Yondu Udonta.

1242
01:29:40,760 --> 01:29:44,242
Order your men to 
turn on the Nova Corps!

1243
01:30:01,040 --> 01:30:02,565
Enough nonsense, Ravager!

1244
01:30:02,720 --> 01:30:04,529
Time to di-

1245
01:30:37,240 --> 01:30:38,287
Nebula, please.

1246
01:30:52,800 --> 01:30:57,768
Enough of this. Necrocraft pilots, 
enact immolation initiative.

1248
01:31:01,280 --> 01:31:02,805
They're dive-bombing the city!

1249
01:31:02,880 --> 01:31:04,689
Denarian Saal should 
we break formation?

1250
01:31:04,840 --> 01:31:06,490
No! Hold your positions.

1251
01:31:38,120 --> 01:31:39,531
Keep Ronan up there, Saal.

1252
01:31:39,720 --> 01:31:41,324
We'll take care of 
the people down here.

1253
01:31:41,400 --> 01:31:43,607
I can't believe I'm taking 
orders from a hamster.

1254
01:31:46,800 --> 01:31:48,040
Star-Lord.

1255
01:31:48,520 --> 01:31:49,521
Finally.

1257
01:32:00,440 --> 01:32:01,487
You thief!

1258
01:32:13,360 --> 01:32:16,204
You will never make it to Ronan.

1259
01:32:21,960 --> 01:32:24,201
Everybody shoot them
before they hit the ground.

1260
01:32:32,840 --> 01:32:34,205
Come on!

1261
01:33:17,040 --> 01:33:20,522
Finger to the throat means death.

1262
01:33:26,360 --> 01:33:27,771
Metaphor.

1263
01:33:27,920 --> 01:33:29,206
Yeah, sorta.

1264
01:33:29,360 --> 01:33:30,521
Oh, no.

1265
01:33:58,520 --> 01:33:59,931
Xandar!

1266
01:34:00,600 --> 01:34:03,251
You stand accused.

1267
01:34:04,040 --> 01:34:08,401
Your wretched peace treaty 
will not save you now.

1269
01:34:08,880 --> 01:34:12,168
It is the tinder on which you burn!

1270
01:34:36,760 --> 01:34:37,761
Rocket!

1271
01:34:37,920 --> 01:34:39,729
Hold on Saal, just...

1272
01:35:06,440 --> 01:35:07,680
Quill, you gotta hurry.

1273
01:35:07,840 --> 01:35:12,166
The city's been evacuated but we're 
getting our asses kicked down here.

1275
01:35:12,240 --> 01:35:13,685
Gamora hasn't opened the door!

1276
01:35:38,400 --> 01:35:39,401
Nebula!

1277
01:35:41,000 --> 01:35:43,480
Sister, help us fight Ronan.

1278
01:35:43,640 --> 01:35:45,165
You know he's crazy.

1279
01:35:45,600 --> 01:35:47,648
I know you're both crazy.

1280
01:35:47,840 --> 01:35:49,001
No!

1281
01:35:51,880 --> 01:35:52,881
What the...?

1282
01:35:54,160 --> 01:35:55,685
Get out!

1283
01:36:37,080 --> 01:36:38,081
You did it!

1284
01:37:04,600 --> 01:37:05,931
I was mistaken.

1285
01:37:06,000 --> 01:37:07,770
I do remember your family.

1286
01:37:08,240 --> 01:37:11,369
Their screams were pitiful. I...

1288
01:39:09,360 --> 01:39:10,486
No, Groot!

1289
01:39:11,080 --> 01:39:12,206
You can't.

1290
01:39:12,280 --> 01:39:13,770
You'll die.

1291
01:39:14,320 --> 01:39:16,163
Why are you doing this?

1292
01:39:16,320 --> 01:39:17,810
Why?

1293
01:39:24,400 --> 01:39:25,970
We...

1294
01:39:26,360 --> 01:39:27,441
are...

1295
01:39:28,040 --> 01:39:29,565
...Groot.

1296
01:40:33,960 --> 01:40:36,008
I called him an idiot.

1297
01:40:58,720 --> 01:41:00,643
You killed Groot!

1298
01:41:04,800 --> 01:41:06,131
Behold!

1299
01:41:07,000 --> 01:41:10,482
Your "guardians of the galaxy".

1300
01:41:10,560 --> 01:41:13,040
What fruit have they wrought?

1301
01:41:13,120 --> 01:41:20,881
Only that my father and his father 
shall finally know vengeance.

1303
01:41:21,040 --> 01:41:31,007
People of Xandar, the time has come to 
rejoice and renounce your paltry Gods!

1307
01:41:31,840 --> 01:41:35,162
Your salvation is at hand!

1308
01:41:47,920 --> 01:41:49,445
Listen to these words.

1309
01:41:58,520 --> 01:42:00,204
Now bring it down hard!

1310
01:42:03,600 --> 01:42:04,681
What are you doing?

1311
01:42:05,200 --> 01:42:07,771
Dance-off, bro. Me and you.

1312
01:42:11,200 --> 01:42:12,611
Gamora.

1313
01:42:13,640 --> 01:42:15,688
Subtle. Take it back.

1314
01:42:16,120 --> 01:42:18,361
What are you doing?!

1315
01:42:18,680 --> 01:42:21,001
I'm distracting you,
ya' big turd blossom.

1316
01:42:37,240 --> 01:42:38,730
No!

1317
01:43:12,720 --> 01:43:15,849
Peter! Take my hand!

1318
01:43:21,280 --> 01:43:23,282
Take my hand, Peter.

1319
01:43:24,200 --> 01:43:25,611
Mom?

1320
01:43:26,120 --> 01:43:28,168
Take my hand!

1321
01:44:22,600 --> 01:44:24,568
You're mortal!

1322
01:44:24,720 --> 01:44:26,006
How...?

1323
01:44:26,160 --> 01:44:28,401
You said it yourself, bitch.

1324
01:44:28,480 --> 01:44:30,847
We're the Guardians of the Galaxy.

1325
01:45:00,720 --> 01:45:01,926
Well, well, well.

1326
01:45:02,480 --> 01:45:03,561
Quite the light show.

1327
01:45:05,840 --> 01:45:07,524
Ain't this sweet.

1328
01:45:09,040 --> 01:45:14,166
But you got some business to attend 
to before all the nookie-nookie starts.

1330
01:45:15,840 --> 01:45:18,047
Peter, you can't. Peter!

1331
01:45:18,200 --> 01:45:20,248
You gotta reconsider this, Yondu.

1332
01:45:20,720 --> 01:45:22,324
I don't know who 
you're selling this to...

1333
01:45:22,400 --> 01:45:24,323
but the only way the 
universe can survive...

1334
01:45:24,480 --> 01:45:26,164
is if you give it 
to the Nova Corps.

1335
01:45:27,000 --> 01:45:33,289
I may be as pretty as an angel 
but I sure as hell ain't one.

1337
01:45:35,000 --> 01:45:36,490
Hand it over, son.

1338
01:45:53,360 --> 01:45:54,361
Yondu.

1339
01:45:57,440 --> 01:46:00,728
Do not open that Orb.
You know that, right?

1340
01:46:01,360 --> 01:46:03,806
You've seen what it does to people.

1341
01:46:14,560 --> 01:46:16,801
Yeah, Quill turned out okay.

1342
01:46:17,680 --> 01:46:20,286
It's probably good we didn't
deliver him to his dad...

1343
01:46:20,400 --> 01:46:21,401
...like we was hired to do.

1344
01:46:21,520 --> 01:46:24,251
Yeah, that guy was a jackass.

1345
01:46:29,120 --> 01:46:32,681
He is gonna be so pissed when he
realizes I switched out the Orb on him.

1346
01:46:35,440 --> 01:46:37,283
He was gonna kill you, Peter.

1347
01:46:38,480 --> 01:46:40,164
Oh, I know.

1348
01:46:42,040 --> 01:46:43,644
But he was about the only family I had.

1349
01:46:46,560 --> 01:46:47,607
No.

1350
01:46:48,880 --> 01:46:50,086
He wasn't.

1351
01:47:38,320 --> 01:47:39,720
Why would you even know this?

1352
01:47:40,000 --> 01:47:42,765
When we arrested you we noticed
an anomaly in your nervous system,

1353
01:47:42,840 --> 01:47:44,205
so we had it checked out.

1354
01:47:45,560 --> 01:47:47,164
I'm not Terran?

1355
01:47:47,320 --> 01:47:48,845
You are half-Terran.

1356
01:47:49,000 --> 01:47:52,641
Your mother was of Earth.
Your father, well...

1357
01:47:52,800 --> 01:47:56,361
...he's something very ancient
we've never seen here before.

1358
01:47:56,680 --> 01:48:00,241
That could be why you were able to
hold the Stone for as long as you did.

1360
01:48:00,720 --> 01:48:02,480
Your friends have arrived.

1361
01:48:04,080 --> 01:48:06,321
On behalf of the Nova Corps,

1362
01:48:06,720 --> 01:48:09,326
we'd like to express
our profound gratitude

1363
01:48:10,160 --> 01:48:11,889
for your help in saving Xandar.

1364
01:48:13,680 --> 01:48:18,164
If you will follow Denarian Dey,
he has something to show you.

1366
01:48:18,320 --> 01:48:20,084
Thank you, Nova Prime.

1367
01:48:28,680 --> 01:48:33,163
Your wife and child shall rest well
knowing that you have avenged them.

1368
01:48:33,680 --> 01:48:34,841
Yes.

1369
01:48:35,000 --> 01:48:36,923
Of course, Ronan was only a puppet.

1370
01:48:37,680 --> 01:48:39,842
It's really Thanos I need to kill.

1371
01:48:42,520 --> 01:48:45,285
We tried to keep it as close
to the original as possible.

1372
01:48:45,880 --> 01:48:47,848
We salvaged as much as we could.

1373
01:48:49,160 --> 01:48:50,286
Wow.

1374
01:48:50,960 --> 01:48:51,961
I...

1375
01:48:53,960 --> 01:48:55,086
Thank you.

1376
01:48:56,600 --> 01:48:58,284
I have a family.

1377
01:48:58,800 --> 01:49:00,290
They're alive because of you.

1378
01:49:04,960 --> 01:49:07,327
Your criminal records
have also been expunged.

1379
01:49:07,480 --> 01:49:11,485
However, I have to warn you against
breaking any laws in the future.

1380
01:49:12,080 --> 01:49:13,081
Question.

1381
01:49:13,240 --> 01:49:15,811
What if I see something that I want 
to take and it belongs to someone else?

1383
01:49:15,880 --> 01:49:17,166
You will be arrested.

1384
01:49:17,240 --> 01:49:19,481
But what if I want it more
than the person who has it?

1385
01:49:19,960 --> 01:49:21,962
- It's still illegal.
- That doesn't follow.

1386
01:49:22,120 --> 01:49:23,520
No I want it more, sir.
Do you understand?

1387
01:49:23,720 --> 01:49:24,926
What are you laughing at?

1388
01:49:25,120 --> 01:49:26,565
Why? I can't have a discussion
with this gentleman?

1389
01:49:26,640 --> 01:49:30,802
What if someone does something irksome 
and I decide to remove his spine?

1391
01:49:32,400 --> 01:49:33,481
That's...

1392
01:49:34,600 --> 01:49:36,841
That's actually murder.

1393
01:49:38,600 --> 01:49:41,171
It's one of the worst crimes of all.

1394
01:49:41,320 --> 01:49:44,164
So... also illegal.

1395
01:49:44,960 --> 01:49:46,007
Hmm.

1396
01:49:47,760 --> 01:49:48,807
They'll be fine, Dey.

1397
01:49:49,520 --> 01:49:50,681
I'm gonna keep an eye on 'em.

1398
01:49:50,840 --> 01:49:51,841
You?

1399
01:49:55,280 --> 01:49:58,250
Yeah. Me.

1400
01:50:17,240 --> 01:50:18,765
Peter...

1401
01:50:19,360 --> 01:50:22,728
I know these last few months
have been hard for you.

1402
01:50:24,000 --> 01:50:26,571
But I'm going to a better place.

1403
01:50:26,760 --> 01:50:29,206
And I will be okay.

1404
01:50:29,360 --> 01:50:33,081
And I will always be with you.

1405
01:50:34,800 --> 01:50:37,485
You are the light of my life.

1406
01:50:37,640 --> 01:50:39,881
My precious son.

1407
01:50:40,840 --> 01:50:43,764
My little Star-Lord.

1408
01:50:44,520 --> 01:50:46,488
Love, Mom.

1409
01:52:47,040 --> 01:52:48,690
So, what should we do next?

1410
01:52:49,000 --> 01:52:50,001
Something good?

1411
01:52:51,040 --> 01:52:52,166
Something bad?

1412
01:52:52,680 --> 01:52:54,330
A bit of both?

1413
01:52:55,920 --> 01:52:58,844
We'll follow your lead, Star-Lord.

1414
01:53:01,120 --> 01:53:02,167
Bit of both.

1415
02:00:26,480 --> 02:00:28,801
What do you let it
lick you like that for?

1416
02:00:30,160 --> 02:00:31,685
Gross.

1417
02:00:34,720 --> 02:00:36,210
Yeah!

1418
02:00:36,320 --> 02:00:38,129
But it burns going down.

subtitles.subtitles: ï»¿1 00:00:01,422 --> 00:00:04,455 Provided by bhoie_t 2 00:00:04,455 --> 00:00:06,019 Modify by Blue-Birdâ¢ 3 00:00:36,920 --> 00:00:37,967 Peter. 4 00:00:39,480 --> 00:00:42,563 Your mama wants to speak with you. 5 00:00:44,960 --> 00:00:48,806 Come on, Pete. Take these fool things off. 6 00:01:22,640 --> 00:01:25,883 Why have you been fighting with the other boys again, baby? 7 00:01:28,480 --> 00:01:29,686 Peter? 8 00:01:30,160 --> 00:01:33,369 They killed a little frog that ain't done nothing. 9 00:01:34,000 --> 00:01:36,526 Smushed it with a stick. 10 00:01:37,800 --> 00:01:40,201 You're so like your daddy. 11 00:01:41,000 --> 00:01:42,843 You even look like him. 12 00:01:44,200 --> 00:01:46,202 And he was an angel. 13 00:01:47,680 --> 00:01:50,331 - Composed out of pure light. - Mer? 14 00:01:50,480 --> 00:01:52,403 You got a present there for Peter, don't you? 15 00:01:54,320 --> 00:01:55,924 Of course. 16 00:01:59,040 --> 00:02:00,201 There. 17 00:02:01,880 --> 00:02:03,723 I've got you covered, Pete. 18 00:02:08,080 --> 00:02:09,969 You open it up when I'm gone, okay? 19 00:02:12,360 --> 00:02:14,044 Your grandpa... 20 00:02:14,960 --> 00:02:17,611 Is gonna take such good care of you. 21 00:02:17,760 --> 00:02:21,560 At least until your daddy comes back to get you. 22 00:02:25,400 --> 00:02:26,401 Take my hand. 23 00:02:30,360 --> 00:02:31,646 Peter. 24 00:02:33,200 --> 00:02:34,321 Pete, come on. 25 00:02:34,600 --> 00:02:36,364 Take my hand. 26 00:02:42,400 --> 00:02:43,447 Mom? 27 00:02:43,920 --> 00:02:46,810 No! No! No! No! 28 00:02:46,960 --> 00:02:48,246 Mom! No! 29 00:02:48,400 --> 00:02:49,925 - Come with me. - No! 30 00:02:50,040 --> 00:02:51,804 No! 31 00:02:52,400 --> 00:02:53,731 You've got to stay here. Please. 32 00:02:54,240 --> 00:02:55,241 No... 33 00:02:56,600 --> 00:02:58,090 Okay? 34 00:03:17,440 --> 00:03:18,680 No. 35 00:03:35,200 --> 00:03:36,964 Mom! 36 00:08:27,280 --> 00:08:28,520 Drop it! 37 00:08:28,840 --> 00:08:30,080 Uh, hey. 38 00:08:31,600 --> 00:08:33,841 - Drop it, now! - Hey, cool, man. No problem. 39 00:08:33,920 --> 00:08:35,922 No problem at all. 40 00:08:36,760 --> 00:08:38,285 How do you know about this? 41 00:08:38,360 --> 00:08:39,930 I don't even know what that is. 42 00:08:40,120 --> 00:08:42,521 I'm just a junker, man. I was just checking stuff out. 43 00:08:42,800 --> 00:08:45,121 You don't look like a junker. You're wearing ravager garb. 44 00:08:45,280 --> 00:08:46,520 This is just an outfit, man. 45 00:08:46,600 --> 00:08:48,045 Ninja turtle, you better stop poking me. 46 00:08:48,200 --> 00:08:49,201 What is your name? 47 00:08:49,280 --> 00:08:51,282 My name is Peter Quill, okay? Dude, chill out. 48 00:08:51,640 --> 00:08:53,051 - Move! - Why? 49 00:08:53,160 --> 00:08:55,083 Ronan may have questions for you. 50 00:08:55,560 --> 00:08:56,641 Hey, you know what? 51 00:08:56,760 --> 00:08:58,888 There's another name you might know me by. 52 00:09:00,560 --> 00:09:02,528 Star-Lord. 53 00:09:02,840 --> 00:09:03,841 Who? 54 00:09:03,960 --> 00:09:06,201 Star-Lord, man. Legendary outlaw. 55 00:09:07,560 --> 00:09:09,722 - Guys? - Move! 56 00:09:10,640 --> 00:09:12,802 Ah, forget this. 57 00:11:03,640 --> 00:11:05,130 Peter? 58 00:11:09,080 --> 00:11:10,081 What happened? 59 00:11:10,840 --> 00:11:14,682 Hey, uh... uh... I... 60 00:11:15,600 --> 00:11:17,443 - Bereet. - Bereet! 61 00:11:17,600 --> 00:11:20,160 Look, I'm gonna be totally honest with you. I forgot you were here. 62 00:11:43,960 --> 00:11:45,561 cattered riots broke out 63 00:11:45,640 --> 00:11:47,165 across the Kree Empire today 64 00:11:47,240 --> 00:11:50,767 protesting the recent peace treaty signed by the Kree Emperor 65 00:11:50,840 --> 00:11:53,286 and Xandar's Nova Prime. 66 00:11:55,760 --> 00:11:57,205 Peter, you have call. 67 00:11:58,040 --> 00:11:59,724 - No, wait, don't! - Quill? 68 00:12:02,200 --> 00:12:03,486 Hey, Yondu. 69 00:12:03,640 --> 00:12:05,642 I'm here on Morag. 70 00:12:05,800 --> 00:12:07,006 Ain't no Orb, ain't no you. 71 00:12:07,120 --> 00:12:09,248 Well, I was in the neighborhood. I thought I'd save you the hassle. 72 00:12:09,360 --> 00:12:10,646 Well, where are you at now, boy? 73 00:12:10,720 --> 00:12:13,291 I feel really bad about this, but I'm not gonna tell you that. 74 00:12:13,400 --> 00:12:15,880 - I slaved putting this deal together. - Slaved? 75 00:12:16,000 --> 00:12:17,081 Making a few calls is "slaved"? I mean, really? 76 00:12:17,160 --> 00:12:18,161 And now you're gonna rip me off! 77 00:12:18,280 --> 00:12:21,762 We do not do that to each other. We're Ravagers. We got a code. 78 00:12:21,880 --> 00:12:24,611 Yeah, and that code is "steal from everybody." 79 00:12:24,720 --> 00:12:26,051 When I picked you up on Terra... 80 00:12:26,160 --> 00:12:27,161 "Picked me up." 81 00:12:27,280 --> 00:12:28,247 these boys of mine wanted to eat you. 82 00:12:28,320 --> 00:12:29,321 Yeah? 83 00:12:29,400 --> 00:12:30,731 They ain't never tasted any Terran before. 84 00:12:30,840 --> 00:12:33,081 I stopped them. You're alive because of me! 85 00:12:33,160 --> 00:12:34,446 I Will find you, I Will... 86 00:12:35,160 --> 00:12:36,764 Put a bounty on him! 87 00:12:37,400 --> 00:12:38,561 40k. 88 00:12:38,640 --> 00:12:40,290 - But I want him back alive. - Yeah, cap. 89 00:12:40,360 --> 00:12:41,805 - Alive? - That's what I said. 90 00:12:41,880 --> 00:12:43,325 I told you when you picked that kid up, 91 00:12:43,400 --> 00:12:45,368 you should have delivered him like we was hired to do! 92 00:12:45,480 --> 00:12:47,005 He was cargo! 93 00:12:47,120 --> 00:12:48,770 You have always been soft on him. 94 00:12:48,840 --> 00:12:51,411 You're the only one I'm being soft on! 95 00:12:51,920 --> 00:12:54,366 Now, don't you worry about Mr. Quill. 96 00:12:54,800 --> 00:12:56,802 As soon as we get him back here, 97 00:12:57,400 --> 00:12:59,767 I'm gonna kill him myself. 98 00:13:00,200 --> 00:13:01,531 What we do need to worry about, 99 00:13:02,920 --> 00:13:05,366 is who else out there wants that orb! 100 00:13:25,720 --> 00:13:28,007 They call me "terrorist," 101 00:13:28,640 --> 00:13:31,291 "radical," "zealot," 102 00:13:32,120 --> 00:13:35,283 because I obey the ancient laws of my people, the Kree, 103 00:13:36,200 --> 00:13:39,522 and punish those who do not. 104 00:13:39,680 --> 00:13:42,809 Because I do not forgive your people 105 00:13:42,920 --> 00:13:45,446 for taking the life of my father, 106 00:13:46,040 --> 00:13:49,487 and his father, and his father before him. 107 00:13:50,720 --> 00:13:55,328 A thousand years of war between us will not be forgotten! 108 00:13:55,800 --> 00:13:58,644 You can't do this! Our government signed a peace treaty. 109 00:13:59,800 --> 00:14:02,087 My government knows no shame. 110 00:14:03,160 --> 00:14:06,004 You Xandarians and your culture are a disease. 111 00:14:07,440 --> 00:14:10,847 You will never rule Xandar. 112 00:14:10,920 --> 00:14:11,967 No. 113 00:14:12,840 --> 00:14:15,047 I will cure it! 114 00:14:28,200 --> 00:14:31,283 Ronan, Korath has returned. 115 00:14:31,400 --> 00:14:34,244 Master, he is a thief, 116 00:14:34,720 --> 00:14:36,768 an outlaw who calls himself Star-Lord. 117 00:14:36,880 --> 00:14:39,360 But we have discovered he has an agreement 118 00:14:39,520 --> 00:14:42,285 to retrieve the orb for an intermediary known 119 00:14:42,440 --> 00:14:43,930 as the broker. 120 00:14:44,040 --> 00:14:47,522 I promised Thanos I would retrieve the orb for him. 121 00:14:47,600 --> 00:14:50,206 Only then will he destroy Xandar for me. 122 00:14:51,080 --> 00:14:54,482 Nebula, go to Xandar and get me the orb. 123 00:14:55,280 --> 00:14:56,406 It will be my honor. 124 00:14:56,520 --> 00:14:57,567 It will be your doom. 125 00:14:58,880 --> 00:15:01,326 If this happens again, you'll be facing our father 126 00:15:01,480 --> 00:15:03,209 without his prize. 127 00:15:03,280 --> 00:15:04,770 I'm a daughter of Thanos. 128 00:15:05,320 --> 00:15:06,446 Just like you. 129 00:15:06,560 --> 00:15:07,891 But I know Xandar. 130 00:15:08,000 --> 00:15:09,650 Ronan has already decreed that I... 131 00:15:09,800 --> 00:15:10,801 Do not speak for me. 132 00:15:13,280 --> 00:15:15,282 You will not fail. 133 00:15:19,080 --> 00:15:20,650 Have I ever? 134 00:15:36,120 --> 00:15:37,531 Xandarians. 135 00:15:37,640 --> 00:15:39,847 What a bunch of losers. 136 00:15:39,920 --> 00:15:44,369 All of them in a big hurry to get from something stupid, 137 00:15:44,600 --> 00:15:46,523 to nothing at all. Pathetic. 138 00:15:46,960 --> 00:15:47,961 Look at this guy! 139 00:15:48,040 --> 00:15:49,610 Can you believe they call us criminals, 140 00:15:49,680 --> 00:15:51,603 when he's assaulting us with that haircut? 141 00:15:52,120 --> 00:15:54,930 What is this thing? Look how it thinks it's so cool. 142 00:15:55,000 --> 00:15:58,561 It's not cool to get help! Walk by yourself, you little gargoyle. 143 00:15:58,720 --> 00:16:00,643 Look at Mr. Smiles over here. 144 00:16:01,280 --> 00:16:05,001 Where's your wife, old man? What a Class-A prevert. 145 00:16:05,400 --> 00:16:07,209 Right, Groot? 146 00:16:07,720 --> 00:16:08,801 Groot? 147 00:16:08,880 --> 00:16:10,723 Don't drink fountain water, you idiot. 148 00:16:10,880 --> 00:16:13,087 - That's disgusting! - Mmm. 149 00:16:13,520 --> 00:16:15,488 Yes, you did. I just saw you doing it. 150 00:16:15,560 --> 00:16:16,686 Why are you lying? 151 00:16:16,800 --> 00:16:18,131 Whoop. 152 00:16:20,240 --> 00:16:22,242 Looks like we got one. 153 00:16:22,400 --> 00:16:26,405 Okay, humie, how bad does someone wanna find you? 154 00:16:27,880 --> 00:16:32,044 40,000 units? Groot, we're gonna be rich! 155 00:16:46,040 --> 00:16:47,371 - Mr. Quill. - Broker. 156 00:16:48,720 --> 00:16:49,721 The orb. 157 00:16:51,600 --> 00:16:53,762 - As commissioned. - Where's Yondu? 158 00:16:53,880 --> 00:16:55,609 Wanted to be here. Sends his love. 159 00:16:55,720 --> 00:16:56,721 And told me to tell you, 160 00:16:56,840 --> 00:16:59,081 that you got the best eyebrows in the business. 161 00:17:01,280 --> 00:17:02,327 What is it? 162 00:17:03,080 --> 00:17:06,448 It's my policy never to discuss my clients, or their needs. 163 00:17:06,520 --> 00:17:08,522 Yeah, well, I almost died getting it for you. 164 00:17:08,640 --> 00:17:11,610 An occupational hazard, I'm sure, in your line of work. 165 00:17:12,280 --> 00:17:14,561 Some machine-headed freak, working for a dude named Ronan. 166 00:17:15,960 --> 00:17:17,883 Ronan? I'm sorry, Mr. Quill. 167 00:17:18,000 --> 00:17:19,047 I truly am. 168 00:17:19,120 --> 00:17:20,804 But I want no part of this transaction 169 00:17:20,880 --> 00:17:22,803 - if Ronan is involved. - Whoa, whoa, whoa! 170 00:17:23,800 --> 00:17:24,961 Who's Ronan? 171 00:17:25,120 --> 00:17:28,408 A Kree fanatic, outraged by the peace treaty, 172 00:17:28,480 --> 00:17:32,769 who will not rest until Xandarian culture, my culture, 173 00:17:32,880 --> 00:17:34,041 - is wiped from existence! - Whoa, whoa! 174 00:17:34,120 --> 00:17:35,531 - Come on. - He's someone 175 00:17:35,680 --> 00:17:37,120 whose bad side I'd rather not be on. 176 00:17:37,160 --> 00:17:38,810 What? What about my bad side? 177 00:17:38,920 --> 00:17:40,251 Farewell, Mr. Quill. 178 00:17:42,480 --> 00:17:43,925 Hey, we had a deal, bro! 179 00:17:50,000 --> 00:17:51,081 What happened? 180 00:17:53,320 --> 00:17:56,244 Ah, this guy just backed out of a deal on me. 181 00:17:56,400 --> 00:17:58,482 If there's one thing I hate, it's a man without integrity. 182 00:17:58,680 --> 00:18:00,330 Peter Quill. People call me Star-Lord. 183 00:18:01,840 --> 00:18:04,081 You have the bearing of a man of honor. 184 00:18:04,200 --> 00:18:06,328 Well, you know, I wouldn't say that. 185 00:18:07,160 --> 00:18:10,050 People say it about me, all the time, 186 00:18:10,160 --> 00:18:11,685 but it's not something I would ever say about myself. 187 00:18:13,520 --> 00:18:14,681 Ooh! 188 00:18:30,440 --> 00:18:31,601 This wasn't the plan. 189 00:18:32,320 --> 00:18:33,560 Ah! 190 00:18:34,160 --> 00:18:36,322 Put him in the bag. Put him in the bag! 191 00:18:36,440 --> 00:18:38,727 No! Not her, him! 192 00:18:38,880 --> 00:18:40,291 Learn genders, man. 193 00:18:40,680 --> 00:18:42,011 Ow! 194 00:18:42,120 --> 00:18:43,849 Biting? That's not fair! 195 00:18:47,240 --> 00:18:48,969 Take it easy! 196 00:18:55,600 --> 00:18:56,726 Ow! 197 00:19:17,680 --> 00:19:19,364 Fool. You should have learned. 198 00:19:19,480 --> 00:19:21,289 I don't learn. One of my issues. 199 00:19:30,000 --> 00:19:31,650 What the... 200 00:19:34,920 --> 00:19:38,003 Quit smiling, you idiot. You're supposed to be a professional. 201 00:19:39,280 --> 00:19:40,805 You gotta be kidding me. 202 00:19:40,880 --> 00:19:42,609 Ooh. Hey! 203 00:20:00,280 --> 00:20:02,726 I live for the simple things. 204 00:20:02,880 --> 00:20:05,087 Like how much this is gonna hurt. 205 00:20:10,000 --> 00:20:12,002 Yeah. Writhe, little man. 206 00:20:14,160 --> 00:20:15,605 It'll grow back, you d'ast idiot. 207 00:20:15,720 --> 00:20:17,210 Quit whining. 208 00:20:25,600 --> 00:20:28,809 Subject 89P13, drop your weapon. 209 00:20:29,480 --> 00:20:31,005 Aw, crap. 210 00:20:31,120 --> 00:20:32,565 By the authority of the Nova Corps, 211 00:20:32,640 --> 00:20:34,449 - you are under arrest... - All right. Come on up. 212 00:20:34,520 --> 00:20:36,761 For endangerment to life and the destruction of property. 213 00:20:36,800 --> 00:20:39,929 Hey! If it isn't Star-Prince. 214 00:20:40,080 --> 00:20:43,289 - Star-Lord. - Oh, sorry. "Lord." 215 00:20:43,440 --> 00:20:45,522 I picked this guy up a while back for petty theft. 216 00:20:45,640 --> 00:20:47,085 He's got a code name. 217 00:20:47,160 --> 00:20:48,207 Yeah. Stay out of the way. 218 00:20:48,280 --> 00:20:50,169 Come on, man. It's a... It's an outlaw name. 219 00:20:50,240 --> 00:20:51,969 Just relax, pal. 220 00:20:52,040 --> 00:20:54,247 It's cool to have a code name. I think you're right. 834 01:00:24,720 --> 01:00:28,645 Or we could give it to somebody who's not going to arrest us, 835 01:00:28,800 --> 01:00:31,884 who's really nice for a whole lot of money. 836 01:00:32,040 --> 01:00:34,566 I think it's a really good balance between both of your points of view. 837 01:00:34,720 --> 01:00:35,721 You're despicable. 838 01:00:36,400 --> 01:00:37,401 Dishonorable. 839 01:00:38,040 --> 01:00:39,041 Faithless! 840 01:00:39,760 --> 01:00:41,330 - Oh, no. - At last! 841 01:00:43,840 --> 01:00:46,366 I shall meet my foe and destroy him! 842 01:00:46,520 --> 01:00:48,249 You called Ronan?! 843 01:00:53,080 --> 01:00:56,129 Quill! Don't you move, boy! 844 01:00:57,280 --> 01:00:59,408 Don't you move! Get out of the way! 845 01:01:03,320 --> 01:01:05,766 Ronan the Accuser! 846 01:01:05,840 --> 01:01:08,366 You are the one who transmitted the message? 847 01:01:08,440 --> 01:01:09,771 You killed my wife. 848 01:01:10,720 --> 01:01:12,529 You killed my daughter! 849 01:01:20,000 --> 01:01:23,800 I told you, you can't fit. Now, wait here. I'll be back. 850 01:01:29,440 --> 01:01:32,762 It is Gamora. She is escaping with the orb. 851 01:01:41,560 --> 01:01:43,210 No! 852 01:01:43,320 --> 01:01:44,321 Nebula, 853 01:01:45,160 --> 01:01:46,810 retrieve the orb. 854 01:02:03,320 --> 01:02:05,243 The stone is in the furthest pod. 855 01:02:05,920 --> 01:02:07,206 Bring it down! 856 01:02:24,080 --> 01:02:25,241 Ah! 857 01:02:35,800 --> 01:02:38,929 Rocket, keep them off Gamora until she gets to the Milano. 858 01:02:39,080 --> 01:02:41,481 How? We've got no weaponry on these things. 859 01:02:41,640 --> 01:02:43,404 These pods are industrial grade. 860 01:02:43,560 --> 01:02:44,760 They're nearly indestructible. 861 01:02:44,840 --> 01:02:47,047 Not against Necroblasts, they're not. 862 01:02:47,560 --> 01:02:49,164 That's not what I'm saying. 863 01:02:50,280 --> 01:02:51,486 Oh! 864 01:03:37,640 --> 01:03:39,324 Let me borrow your ride. 865 01:04:12,080 --> 01:04:13,923 I don't recall killing your family. 866 01:04:17,240 --> 01:04:20,608 I doubt I'll remember killing you, either. 867 01:04:37,240 --> 01:04:40,084 Quill, I'm trapped! I can't make it to the Milano! 868 01:04:40,720 --> 01:04:41,721 I have to head out! 869 01:04:44,200 --> 01:04:46,168 Wait! These things aren't meant to go out there! 870 01:04:53,240 --> 01:04:55,129 You are a disappointment, sister. 871 01:04:55,880 --> 01:04:57,803 Of all our siblings, 872 01:04:58,640 --> 01:05:00,165 I hated you least. 873 01:05:00,640 --> 01:05:01,846 Nebula, please. 874 01:05:02,040 --> 01:05:03,644 If Ronan gets this stone 875 01:05:04,080 --> 01:05:05,809 - he'll kill us all. - Not all. 876 01:05:07,520 --> 01:05:09,204 You will already be dead. 877 01:06:03,720 --> 01:06:06,769 Ronan, it is done. 878 01:06:09,760 --> 01:06:10,807 Quill, come on. 879 01:06:11,400 --> 01:06:13,846 Her body mods should keep her alive a couple more minutes, 880 01:06:14,000 --> 01:06:16,002 but there's nothing we can do for her. 881 01:06:16,200 --> 01:06:17,720 These pods aren't meant to be out here. 882 01:06:17,840 --> 01:06:20,241 In a second, we're gonna be in the same boat. 883 01:06:27,760 --> 01:06:30,081 Aw, damn it. 884 01:06:31,400 --> 01:06:32,845 Quill? 885 01:06:33,000 --> 01:06:34,764 Yondu! Yondu. 886 01:06:35,120 --> 01:06:36,167 This is Quill! 887 01:06:36,240 --> 01:06:39,801 - My coordinates are 227K324. - Quill. 888 01:06:40,040 --> 01:06:41,201 Quill, what are you doing? 889 01:06:41,360 --> 01:06:42,805 Just outside Knowhere. 890 01:06:42,960 --> 01:06:45,088 If you're there, come get me! 891 01:06:45,800 --> 01:06:47,290 I'm all yours! 892 01:06:56,760 --> 01:06:58,728 Quill, don't be ridiculous. 893 01:07:00,320 --> 01:07:02,448 Get back into your pod! 894 01:07:02,800 --> 01:07:05,883 You can't fit two people in there. You're gonna die. 895 01:07:07,120 --> 01:07:08,963 You'll die in seconds! 896 01:07:09,280 --> 01:07:10,441 Quill. 897 01:08:11,520 --> 01:08:13,170 Quill? 898 01:08:14,840 --> 01:08:16,330 What happened? 899 01:08:17,480 --> 01:08:19,528 I saw you out there. 900 01:08:20,920 --> 01:08:23,400 I don't know what came over me. 901 01:08:24,360 --> 01:08:26,203 But I couldn't let you die. 902 01:08:29,040 --> 01:08:31,441 I found something inside of myself. 903 01:08:32,480 --> 01:08:36,168 Something incredibly heroic. 904 01:08:37,920 --> 01:08:40,446 I mean, not to brag, 905 01:08:40,600 --> 01:08:41,886 but, objectively... 906 01:08:42,000 --> 01:08:43,047 Where's the orb? 907 01:08:44,880 --> 01:08:47,121 It's... well, they got the orb. 908 01:08:47,280 --> 01:08:48,327 What? 909 01:08:51,040 --> 01:08:53,520 Welcome home, Peter. 910 01:09:16,400 --> 01:09:19,165 Blasted idiot. They're all idiots! 911 01:09:20,480 --> 01:09:22,767 Quill just got himself captured. 912 01:09:22,920 --> 01:09:27,209 None of this ever would have happened if you didn't try to single-handedly 913 01:09:27,360 --> 01:09:28,600 take on a frickin' army! 914 01:09:30,360 --> 01:09:31,600 You're right. 915 01:09:34,240 --> 01:09:36,402 I was a fool. 916 01:09:38,840 --> 01:09:40,569 All the anger, 917 01:09:41,200 --> 01:09:43,043 all the rage, 918 01:09:46,240 --> 01:09:48,527 was just to cover my loss. 919 01:09:55,080 --> 01:09:59,449 Oh, boo-hoo-hoo. "My wife and child are dead." 920 01:10:01,000 --> 01:10:03,207 Oh, I don't care if it's mean! 921 01:10:03,360 --> 01:10:05,249 Everybody's got dead people. 922 01:10:05,920 --> 01:10:07,570 It's no excuse to get everybody else 923 01:10:07,760 --> 01:10:09,649 dead along the way! 924 01:10:13,440 --> 01:10:16,125 Come on, Groot. Ronan has the stone. 925 01:10:16,280 --> 01:10:19,568 The only chance we got is to get to the other side of the universe 926 01:10:19,640 --> 01:10:21,529 as fast as we can and maybe, 927 01:10:21,680 --> 01:10:23,989 just maybe, we'll be able to live full lives 928 01:10:24,002 --> 01:10:26,322 before that whack-job ever gets there. 929 01:10:28,800 --> 01:10:30,165 I am Groot. 930 01:10:30,320 --> 01:10:32,607 Save them? How? 931 01:10:32,760 --> 01:10:35,525 I am Groot. 932 01:10:35,680 --> 01:10:38,365 I know they're the only friends that we ever had, 933 01:10:38,440 --> 01:10:41,171 but there's an army of Ravagers around them. 934 01:10:41,320 --> 01:10:42,970 And there's only two of us! 935 01:10:44,000 --> 01:10:45,240 Three. 936 01:10:51,840 --> 01:10:53,126 Aw! 937 01:10:54,320 --> 01:10:56,561 You're making me 938 01:10:56,720 --> 01:10:58,290 beat... up 939 01:10:58,480 --> 01:10:59,481 grass! 940 01:11:02,000 --> 01:11:03,729 The orb is in my possession, 941 01:11:04,840 --> 01:11:06,365 as I promised. 942 01:11:06,520 --> 01:11:08,045 Bring it to me. 943 01:11:08,240 --> 01:11:11,528 Yes, that was our agreement. 944 01:11:12,280 --> 01:11:13,930 Bring you the orb, 945 01:11:14,120 --> 01:11:17,647 and you will destroy Xandar for me. 946 01:11:17,800 --> 01:11:22,362 However, now that I know it contains an Infinity Stone, 947 01:11:22,520 --> 01:11:24,522 I wonder what use I have for you. 948 01:11:24,680 --> 01:11:26,205 Boy, 949 01:11:26,520 --> 01:11:28,966 I would reconsider your current course. 950 01:11:30,120 --> 01:11:32,361 Master! You cannot! 951 01:11:32,520 --> 01:11:35,046 Thanos is the most powerful being in the universe. 952 01:11:35,680 --> 01:11:37,330 Not anymore. 953 01:12:00,160 --> 01:12:02,401 You call me "boy!" 954 01:12:02,560 --> 01:12:07,122 I will unfurl 1,000 years of Kree justice on Xandar, 955 01:12:07,280 --> 01:12:10,807 and burn it to its core! 956 01:12:10,960 --> 01:12:15,048 Then, Thanos, I am coming for you. 957 01:12:17,400 --> 01:12:20,324 After Xandar, you are going to kill my father? 958 01:12:20,800 --> 01:12:22,643 You dare to oppose me? 959 01:12:22,800 --> 01:12:24,643 You see what he has turned me into. 960 01:12:24,720 --> 01:12:28,964 If you kill him, I will help you destroy a thousand planets. 961 01:12:29,760 --> 01:12:31,321 You betray me? 962 01:12:32,200 --> 01:12:33,201 Steal my money? 963 01:12:33,320 --> 01:12:34,924 Stop it! Leave him alone! 964 01:12:35,320 --> 01:12:37,402 When I picked you up as a kid, 965 01:12:37,560 --> 01:12:39,881 these boys wanted to eat you. 966 01:12:40,080 --> 01:12:42,481 They ain't never tasted Terran before. 967 01:12:42,640 --> 01:12:44,369 I saved your life! 968 01:12:44,440 --> 01:12:46,602 Oh, will you shut up about that? God! 969 01:12:46,760 --> 01:12:49,081 Twenty years, you been throwing that in my face, 970 01:12:49,160 --> 01:12:51,891 like it's some great thing, not eating me. 971 01:12:51,960 --> 01:12:55,521 Normal people don't even think about eating someone else! 972 01:12:55,720 --> 01:12:58,166 Much less that person having to be grateful for it! 973 01:12:58,320 --> 01:12:59,446 You abducted me, man. 974 01:13:00,480 --> 01:13:02,721 You stole me from my home and from my family. 975 01:13:02,880 --> 01:13:05,008 You don't give a damn about your Terra! 976 01:13:05,520 --> 01:13:08,808 You're scared because you're soft in here. 977 01:13:08,880 --> 01:13:09,961 Here, right here! 978 01:13:10,320 --> 01:13:11,321 Yondu! 979 01:13:11,480 --> 01:13:12,720 Listen to me! 980 01:13:12,800 --> 01:13:15,041 Ronan has something called an Infinity Stone. 981 01:13:15,160 --> 01:13:16,969 I know what he's got, girl. 982 01:13:17,160 --> 01:13:19,447 Then you know we must get it back! 983 01:13:19,600 --> 01:13:23,002 He's gonna use it to wipe out Xandar. 984 01:13:23,160 --> 01:13:26,209 We have to warn them. Billions of people will perish. 985 01:13:26,280 --> 01:13:28,931 Is that what she's been filling your head with, boy? 986 01:13:29,000 --> 01:13:30,121 Sentiment? 987 01:13:31,480 --> 01:13:33,323 Eating away your brain like maggots?! 988 01:13:38,080 --> 01:13:39,491 That's it. 989 01:13:40,160 --> 01:13:41,207 No! 990 01:13:41,680 --> 01:13:42,761 Sorry, boy. 991 01:13:42,920 --> 01:13:46,447 But a captain's gotta teach his men what happens to those what cross him. 992 01:13:46,600 --> 01:13:47,840 Captain's gotta teach stuff! 993 01:13:50,680 --> 01:13:52,921 If you kill me now, 994 01:13:53,080 --> 01:13:57,210 you are saying goodbye to the biggest score you have ever seen. 995 01:14:02,360 --> 01:14:03,771 The stone? 996 01:14:04,520 --> 01:14:06,488 I hope you got something better than that. 997 01:14:06,640 --> 01:14:09,291 Because ain't nobody stealing from Ronan. 998 01:14:10,480 --> 01:14:11,811 We got a ringer. 999 01:14:11,960 --> 01:14:13,371 Is that right? 1000 01:14:14,520 --> 01:14:16,887 She knows everything there is to know about Ronan. 1001 01:14:17,040 --> 01:14:20,010 His ships, his army. 1002 01:14:20,160 --> 01:14:22,003 He's vulnerable. 1003 01:14:22,800 --> 01:14:24,131 Hey, what do you say, Yondu, huh? 1004 01:14:24,200 --> 01:14:27,761 Me and you, taking down a mark side-by-side, like the old days. 1005 01:14:35,480 --> 01:14:36,561 Let him go! 1006 01:14:38,280 --> 01:14:40,806 You always did have a scrote, boy! 1007 01:14:40,960 --> 01:14:43,691 That's why I kept you on as a young'un. 1008 01:14:52,000 --> 01:14:53,968 Captain, the shot was non-damaging. 1009 01:14:54,120 --> 01:14:56,327 Attention, idiots. 1010 01:14:58,400 --> 01:15:02,200 The lunatic on top of this craft is holding a Hadron Enforcer. 1011 01:15:02,360 --> 01:15:04,089 It's a weapon of my own design. 1012 01:15:04,240 --> 01:15:05,366 What the hell? 1013 01:15:05,840 --> 01:15:08,525 If you don't hand over our companions now, 1014 01:15:08,720 --> 01:15:11,007 he's gonna tear your ship a new one. 1015 01:15:11,160 --> 01:15:12,924 A very big new one! 1016 01:15:13,080 --> 01:15:15,924 - I ain't buyin' it. - I'm giving you to the count of five. 1017 01:15:16,480 --> 01:15:19,609 - 5, 4, 3... - No! Wait, hold on! 1018 01:15:19,760 --> 01:15:21,524 Rocket, it's me, for God sakes! 1019 01:15:21,680 --> 01:15:23,682 We figured it out! We're fine! 1020 01:15:23,840 --> 01:15:25,441 Oh, hey, Quill. What's going on? 1021 01:15:26,920 --> 01:15:28,604 You call that "figured it out"? 1022 01:15:28,680 --> 01:15:31,001 We're gonna rob the guys who just beat us senseless. 1023 01:15:31,160 --> 01:15:32,640 Oh, you want to talk about senseless? 1024 01:15:32,680 --> 01:15:35,001 How about trying to save us by blowing us up? 1025 01:15:35,080 --> 01:15:37,924 We were only gonna blow you up if they didn't turn you over! 1026 01:15:38,000 --> 01:15:39,809 And how on Earth were they gonna turn us over 1027 01:15:39,960 --> 01:15:41,521 when you only gave them a count of five? 1028 01:15:41,640 --> 01:15:43,961 We didn't have time to work out the minutiae 1029 01:15:44,120 --> 01:15:45,121 of the plan. 1030 01:15:45,200 --> 01:15:47,521 This is what we get for acting altruistically. 1031 01:15:47,600 --> 01:15:49,682 - I am Groot. - They are ungrateful. 1032 01:15:49,840 --> 01:15:50,966 What's important now 1033 01:15:51,120 --> 01:15:52,770 is we get the Ravagers' army 1034 01:15:52,920 --> 01:15:54,126 to help us save Xandar. 1035 01:15:54,200 --> 01:15:55,690 So we can give the stone to Yondu 1036 01:15:55,760 --> 01:15:57,520 who's just gonna sell to somebody even worse? 1037 01:15:57,880 --> 01:15:59,201 We'll figure that part out later. 1038 01:15:59,280 --> 01:16:00,964 We have to stop Ronan. 1039 01:16:01,040 --> 01:16:02,485 How? 1040 01:16:02,640 --> 01:16:03,721 I have a plan. 1041 01:16:03,800 --> 01:16:04,801 You've got a plan? 1042 01:16:05,320 --> 01:16:06,321 Yes. 1043 01:16:06,840 --> 01:16:07,921 First of all, you're copying me from 1044 01:16:08,040 --> 01:16:09,451 - when I said I had a plan. - No, I'm not. 1045 01:16:09,600 --> 01:16:12,524 People say that all the time. It's not that unique of a thing to say. 1046 01:16:12,600 --> 01:16:14,441 Secondly, I don't even believe you have a plan. 1047 01:16:14,600 --> 01:16:17,331 I have part of a plan! 1048 01:16:17,480 --> 01:16:19,005 What percentage of a plan do you have? 1049 01:16:19,160 --> 01:16:20,571 You don't get to ask questions 1050 01:16:20,680 --> 01:16:22,320 after the nonsense you pulled on Knowhere. 1051 01:16:22,440 --> 01:16:24,090 I just saved Quill. 1052 01:16:24,160 --> 01:16:25,161 We've already established 1053 01:16:25,240 --> 01:16:26,924 that you destroying the ship that I'm on is not saving me. 1054 01:16:27,000 --> 01:16:29,162 - When did we establish it? - Like three seconds ago! 1055 01:16:29,320 --> 01:16:30,845 I wasn't listening. I was thinking of something else. 1056 01:16:32,000 --> 01:16:33,520 She's right. You don't get an opinion. 1057 01:16:33,920 --> 01:16:35,001 What percentage? 1058 01:16:35,160 --> 01:16:36,525 I don't know. Twelve percent. 1059 01:16:36,600 --> 01:16:37,965 Twelve percent? 1060 01:16:39,960 --> 01:16:41,086 That's a fake laugh. 1061 01:16:41,280 --> 01:16:43,009 - It's real! - Totally fake. 1062 01:16:43,080 --> 01:16:47,688 That is the most real, authentic, hysterical laugh of my entire life 1063 01:16:47,840 --> 01:16:48,921 because that is not a plan. 1064 01:16:49,040 --> 01:16:50,451 It's barely a concept. 1065 01:16:50,600 --> 01:16:51,601 You're taking their side? 1066 01:16:51,760 --> 01:16:52,966 I am Groot. 1067 01:16:53,120 --> 01:16:54,485 So what, it's better than 11%? 1068 01:16:54,560 --> 01:16:56,085 What the hell does that have to do with anything? 1069 01:16:56,160 --> 01:16:58,367 Thank you, Groot. Thank you. 1070 01:16:58,880 --> 01:17:02,327 See? Groot's the only one of you who has a clue. 1071 01:17:07,360 --> 01:17:08,361 Guys. 1072 01:17:09,200 --> 01:17:10,281 Come on. 1073 01:17:10,440 --> 01:17:12,488 Yondu is gonna be here in two seconds. 1074 01:17:12,560 --> 01:17:15,040 He expects to hear this big plan of ours. 1075 01:17:16,440 --> 01:17:18,363 I need your help. 1076 01:17:20,040 --> 01:17:22,407 I look around at us. 1077 01:17:22,880 --> 01:17:23,927 You know what I see? 1078 01:17:24,880 --> 01:17:25,881 Losers. 1079 01:17:28,560 --> 01:17:32,248 I mean, like, folks who have lost stuff. 1080 01:17:32,320 --> 01:17:34,482 And we have. Man, we have. All of us. 1081 01:17:35,600 --> 01:17:36,931 Our homes, 1082 01:17:37,640 --> 01:17:39,051 our families, 1083 01:17:40,160 --> 01:17:42,083 normal lives. 1084 01:17:42,240 --> 01:17:44,971 And, usually, life takes more than it gives. But not today. 1085 01:17:45,800 --> 01:17:47,325 Today, it's given us something. 1086 01:17:47,480 --> 01:17:49,050 It has given us a chance. 1087 01:17:49,200 --> 01:17:50,565 To do what? 1088 01:17:52,400 --> 01:17:53,765 To give a shit. 1089 01:17:54,520 --> 01:17:56,329 For once. 1090 01:17:56,520 --> 01:17:58,522 Not run away. 1091 01:18:01,360 --> 01:18:03,840 I, for one, am not gonna stand by and watch 1092 01:18:03,920 --> 01:18:07,003 as Ronan wipes out billions of innocent lives. 1093 01:18:08,120 --> 01:18:10,726 But, Quill, stopping Ronan, 1094 01:18:11,800 --> 01:18:13,848 it's impossible. 1095 01:18:14,360 --> 01:18:16,647 You're asking us to die. 1096 01:18:23,320 --> 01:18:25,209 Yeah, I guess I am. 1097 01:18:38,040 --> 01:18:39,166 Quill. 1098 01:18:43,360 --> 01:18:46,682 I have lived most my life surrounded by my enemies. 1099 01:18:50,720 --> 01:18:54,930 I will be grateful to die among my friends. 1100 01:18:59,240 --> 01:19:01,163 You are an honorable man, Quill. 1101 01:19:02,880 --> 01:19:05,087 I will fight beside you. 1102 01:19:06,280 --> 01:19:07,805 And in the end, 1103 01:19:09,760 --> 01:19:11,808 I will see my wife and daughter again. 1104 01:19:17,760 --> 01:19:20,923 I am Groot. 1105 01:19:31,240 --> 01:19:34,483 Oh, what the hell. I don't have that long a lifespan, anyway. 1106 01:19:40,480 --> 01:19:42,721 Now I'm standing. Y'all happy? 1107 01:19:43,200 --> 01:19:45,362 We're all standing up now. 1108 01:19:45,520 --> 01:19:48,808 Bunch of jackasses, standing in a circle. 1109 01:19:56,040 --> 01:19:57,565 The stone reacts to anything organic. 1110 01:19:57,720 --> 01:19:59,768 The bigger the target, the bigger the power surge. 1111 01:19:59,840 --> 01:20:03,003 All Ronan's got to do is touch the stone to the planet's surface and zap. 1112 01:20:03,160 --> 01:20:04,810 All plants, animals, 1113 01:20:04,960 --> 01:20:06,680 - Nova Corps. - Everything will die. 1114 01:20:07,080 --> 01:20:09,048 So Ronan does not make the surface. 1115 01:20:12,000 --> 01:20:13,968 Rocket will lead a team to blow a hole 1116 01:20:14,160 --> 01:20:16,288 in the Dark Aster's starboard hull. 1117 01:20:16,440 --> 01:20:20,525 Then, our craft and Yondu's will enter. 1118 01:20:20,600 --> 01:20:23,410 Won't there be hundreds of Sakaaran soldiers inside? 1119 01:20:23,480 --> 01:20:26,324 I think of Sakaaran as paper people. 1120 01:20:32,440 --> 01:20:33,640 Once they know we're on board, 1121 01:20:33,720 --> 01:20:37,122 Ronan will isolate himself behind impenetrable security doors on deck. 1122 01:20:37,200 --> 01:20:39,646 Which I can disable by dismantling the power source. 1123 01:20:39,800 --> 01:20:41,529 We'll make it to the flight deck, 1124 01:20:41,600 --> 01:20:44,604 and I'll use the Hadron Enforcer to kill Ronan. 1125 01:20:47,160 --> 01:20:50,243 Once Ronan is dead, we will retrieve the stone. 1126 01:20:50,760 --> 01:20:52,842 Use these devices to contain it. 1127 01:20:53,280 --> 01:20:54,611 If you touch it, 1128 01:20:55,360 --> 01:20:56,691 it will kill you. 1129 01:20:59,520 --> 01:21:01,443 I'll contact one of the Nova officers 1130 01:21:01,520 --> 01:21:02,760 who arrested us. 1131 01:21:02,840 --> 01:21:04,681 Hopefully, they'll believe we're there to help. 1132 01:21:06,080 --> 01:21:09,243 There's one more thing we need to complete the plan. 1133 01:21:10,000 --> 01:21:11,206 That guy's eye- 1134 01:21:12,120 --> 01:21:14,646 No! No, we don't. No, we don't need 1135 01:21:14,800 --> 01:21:16,131 that guy's eye- 1136 01:21:17,240 --> 01:21:19,846 - no, seriously, I need it! It's important to me. 1137 01:21:24,520 --> 01:21:26,204 Ronan's fleet has been spotted, 1138 01:21:26,280 --> 01:21:27,406 and will arrive in T-minus 1139 01:21:27,560 --> 01:21:29,164 fifteen minutes. 1140 01:21:29,560 --> 01:21:31,050 Remember, boy. 1141 01:21:31,480 --> 01:21:34,806 At the end of all this, I get the stone. 1142 01:21:34,960 --> 01:21:37,406 You cross me, we kill you all. 1143 01:22:00,040 --> 01:22:01,371 Let's go get 'em, boys! 1144 01:22:10,880 --> 01:22:12,120 This is a terrible plan. 1145 01:22:12,320 --> 01:22:14,720 Hey, you're the one who said you wanted to die among friends. 1146 01:22:19,480 --> 01:22:20,481 Nova Prime. 1147 01:22:22,040 --> 01:22:23,246 I received a transmission 1148 01:22:23,400 --> 01:22:24,640 from one of the Ravagers. 1149 01:22:25,200 --> 01:22:27,841 He says Ronan's in possession of something called an Infinity Stone 1150 01:22:27,960 --> 01:22:29,325 and he's headed toward Xandar. 1151 01:22:29,400 --> 01:22:30,606 Good God. 1152 01:22:30,760 --> 01:22:32,683 It's a trick. He's a criminal. 1153 01:22:32,880 --> 01:22:35,326 Did he say why we should believe him? 1154 01:22:35,400 --> 01:22:37,562 He said his crew just escaped from prison 1155 01:22:37,760 --> 01:22:40,730 so he'd have no other reason to risk coming to Xandar to help. 1156 01:22:41,560 --> 01:22:42,721 He says that he's an 1157 01:22:43,760 --> 01:22:44,807 "a-hole." 1158 01:22:45,160 --> 01:22:48,289 But he's not, and I'm quoting him, here, 1159 01:22:48,400 --> 01:22:50,607 "100% a dick." 1160 01:22:50,760 --> 01:22:52,046 Do you believe him? 1161 01:22:52,720 --> 01:22:55,803 I don't know that I believe anyone is 100% a dick, ma'am. 1162 01:22:55,880 --> 01:22:58,804 I mean, do you believe that he is here to help? 1163 01:23:02,520 --> 01:23:03,521 Yeah. 1164 01:23:13,600 --> 01:23:15,090 A fleet approaches. 1165 01:23:15,520 --> 01:23:17,124 They appear to be Ravagers. 1166 01:23:28,200 --> 01:23:29,281 Fire! 1167 01:23:40,640 --> 01:23:41,801 Cover it down. 1168 01:23:41,960 --> 01:23:43,883 Submerge! 1169 01:23:56,840 --> 01:23:58,046 Rocket, hurry! 1170 01:24:04,560 --> 01:24:05,766 All pilots, dive! 1171 01:24:05,920 --> 01:24:07,081 They're beneath us! 1172 01:24:15,920 --> 01:24:17,331 Evacuate the city. 1173 01:24:17,480 --> 01:24:20,962 Our priority is to get our people away from the battle. 1174 01:24:28,000 --> 01:24:29,001 Forward thrust, now! 1175 01:24:42,520 --> 01:24:43,521 Come on! 1176 01:24:45,240 --> 01:24:46,844 Quill! Yondu! Now! 1177 01:25:09,160 --> 01:25:10,650 Aw, hell! 1178 01:25:10,800 --> 01:25:12,245 I'm going down, Quill! 1179 01:25:12,400 --> 01:25:14,164 No more games with me, boy! 1180 01:25:14,320 --> 01:25:15,367 I'll see you 1181 01:25:15,520 --> 01:25:17,249 at the end of this! 1182 01:25:23,520 --> 01:25:24,965 There are too many of them, Rocket! 1183 01:25:25,720 --> 01:25:27,449 We'll never make it up there! 1184 01:25:42,480 --> 01:25:43,606 Peter Quill. 1185 01:25:43,760 --> 01:25:46,161 This is Denarian Saal of the Nova Corps. 1186 01:25:46,320 --> 01:25:49,608 For the record, I advised against trusting you here. 1187 01:25:49,760 --> 01:25:51,125 They got my "dick" message! 1188 01:25:51,560 --> 01:25:52,721 Prove me wrong. 1189 01:26:00,200 --> 01:26:02,089 Yes! 1190 01:26:23,280 --> 01:26:24,361 Yes! 1191 01:26:27,760 --> 01:26:29,569 We're just like Kevin Bacon. 1192 01:26:33,680 --> 01:26:35,205 The starboard kern has been breached! 1193 01:26:35,360 --> 01:26:36,691 We have been boarded. 1194 01:26:36,760 --> 01:26:38,171 Continue our approach. 1195 01:26:38,320 --> 01:26:39,606 But the Nova Corps have engaged. 1196 01:26:39,760 --> 01:26:42,411 None of that will matter once we reach the surface. 1197 01:26:42,520 --> 01:26:43,521 Seal security doors! 1198 01:26:43,760 --> 01:26:44,807 Now! 1199 01:26:46,520 --> 01:26:48,807 Get out of my way! 1200 01:27:00,040 --> 01:27:01,565 Oh, man. 1201 01:27:01,720 --> 01:27:06,089 All Nova pilots, interlock and form a blockade. 1202 01:27:06,280 --> 01:27:10,126 The Dark Aster must not reach the ground. 1203 01:27:22,640 --> 01:27:23,846 Locked in! 1204 01:27:24,640 --> 01:27:25,846 Locked in. 1205 01:27:27,400 --> 01:27:28,401 We're locked in. 1206 01:28:06,680 --> 01:28:08,887 I can barely see. 1207 01:28:35,240 --> 01:28:36,969 When did you learn to do that? 1208 01:28:37,520 --> 01:28:40,364 Pretty sure the answer is "I am Groot." 1209 01:28:41,520 --> 01:28:44,046 The flight deck is 300 meters this way. 1210 01:28:47,280 --> 01:28:50,648 I want you all to know that I am grateful for your acceptance after my blunders. 1211 01:28:51,200 --> 01:28:53,407 It is pleasing to once again have 1212 01:28:54,040 --> 01:28:55,041 friends. 1213 01:28:56,120 --> 01:28:59,010 You, Quill, are my friend. 1214 01:28:59,080 --> 01:29:00,286 Thanks. 1215 01:29:00,480 --> 01:29:03,211 - This dumb tree, he is my friend. - Mmm. 1216 01:29:04,720 --> 01:29:05,926 And this green whore, she, too... 1217 01:29:06,040 --> 01:29:07,565 Oh, you must stop! 1218 01:29:10,440 --> 01:29:13,205 Gamora, look at what you have done. 1219 01:29:13,920 --> 01:29:15,888 You have always been weak. 1220 01:29:16,160 --> 01:29:18,288 You stupid, traitorous... 1221 01:29:23,440 --> 01:29:25,761 Nobody talks to my friends like that. 1222 01:29:26,920 --> 01:29:28,001 Head to the flight deck. 1223 01:29:28,160 --> 01:29:30,811 I'll shut down the power to the security doors. 1224 01:29:38,800 --> 01:29:40,609 Yondu Udonta. 1225 01:29:40,760 --> 01:29:44,242 Order your men to turn on the Nova Corps. 1226 01:30:01,040 --> 01:30:02,565 Enough nonsense, Ravager! 1227 01:30:02,720 --> 01:30:04,529 Time to die... 1228 01:30:37,240 --> 01:30:38,287 Nebula, please. 1229 01:30:52,800 --> 01:30:55,531 Enough of this. Necrocraft pilots, 1230 01:30:55,720 --> 01:30:57,768 enact immolation initiative. 1231 01:31:01,280 --> 01:31:02,805 They're dive-bombing the city! 1232 01:31:02,880 --> 01:31:04,689 Denarian Saal, should we break formation? 1233 01:31:04,840 --> 01:31:06,490 No! Hold your positions. 1234 01:31:38,120 --> 01:31:39,531 Keep Ronan up there, Saal. 1235 01:31:39,720 --> 01:31:41,324 We'll take care of the people down here. 1236 01:31:41,400 --> 01:31:43,607 I can't believe I'm taking orders from a hamster. 1237 01:31:46,800 --> 01:31:48,040 Star-Lord. 1238 01:31:48,520 --> 01:31:49,521 Finally. 1239 01:31:55,080 --> 01:31:56,286 Ah! 1240 01:32:00,440 --> 01:32:01,487 You thief! 1241 01:32:13,360 --> 01:32:16,204 You will never make it to Ronan. 1242 01:32:21,960 --> 01:32:24,201 Everybody shoot them before they hit the ground. 1243 01:32:32,840 --> 01:32:34,205 Come on! 1244 01:33:17,040 --> 01:33:20,522 Finger to the throat means death. 1245 01:33:26,360 --> 01:33:27,771 Metaphor. 1246 01:33:27,920 --> 01:33:29,206 Yeah, sorta. 1247 01:33:29,360 --> 01:33:30,521 Oh, no. 1248 01:33:58,520 --> 01:33:59,931 Xandar! 1249 01:34:00,600 --> 01:34:03,251 You stand accused. 1250 01:34:04,040 --> 01:34:07,044 Your wretched peace treaty will not 1251 01:34:07,240 --> 01:34:08,401 save you now. 1252 01:34:08,880 --> 01:34:12,168 It is the tinder on which you burn. 1253 01:34:36,760 --> 01:34:37,761 Rocket! 1254 01:34:37,920 --> 01:34:40,921 Hold on, Saal, just... 1255 01:35:06,440 --> 01:35:07,680 Quill, you gotta hurry. 1256 01:35:07,840 --> 01:35:09,490 The city's been evacuated, 1257 01:35:09,560 --> 01:35:12,166 but we're getting our asses kicked down here. 1258 01:35:12,240 --> 01:35:13,685 Gamora hasn't opened the door! 1259 01:35:38,400 --> 01:35:39,401 Nebula! 1260 01:35:41,000 --> 01:35:43,480 Sister, help us fight Ronan. 1261 01:35:43,640 --> 01:35:45,165 You know he's crazy. 1262 01:35:45,600 --> 01:35:47,648 I know you're both crazy. 1263 01:35:47,840 --> 01:35:49,001 No! 1264 01:35:51,880 --> 01:35:52,881 - What the...? - Ah! 1265 01:35:54,160 --> 01:35:55,685 Get out! 1266 01:36:37,080 --> 01:36:38,081 You did it! 1267 01:37:04,600 --> 01:37:05,931 I was mistaken. 1268 01:37:06,000 --> 01:37:07,570 I do remember your family. 1269 01:37:08,240 --> 01:37:09,969 Their screams were 1270 01:37:10,120 --> 01:37:12,248 pitiful. I... 1271 01:39:09,360 --> 01:39:10,486 No, Groot! 1272 01:39:11,080 --> 01:39:12,206 You can't. 1273 01:39:12,280 --> 01:39:13,770 You'll die. 1274 01:39:14,320 --> 01:39:16,163 Why are you doing this? 1275 01:39:16,320 --> 01:39:17,810 Why'? 1276 01:39:24,400 --> 01:39:25,970 We 1277 01:39:26,360 --> 01:39:27,441 are 1278 01:39:28,040 --> 01:39:29,565 Groot. 1279 01:40:33,960 --> 01:40:36,008 I called him an idiot. 1280 01:40:58,720 --> 01:41:00,643 You killed Groot! 1281 01:41:04,800 --> 01:41:06,131 Behold! 1282 01:41:07,000 --> 01:41:10,482 Your 'guardians of the galaxy.' 1283 01:41:10,560 --> 01:41:13,040 What fruit have they wrought? 1284 01:41:13,120 --> 01:41:17,250 Only that my father and his father 1285 01:41:17,320 --> 01:41:20,881 shall finally know vengeance. 1286 01:41:21,040 --> 01:41:23,281 People of Xandar, 1287 01:41:23,920 --> 01:41:28,650 the time has come to rejoice and renounce 1288 01:41:28,800 --> 01:41:31,007 your paltry gods! 1289 01:41:31,840 --> 01:41:35,162 Your salvation is at hand. 1290 01:41:47,920 --> 01:41:49,445 Listen to these words. 1291 01:41:58,520 --> 01:42:00,204 Now bring it down hard! 1292 01:42:03,600 --> 01:42:04,681 What are you doing? 1293 01:42:05,200 --> 01:42:07,771 Dance-off, bro! Me and you! 1294 01:42:11,200 --> 01:42:12,611 Gamora. 1295 01:42:13,640 --> 01:42:15,688 Subtle. Take it back. 1296 01:42:16,120 --> 01:42:18,361 What are you doing? 1297 01:42:18,680 --> 01:42:21,001 I'm distracting you, you big turd blossom. 1298 01:42:37,240 --> 01:42:38,730 No! 1299 01:43:12,720 --> 01:43:15,849 Peter! Take my hand! 1300 01:43:21,280 --> 01:43:23,282 Take my hand, Peter. 1301 01:43:24,200 --> 01:43:25,611 Mom. 1302 01:43:26,120 --> 01:43:28,168 Take my hand! 1303 01:44:22,600 --> 01:44:24,568 You're mortal! 1304 01:44:24,720 --> 01:44:26,006 How? 1305 01:44:26,160 --> 01:44:28,401 You said it yourself, bitch. 1306 01:44:28,480 --> 01:44:30,847 We're the 'Guardians of the Galaxy.' 1307 01:45:00,720 --> 01:45:01,926 Well, well, well. 1308 01:45:02,480 --> 01:45:03,561 Quite the light show. 1309 01:45:05,840 --> 01:45:07,524 Ain't this sweet. 1310 01:45:09,040 --> 01:45:11,566 But you got some business to attend to 1311 01:45:11,720 --> 01:45:14,166 before all the nookie-nookie starts. 1312 01:45:15,840 --> 01:45:18,047 Peter, you can't. Peter. 1313 01:45:18,200 --> 01:45:20,248 You gotta reconsider this, Yondu. 1314 01:45:20,720 --> 01:45:22,324 I don't know who you're selling this to, 1315 01:45:22,400 --> 01:45:24,323 but the only way the universe can survive 1316 01:45:24,480 --> 01:45:26,164 is if you give it to the Nova Corps. 1317 01:45:27,000 --> 01:45:29,162 I may be as pretty as an angel, 1318 01:45:31,400 --> 01:45:33,289 but I sure as hell ain't one. 1319 01:45:35,000 --> 01:45:36,490 Hand it over, son. 1320 01:45:53,360 --> 01:45:54,361 Yondu. 1321 01:45:57,440 --> 01:46:00,728 Do not open that orb. You know that, right? 1322 01:46:01,360 --> 01:46:03,806 You've seen what it does to people. 1323 01:46:14,560 --> 01:46:16,801 Yeah, Quill turned out okay. 1324 01:46:17,680 --> 01:46:20,286 It's probably good we didn't deliver him to his dad 1325 01:46:20,400 --> 01:46:21,401 like we was hired to do. 1326 01:46:21,520 --> 01:46:24,251 Yeah, that guy was a jackass. 1327 01:46:29,120 --> 01:46:32,681 He is gonna be so pissed when he realizes I switched out the orb on him. 1328 01:46:35,440 --> 01:46:37,283 He was gonna kill you, Peter. 1329 01:46:38,480 --> 01:46:40,164 Oh, I know. 1330 01:46:42,040 --> 01:46:43,644 But he was about the only family I had. 1331 01:46:46,560 --> 01:46:47,607 No. 1332 01:46:48,880 --> 01:46:50,086 He wasn't. 1333 01:47:38,320 --> 01:47:39,720 Why would you even know this? 1334 01:47:40,000 --> 01:47:42,765 When we arrested you, we noticed an anomaly in your nervous system, 1335 01:47:42,840 --> 01:47:44,205 so we had it checked out. 1336 01:47:45,560 --> 01:47:47,164 I'm not Terran? 1337 01:47:47,320 --> 01:47:48,845 You are half Terran. 1338 01:47:49,000 --> 01:47:52,641 Your mother was of Earth. Your father, well, 1339 01:47:52,800 --> 01:47:56,361 he's something very ancient we've never seen here before. 1340 01:47:56,680 --> 01:47:57,920 That could be why you were able 1341 01:47:58,000 --> 01:48:00,241 to hold the stone for as long as you did. 1342 01:48:00,720 --> 01:48:02,480 Your friends have arrived. 1343 01:48:04,080 --> 01:48:06,321 On behalf of the Nova Corps, 1344 01:48:06,720 --> 01:48:09,326 we'd like to express our profound gratitude 1345 01:48:10,160 --> 01:48:11,889 for your help in saving Xandar. 1346 01:48:13,680 --> 01:48:16,411 If you will follow Denarian Dey, 1347 01:48:16,560 --> 01:48:18,164 he has something to show you. 1348 01:48:18,320 --> 01:48:20,084 Thank you, Nova Prime. 1349 01:48:28,680 --> 01:48:33,163 Your wife and child shall rest well knowing that you have avenged them. 1350 01:48:33,680 --> 01:48:34,841 Yes. 1351 01:48:35,000 --> 01:48:36,923 Of course, Ronan was only a puppet. 1352 01:48:37,680 --> 01:48:39,842 It's really Thanos I need to kill. 1353 01:48:42,520 --> 01:48:45,285 We tried to keep it as close to the original as possible. 1354 01:48:45,880 --> 01:48:47,848 We salvaged as much as we could. 1355 01:48:49,160 --> 01:48:50,286 Wow. 1356 01:48:50,960 --> 01:48:51,961 I... 1357 01:48:53,960 --> 01:48:55,086 Thank you. 1358 01:48:56,600 --> 01:48:58,284 I have a family. 1359 01:48:58,800 --> 01:49:00,290 They're alive because of you. 1360 01:49:04,960 --> 01:49:07,327 Your criminal records have also been expunged. 1361 01:49:07,480 --> 01:49:11,485 However, I have to warn you against breaking any laws in the future. 1362 01:49:12,080 --> 01:49:13,081 Question. 1363 01:49:13,240 --> 01:49:14,401 What if I see something that I want to take, 1364 01:49:14,480 --> 01:49:15,811 and it belongs to someone else? 1365 01:49:15,880 --> 01:49:17,166 You will be arrested. 1366 01:49:17,240 --> 01:49:19,481 But what if I want it more than the person who has it? 1367 01:49:19,960 --> 01:49:21,962 - It's still illegal. - That doesn't follow. 1368 01:49:22,120 --> 01:49:23,167 No, I want it more, sir. Do you understand? 1369 01:49:23,720 --> 01:49:24,926 What are you laughing at? 1370 01:49:25,120 --> 01:49:26,565 Why? I can't have a discussion with this gentleman? 1371 01:49:26,640 --> 01:49:28,483 What if someone does something irksome 1372 01:49:28,640 --> 01:49:30,802 and I decide to remove his spine? 1373 01:49:32,400 --> 01:49:33,481 That's... 1374 01:49:34,600 --> 01:49:36,841 That's actually murder. 1375 01:49:38,600 --> 01:49:41,171 It's one of the worst crimes of all. 1376 01:49:41,320 --> 01:49:44,164 So... also illegal. 1377 01:49:44,960 --> 01:49:46,007 Hmm. 1378 01:49:47,760 --> 01:49:48,807 They'll be fine, Dey. 1379 01:49:49,520 --> 01:49:50,681 I'm gonna keep an eye on 'em. 1380 01:49:50,840 --> 01:49:51,841 You? 1381 01:49:55,280 --> 01:49:58,250 Yeah. Me. 1382 01:50:17,240 --> 01:50:18,765 Peter, 1383 01:50:19,360 --> 01:50:22,728 I know these last few months have been hard for you. 1384 01:50:24,000 --> 01:50:26,571 But I'm going to a better place. 1385 01:50:26,760 --> 01:50:29,206 And I will be okay. 1386 01:50:29,360 --> 01:50:33,081 And I will always be with you. 1387 01:50:34,800 --> 01:50:37,485 You are the light of my life. 1388 01:50:37,640 --> 01:50:39,881 My precious son. 1389 01:50:40,840 --> 01:50:43,764 My little Star-Lord. 1390 01:50:44,520 --> 01:50:46,488 Love, Mom. 1391 01:52:47,040 --> 01:52:48,690 So, what should we do next? 1392 01:52:49,000 --> 01:52:50,001 Something good? 1393 01:52:51,040 --> 01:52:52,166 Something bad? 1394 01:52:52,680 --> 01:52:54,330 A bit of both? 1395 01:52:55,920 --> 01:52:58,844 We'll follow your lead, Star-Lord. 1396 01:53:01,120 --> 01:53:02,167 Bit of both. 1397 02:00:26,480 --> 02:00:28,801 What do you let it lick you like that for? 1398 02:00:30,160 --> 02:00:31,685 Gross. 1399 02:00:34,720 --> 02:00:36,210 Yeah! 1400 02:00:36,320 --> 02:00:38,129 But it burns going down. 1401 02:00:43,422 --> 02:00:46,455 Provided by bhoie_t 1402 02:00:46,455 --> 02:00:48,019 Modify by Blue-Birdâ¢

subtitles.subtitles:
ï»¿1
00:00:35,080 --> 00:00:36,120
Peter.

2
00:00:37,520 --> 00:00:40,560
Your momma wants to speak with you.

3
00:00:43,120 --> 00:00:46,800
Come on, Pete.
Take these fool things off.

4
00:01:20,680 --> 00:01:23,840
Why have you been fighting
with the other boys again, baby?

5
00:01:26,480 --> 00:01:27,680
Peter?

6
00:01:28,280 --> 00:01:31,440
They killed a little frog
that ain't done nothing.

7
00:01:32,160 --> 00:01:34,560
Smushed it with a stick.

8
00:01:35,800 --> 00:01:38,320
You're so like your daddy.

9
00:01:39,200 --> 00:01:40,840
You even look like him.

10
00:01:42,320 --> 00:01:44,320
And he was an angel.

11
00:01:45,680 --> 00:01:48,400
-Composed out of pure light.
-Mer?

12
00:01:48,520 --> 00:01:50,480
You got a present there for Peter,
don't you?

13
00:01:52,400 --> 00:01:53,880
Of course.

14
00:01:57,200 --> 00:01:58,320
There.

15
00:01:59,880 --> 00:02:01,720
I've got you covered, Pete.

16
00:02:06,200 --> 00:02:08,120
You open it up when I'm gone, okay?

17
00:02:10,400 --> 00:02:12,200
-Your grandpa...
-

18
00:02:13,120 --> 00:02:15,640
...is gonna take such good care of you.

19
00:02:15,760 --> 00:02:19,600
At least until your daddy
comes back to get you.

20
00:02:23,480 --> 00:02:24,480
Take my hand.

21
00:02:28,440 --> 00:02:29,680
Peter.

22
00:02:31,320 --> 00:02:32,360
-Pete, come on.

23
00:02:32,640 --> 00:02:34,440
Take my hand.

24
00:02:40,480 --> 00:02:41,520
PETER: Mom?

25
00:02:41,920 --> 00:02:44,800
No! No! No! No!

26
00:02:44,920 --> 00:02:46,360
Mom! No!

27
00:02:46,480 --> 00:02:47,920
-Come with me.
-No!

28
00:02:48,200 --> 00:02:49,800
No!

29
00:02:50,480 --> 00:02:51,760
You've got to stay here. Please.

30
00:02:52,400 --> 00:02:53,360
No...

31
00:02:54,640 --> 00:02:56,240
Okay?

32
00:03:15,520 --> 00:03:16,720
No.

33
00:03:33,320 --> 00:03:34,960
Mom!

34
00:08:25,240 --> 00:08:26,640
Drop it!

35
00:08:26,920 --> 00:08:28,080
Uh, hey.

36
00:08:29,720 --> 00:08:31,880
-Drop it, now!
-Hey, cool, man. No problem.

37
00:08:31,960 --> 00:08:33,960
No problem at all.

38
00:08:34,840 --> 00:08:36,280
How do you know about this?

39
00:08:36,520 --> 00:08:37,960
PETER: I don't even know what that is.

40
00:08:38,080 --> 00:08:40,640
I'm just a junker, man.
I was just checking stuff out.

41
00:08:40,880 --> 00:08:43,120
You don't look like a junker.
You're wearing Ravager garb.

42
00:08:43,280 --> 00:08:44,640
This is just an outfit, man.

43
00:08:44,720 --> 00:08:46,080
Ninja Turtle, you better stop poking me.

44
00:08:46,200 --> 00:08:47,200
What is your name?

45
00:08:47,280 --> 00:08:49,280
My name is Peter Quill, okay?
Dude, chill out.

46
00:08:49,760 --> 00:08:51,080
-Move!
-Why?

47
00:08:51,160 --> 00:08:53,120
Ronan may have questions for you.

48
00:08:53,680 --> 00:08:54,720
PETER: Hey, you know what?

49
00:08:54,840 --> 00:08:56,960
There's another name
you might know me by.

50
00:08:58,680 --> 00:09:00,640
Star-Lord.

51
00:09:00,920 --> 00:09:01,920
Who?

52
00:09:02,000 --> 00:09:04,200
Star-Lord, man. Legendary outlaw.

53
00:09:05,680 --> 00:09:07,800
-Guys?
-Move!

54
00:09:08,760 --> 00:09:10,880
Ah, forget this.

55
00:11:01,760 --> 00:11:03,160
WOMAN: Peter?

56
00:11:07,120 --> 00:11:08,120
What happened?

57
00:11:08,920 --> 00:11:10,680
Hey, uh...

58
00:11:10,760 --> 00:11:12,800
Uh... I...

59
00:11:13,760 --> 00:11:15,440
-Bereet.
-Bereet!

60
00:11:15,760 --> 00:11:18,080
Look, I'm gonna be totally honest
with you. I forgot you're here.

61
00:11:42,040 --> 00:11:43,720
REPORTER ON TV:
Scattered riots broke out

62
00:11:43,800 --> 00:11:45,200
across the Kree Empire today

63
00:11:45,280 --> 00:11:48,880
protesting the recent peace treaty
signed by the Kree Emperor

64
00:11:48,960 --> 00:11:51,280
and Xandar's Nova Prime.

65
00:11:53,880 --> 00:11:55,240
Peter, you have call.

66
00:11:56,120 --> 00:11:57,840
-No, wait, don't!
-Quill?

67
00:12:00,240 --> 00:12:01,480
Hey, Yondu.

68
00:12:01,800 --> 00:12:03,800
I'm here on Morag.

69
00:12:03,920 --> 00:12:05,040
Ain't no Orb, ain't no you.

70
00:12:05,120 --> 00:12:07,280
Well, I was in the neighborhood.
I thought I'd save you the hassle.

71
00:12:07,360 --> 00:12:08,760
Well, where are you at now, boy?

72
00:12:08,840 --> 00:12:11,320
I feel really bad about this,
but I'm not gonna tell you that.

73
00:12:11,400 --> 00:12:14,000
-I slaved putting this deal together.
-Slaved?

74
00:12:14,080 --> 00:12:15,120
Making a few calls is "slaved"?
I mean, really?

75
00:12:15,200 --> 00:12:16,200
And now you're gonna rip me off!

76
00:12:16,320 --> 00:12:19,880
We do not do that to each other.
We're Ravagers. We got a code.

77
00:12:20,000 --> 00:12:22,720
Yeah, and that code is
"steal from everybody."

78
00:12:22,840 --> 00:12:24,120
When I picked you up on Terra...

79
00:12:24,200 --> 00:12:25,200
"Picked me up."

80
00:12:25,320 --> 00:12:26,240
...these boys of mine
wanted to eat you.

81
00:12:26,320 --> 00:12:27,320
Yeah?

82
00:12:27,400 --> 00:12:28,840
They ain't never tasted
any Terran before.

83
00:12:28,960 --> 00:12:31,120
I stopped them.
You're alive because of me!

84
00:12:31,200 --> 00:12:32,400
I will find you, I will...

85
00:12:33,200 --> 00:12:34,880
Put a bounty on him!

86
00:12:35,360 --> 00:12:36,520
Forty K.

87
00:12:36,800 --> 00:12:38,240
-But I want him back alive.
-Yeah, Cap.

88
00:12:38,320 --> 00:12:39,920
-Alive?
-That's what I said.

89
00:12:40,000 --> 00:12:41,280
I told you when you picked that kid up,

90
00:12:41,400 --> 00:12:43,360
you should have delivered him
like we was hired to do!

91
00:12:43,480 --> 00:12:45,080
He was cargo!

92
00:12:45,200 --> 00:12:46,880
You have always been soft on him.

93
00:12:46,960 --> 00:12:49,400
You're the only one I'm being soft on!

94
00:12:50,000 --> 00:12:52,360
Now, don't you worry about Mr. Quill.

95
00:12:52,960 --> 00:12:54,960
As soon as we get him back here,

96
00:12:55,400 --> 00:12:57,920
I'm gonna kill him myself.

97
00:12:58,240 --> 00:12:59,520
What we do need to worry about,

98
00:13:01,040 --> 00:13:03,360
is who else out there wants that Orb!

99
00:13:23,880 --> 00:13:26,080
RONAN: They call me "terrorist,"

100
00:13:26,800 --> 00:13:29,320
"radical," "zealot,"

101
00:13:30,200 --> 00:13:33,320
because I obey the ancient laws
of my people, the Kree,

102
00:13:34,240 --> 00:13:37,520
and punish those who do not.

103
00:13:37,840 --> 00:13:40,920
Because I do not forgive your people

104
00:13:41,040 --> 00:13:43,440
for taking the life of my father,

105
00:13:44,120 --> 00:13:47,480
and his father,
and his father before him.

106
00:13:48,880 --> 00:13:53,360
A thousand years of war between us
will not be forgotten!

107
00:13:53,920 --> 00:13:56,600
XANDARIAN: You can't do this!
Our government signed a peace treaty.

108
00:13:57,920 --> 00:14:00,160
RONAN: My government
knows no shame.

109
00:14:01,240 --> 00:14:04,080
You Xandarians and your culture
are a disease.

110
00:14:05,440 --> 00:14:06,440
You

111
00:14:06,560 --> 00:14:08,960
will never rule Xandar.

112
00:14:09,040 --> 00:14:10,080
No.

113
00:14:10,960 --> 00:14:13,120
I will cure it!

114
00:14:26,280 --> 00:14:27,320
Ronan,

115
00:14:27,440 --> 00:14:29,320
Korath has returned.

116
00:14:29,440 --> 00:14:32,280
KORATH: Master, he is a thief,

117
00:14:32,880 --> 00:14:34,920
an outlaw who calls himself Star-Lord.

118
00:14:35,000 --> 00:14:37,400
But we have discovered
he has an agreement

119
00:14:37,520 --> 00:14:40,320
to retrieve the Orb
for an intermediary known

120
00:14:40,480 --> 00:14:42,040
as The Broker.

121
00:14:42,120 --> 00:14:45,520
I promised Thanos
I would retrieve the Orb for him.

122
00:14:45,600 --> 00:14:48,240
Only then will he destroy Xandar for me.

123
00:14:49,200 --> 00:14:52,480
Nebula, go to Xandar
and get me the Orb.

124
00:14:53,320 --> 00:14:54,440
It will be my honor.

125
00:14:54,520 --> 00:14:55,560
It will be your doom.

126
00:14:57,040 --> 00:14:59,360
If this happens again,
you'll be facing our father

127
00:14:59,480 --> 00:15:01,240
without his prize.

128
00:15:01,320 --> 00:15:02,960
I'm a daughter of Thanos.

129
00:15:03,360 --> 00:15:04,480
Just like you.

130
00:15:04,560 --> 00:15:06,000
But I know Xandar.

131
00:15:06,120 --> 00:15:07,640
Ronan has already decreed that I...

132
00:15:07,960 --> 00:15:08,960
Do not speak for me.

133
00:15:11,320 --> 00:15:13,320
You will not fail.

134
00:15:17,160 --> 00:15:18,640
Have I ever?

135
00:15:34,200 --> 00:15:35,520
ROCKET: Xandarians.

136
00:15:35,640 --> 00:15:38,000
What a bunch of losers.

137
00:15:38,080 --> 00:15:42,400
All of them in a big hurry
to get from something stupid,

138
00:15:42,600 --> 00:15:44,520
to nothing at all. Pathetic.

139
00:15:45,080 --> 00:15:46,080
Look at this guy!

140
00:15:46,160 --> 00:15:47,600
Can you believe they call us criminals,

141
00:15:47,680 --> 00:15:49,600
when he's assaulting us
with that haircut?

142
00:15:50,200 --> 00:15:53,040
What is this thing?
Look how it thinks it's so cool.

143
00:15:53,120 --> 00:15:56,560
It's not cool to get help!
Walk by yourself, you little gargoyle.

144
00:15:56,720 --> 00:15:58,640
-Look at Mr. Smiles over here.
-

145
00:15:59,360 --> 00:16:03,120
Where's your wife, old man?
What a class-A prevert.

146
00:16:03,440 --> 00:16:05,280
Right, Groot?

147
00:16:05,720 --> 00:16:06,960
Groot?

148
00:16:07,040 --> 00:16:08,720
Don't drink fountain water, you idiot.

149
00:16:09,040 --> 00:16:11,200
-That's disgusting!
-Mmm.

150
00:16:11,560 --> 00:16:13,480
Yes, you did. I just saw you doing it.

151
00:16:13,560 --> 00:16:14,680
Why are you lying?

152
00:16:14,960 --> 00:16:16,240
-Whoop.

153
00:16:18,320 --> 00:16:20,320
Looks like we got one.

154
00:16:20,440 --> 00:16:24,440
Okay, humie, how bad
does someone wanna find you?

155
00:16:26,040 --> 00:16:30,160
40,000 units?
Groot, we're gonna be rich.

156
00:16:44,160 --> 00:16:45,440
-Mr. Quill.
-Broker.

157
00:16:46,720 --> 00:16:47,720
The Orb.

158
00:16:49,600 --> 00:16:51,760
-As commissioned.
-Where's Yondu?

159
00:16:52,040 --> 00:16:53,600
Wanted to be here. Sends his love.

160
00:16:53,720 --> 00:16:54,720
And told me to tell you,

161
00:16:55,000 --> 00:16:57,200
that you got the best eyebrows
in the business.

162
00:16:59,360 --> 00:17:00,400
What is it?

163
00:17:01,200 --> 00:17:04,480
It's my policy never to discuss
my clients, or their needs.

164
00:17:04,560 --> 00:17:06,560
Yeah, well, I almost died
getting it for you.

165
00:17:06,640 --> 00:17:09,600
An occupational hazard,
I'm sure, in your line of work.

166
00:17:10,360 --> 00:17:12,560
Some machine-headed freak,
working for a dude named Ronan.

167
00:17:14,120 --> 00:17:16,040
Ronan? I'm sorry, Mr. Quill.

168
00:17:16,120 --> 00:17:17,160
I truly am.

169
00:17:17,240 --> 00:17:18,800
But I want no part of this transaction

170
00:17:19,040 --> 00:17:20,800
-if Ronan is involved.
-Whoa, whoa, whoa!

171
00:17:21,800 --> 00:17:23,120
Who's Ronan?

172
00:17:23,240 --> 00:17:26,400
A Kree fanatic,
outraged by the peace treaty,

173
00:17:26,520 --> 00:17:30,760
who will not rest
until Xandarian culture, my culture,

174
00:17:31,040 --> 00:17:32,160
-is wiped from existence!
-Whoa, whoa!

175
00:17:32,240 --> 00:17:33,560
-Come on.
-He's someone

176
00:17:33,680 --> 00:17:35,120
whose bad side I'd rather not be on.

177
00:17:35,280 --> 00:17:36,800
What? What about my bad side?

178
00:17:37,080 --> 00:17:38,320
Farewell, Mr. Quill.

179
00:17:40,520 --> 00:17:42,120
Hey, we had a deal, bro!

180
00:17:48,160 --> 00:17:49,200
What happened?

181
00:17:51,400 --> 00:17:54,320
Ah, this guy just backed out of a deal
on me.

182
00:17:54,480 --> 00:17:56,520
If there's one thing I hate,
it's a man without integrity.

183
00:17:56,640 --> 00:17:58,400
Peter Quill. People call me Star-Lord.

184
00:17:59,840 --> 00:18:02,200
You have the bearing of a man of honor.

185
00:18:02,320 --> 00:18:04,400
