Hold on! 663 00:53:57,399 --> 00:53:59,568 Keep calling me vermin, tough guy! 664 00:53:59,668 --> 00:54:01,737 You just wanna laugh at me like everyone else! 665 00:54:01,837 --> 00:54:04,440 Rocket, you're drunk. All right? No one's laughing at you. 666 00:54:04,540 --> 00:54:07,309 He thinks I'm some stupid thing! He does! 667 00:54:07,409 --> 00:54:09,812 Well, I didn't ask to get made! 668 00:54:09,912 --> 00:54:11,981 I didn't ask to be torn apart, 669 00:54:12,081 --> 00:54:14,083 and put back together, over and over 670 00:54:14,183 --> 00:54:16,452 and turned into some... 671 00:54:16,552 --> 00:54:17,620 Some little monster! 672 00:54:17,720 --> 00:54:19,688 Rocket, no one's calling you a monster. 673 00:54:19,788 --> 00:54:21,957 He called me "vermin"! 674 00:54:22,057 --> 00:54:24,727 She called me "rodent"! 675 00:54:24,827 --> 00:54:26,162 Let's see if you can laugh 676 00:54:26,262 --> 00:54:29,398 after five or six good shots to your frickin' face! 677 00:54:29,498 --> 00:54:33,302 No, no, no, no! Four billion units! Rocket! 678 00:54:33,402 --> 00:54:37,696 Come on, man. Hey! Suck it up for one more lousy night and you're rich. 679 00:54:45,881 --> 00:54:48,231 Fine. But I can't promise, 680 00:54:48,332 --> 00:54:50,886 when all this is over I'm not gonna kill every last one of you jerks. 681 00:54:50,986 --> 00:54:54,944 See? That's exactly why none of you have any friends! 682 00:54:55,090 --> 00:54:57,726 Five seconds after you meet somebody, you're already trying to kill them! 683 00:54:57,826 --> 00:55:01,830 We have travelled, halfway across the quadrant. 684 00:55:01,930 --> 00:55:04,398 And Ronan is no closer to being dead. 685 00:55:06,335 --> 00:55:08,437 - Drax! - Let him go. 686 00:55:08,537 --> 00:55:10,197 We don't need him. 687 00:55:12,308 --> 00:55:14,243 Milady Gamora. 688 00:55:14,343 --> 00:55:16,606 I'm here to fetch you for my master. 689 00:55:22,451 --> 00:55:24,753 Okay, this isn't creepy at all. 690 00:55:24,853 --> 00:55:28,151 We house the galaxy's largest collection 691 00:55:28,390 --> 00:55:31,290 of fauna, relics, and species of all manner. 692 00:55:37,499 --> 00:55:39,101 I present to you, 693 00:55:39,201 --> 00:55:43,296 Taneleer Tivan, The Collector. 694 00:55:56,652 --> 00:55:59,245 Oh, my dear Gamora. 695 00:55:59,588 --> 00:56:02,091 How wonderful to meet in the flesh. 696 00:56:02,191 --> 00:56:05,094 Let's bypass the formalities, Tivan. 697 00:56:05,194 --> 00:56:08,128 We have what we discussed. 698 00:56:08,530 --> 00:56:13,235 What is that thing there? 699 00:56:13,335 --> 00:56:15,496 I am Groot. 700 00:56:19,141 --> 00:56:20,843 I never thought I'd meet a Groot. 701 00:56:20,943 --> 00:56:22,842 Sir... 702 00:56:23,112 --> 00:56:26,415 You must allow me to pay you now so that I may own your carcass. 703 00:56:26,515 --> 00:56:29,451 At the moment of your death, of course. 704 00:56:29,551 --> 00:56:30,853 I am Groot. 705 00:56:30,953 --> 00:56:33,722 Why, so he could turn you into a frickin' chair? 706 00:56:33,822 --> 00:56:35,289 That's your pet? 707 00:56:36,158 --> 00:56:38,250 - His what? - Tivan. 708 00:56:38,394 --> 00:56:42,231 We have been halfway around the galaxy, retrieving this Orb. 709 00:56:42,331 --> 00:56:44,433 Very well, then. 710 00:56:44,533 --> 00:56:47,501 Let us see what you brought. 711 00:57:00,707 --> 00:57:03,510 Three quarnyx batteries, seven cases of Cotati seeds. 712 00:57:03,610 --> 00:57:07,409 No, cases. Last time, you sent me... 713 00:57:08,548 --> 00:57:11,785 You shall send a message for me. 714 00:57:11,885 --> 00:57:13,818 Oh, my new friends. 715 00:57:14,687 --> 00:57:17,891 Before creation itself, 716 00:57:17,991 --> 00:57:20,152 there were six singularities. 717 00:57:21,961 --> 00:57:25,732 Then the universe exploded into existence, 718 00:57:25,832 --> 00:57:27,934 and the remnants of these systems 719 00:57:28,034 --> 00:57:31,935 were forged into concentrated ingots. 720 00:57:32,205 --> 00:57:34,969 Infinity Stones. 721 00:57:35,675 --> 00:57:37,210 These stones, it seems, 722 00:57:37,310 --> 00:57:39,179 can only be brandished 723 00:57:39,279 --> 00:57:42,816 by beings of extraordinary strength. 724 00:57:42,916 --> 00:57:44,405 Observe. 725 00:57:47,187 --> 00:57:52,993 These carriers can use the Stone to mow down entire civilizations 726 00:57:53,093 --> 00:57:57,051 like wheat in a field. 727 00:57:58,098 --> 00:58:00,828 There's a little pee coming out of me right now. 728 00:58:01,167 --> 00:58:02,469 Once, for a moment, 729 00:58:02,569 --> 00:58:06,673 a group was able to share the energy amongst themselves, 730 00:58:06,773 --> 00:58:10,208 but even they were quickly destroyed by it. 731 00:58:15,915 --> 00:58:18,076 Beautiful. 732 00:58:19,419 --> 00:58:22,353 Beyond compare. 733 00:58:24,057 --> 00:58:28,186 We're all very fascinated, whitey. But we'd like to get paid. 734 00:58:29,629 --> 00:58:31,097 How would you like to get paid? 735 00:58:31,197 --> 00:58:33,688 What do you think, fancy man? Units! 736 00:58:34,667 --> 00:58:36,225 Very well, then. 737 00:58:41,374 --> 00:58:42,976 Carina. 738 00:58:43,076 --> 00:58:44,543 Stand back. 739 00:58:44,711 --> 00:58:47,414 I will no longer be your slave! 740 00:58:47,514 --> 00:58:49,447 No! 741 00:59:36,296 --> 00:59:37,820 What the... 742 00:59:46,807 --> 00:59:49,609 How could I think Tivan could contain whatever was within the Orb? 743 00:59:49,709 --> 00:59:53,213 - What do you still have it for? - What are we gonna do, leave it in there? 744 00:59:53,313 --> 00:59:57,183 - I can't believe you had that in your purse! - It's not a purse, it's a knapsack! 745 00:59:57,283 --> 01:00:00,954 We have to bring this to the Nova Corps. There's a chance they can contain it. 746 01:00:01,054 --> 01:00:03,858 Are you kidding me? We're wanted by the Nova Corps. 747 01:00:03,959 --> 01:00:06,493 - Just give it to Ronan! - So he can destroy the galaxy? 748 01:00:06,593 --> 01:00:08,394 What are you, some saint all of a sudden? 749 01:00:08,494 --> 01:00:11,498 What has the galaxy ever done for you? Why would you wanna save it? 750 01:00:11,598 --> 01:00:13,399 Because I'm one of the idiots who lives in it! 751 01:00:13,499 --> 01:00:18,271 Peter, listen to me. We cannot allow the Stone to fall into Ronan's hands. 752 01:00:18,371 --> 01:00:21,708 We have to go back to your ship, and deliver it to Nova. 753 01:00:21,808 --> 01:00:24,640 Right, right, okay. I think you're right. 754 01:00:24,978 --> 01:00:28,948 Or we could give it to somebody who's not going to arrest us, 755 01:00:29,048 --> 01:00:32,218 who's really nice for a whole lot of money. 756 01:00:32,318 --> 01:00:34,854 I think it's a really good balance between both of your points of view. 757 01:00:34,954 --> 01:00:38,123 You're despicable. Dishonorable. 758 01:00:38,291 --> 01:00:39,758 Faithless! 759 01:00:40,026 --> 01:00:42,016 - No. - At last! 760 01:00:44,097 --> 01:00:46,666 I shall meet my foe and destroy him. 761 01:00:46,766 --> 01:00:48,927 You called Ronan? 762 01:00:53,339 --> 01:00:56,831 Quill! Don't you move, boy! 763 01:00:57,543 --> 01:01:00,102 Don't you move! Get out of the way! 764 01:01:03,583 --> 01:01:05,985 Ronan the Accuser! 765 01:01:06,085 --> 01:01:08,621 You are the one who transmitted the message? 766 01:01:08,721 --> 01:01:10,483 You killed my wife. 767 01:01:10,957 --> 01:01:13,220 You killed my daughter! 768 01:01:20,266 --> 01:01:24,532 I told you, you can't fit. Now, wait here. I'll be back. 769 01:01:29,709 --> 01:01:33,508 It is Gamora. She is escaping with the Orb. 770 01:01:41,821 --> 01:01:43,489 No! 771 01:01:43,589 --> 01:01:45,056 Nebula, 772 01:01:45,425 --> 01:01:47,517 retrieve the Orb. 773 01:02:03,576 --> 01:02:05,941 The Stone is in the furthest pod. 774 01:02:06,179 --> 01:02:07,907 Bring it down! 775 01:02:36,042 --> 01:02:39,245 Rocket, keep them off Gamora until she gets to the Milano. 776 01:02:39,345 --> 01:02:41,781 How? We've got no weaponry on these things. 777 01:02:41,881 --> 01:02:43,716 These pods are industrial grade. 778 01:02:43,816 --> 01:02:45,018 They're nearly indestructible. 779 01:02:45,118 --> 01:02:47,720 Not against necroblasts, they're not. 780 01:02:47,820 --> 01:02:49,844 That's not what I'm saying. 781 01:03:37,904 --> 01:03:40,031 Let me borrow your ride. 782 01:04:12,371 --> 01:04:14,634 I don't recall killing your family. 783 01:04:17,477 --> 01:04:21,344 I doubt I'll remember killing you, either. 784 01:04:37,497 --> 01:04:40,795 Quill, I'm trapped. I can't make it to the Milano. 785 01:04:40,967 --> 01:04:42,434 I have to head out. 786 01:04:44,470 --> 01:04:46,904 Wait! These things aren't meant to go out there. 787 01:04:53,479 --> 01:04:55,810 You are a disappointment, sister. 788 01:04:56,148 --> 01:04:58,548 Of all our siblings, 789 01:04:58,918 --> 01:05:00,820 I hated you least. 790 01:05:00,920 --> 01:05:02,188 Nebula, please. 791 01:05:02,288 --> 01:05:04,223 If Ronan gets this stone 792 01:05:04,323 --> 01:05:06,518 - he'll kill us all. - Not all. 793 01:05:07,793 --> 01:05:09,920 You will already be dead. 794 01:06:03,983 --> 01:06:07,418 Ronan, it is done. 795 01:06:10,022 --> 01:06:11,511 Quill, come on. 796 01:06:11,624 --> 01:06:14,160 Her body mods should keep her alive a couple more minutes, 797 01:06:14,260 --> 01:06:16,329 but there's nothing we can do for her. 798 01:06:16,429 --> 01:06:17,997 These pods aren't meant to be out here. 799 01:06:18,097 --> 01:06:20,963 In a second, we're gonna be in the same boat. 800 01:06:28,040 --> 01:06:30,770 Damn it. 801 01:06:31,644 --> 01:06:33,145 Quill? 802 01:06:33,245 --> 01:06:35,281 Yondu! Yondu. 803 01:06:35,381 --> 01:06:36,415 This is Quill! 804 01:06:36,515 --> 01:06:40,186 - My coordinates are 227 K324. - Quill. 805 01:06:40,286 --> 01:06:41,521 Quill, what are you doing? 806 01:06:41,621 --> 01:06:43,122 Just outside Knowhere. 807 01:06:43,222 --> 01:06:45,815 If you're there, come get me. 808 01:06:46,058 --> 01:06:48,025 I'm all yours. 809 01:06:57,003 --> 01:06:59,437 Quill, don't be ridiculous. 810 01:07:00,573 --> 01:07:02,975 Get back into your pod! 811 01:07:03,075 --> 01:07:06,601 You can't fit two people in there. You're gonna die. 812 01:07:07,346 --> 01:07:09,448 You'll die in seconds! 813 01:07:09,548 --> 01:07:11,140 Quill. 814 01:08:11,744 --> 01:08:13,905 Quill? 815 01:08:15,081 --> 01:08:17,014 What happened? 816 01:08:17,717 --> 01:08:20,208 I saw you out there. 817 01:08:21,187 --> 01:08:24,121 I don't know what came over me. 818 01:08:24,623 --> 01:08:26,886 But I couldn't let you die. 819 01:08:29,261 --> 01:08:32,161 I found something inside of myself. 820 01:08:32,732 --> 01:08:34,367 Something 821 01:08:34,467 --> 01:08:36,867 incredibly heroic. 822 01:08:38,170 --> 01:08:40,773 I mean, not to brag, 823 01:08:40,873 --> 01:08:42,141 but, objectively... 824 01:08:42,241 --> 01:08:43,730 Where's the Orb? 825 01:08:45,144 --> 01:08:47,446 It's... Well, they got the Orb. 826 01:08:47,546 --> 01:08:49,035 What? 827 01:08:51,317 --> 01:08:54,217 Welcome home, Peter. 828 01:09:16,642 --> 01:09:19,872 Blasted idiot. They're all idiots! 829 01:09:20,746 --> 01:09:23,049 Quill just got himself captured. 830 01:09:23,149 --> 01:09:27,520 None of this ever would have happened if you didn't try to single-handedly 831 01:09:27,620 --> 01:09:29,314 take on a frickin' army! 832 01:09:30,623 --> 01:09:32,283 You're right. 833 01:09:34,527 --> 01:09:37,086 I was a fool. 834 01:09:39,098 --> 01:09:41,259 All the anger, 835 01:09:41,467 --> 01:09:43,764 all the rage, 836 01:09:46,472 --> 01:09:49,236 was just to cover my loss. 837 01:09:57,383 --> 01:10:00,181 "My wife and child are dead." 838 01:10:01,253 --> 01:10:03,522 I don't care if it's mean! 839 01:10:03,622 --> 01:10:05,953 Everybody's got dead people. 840 01:10:06,158 --> 01:10:07,893 It's no excuse to get everybody else 841 01:10:07,993 --> 01:10:10,358 dead along the way! 842 01:10:13,732 --> 01:10:16,469 Come on, Groot. Ronan has the Stone. 843 01:10:16,569 --> 01:10:19,772 The only chance we got is to get to the other side of the universe 844 01:10:19,872 --> 01:10:21,841 as fast as we can and maybe, 845 01:10:21,941 --> 01:10:27,037 just maybe, we'll be able to live full lives before that whack-job ever gets there. 846 01:10:29,048 --> 01:10:30,449 I am Groot. 847 01:10:30,549 --> 01:10:32,918 Save them? How? 848 01:10:33,018 --> 01:10:35,855 I am Groot. 849 01:10:35,955 --> 01:10:38,591 I know they're the only friends that we ever had, 850 01:10:38,691 --> 01:10:41,494 but there's an army of Ravagers around them. 851 01:10:41,594 --> 01:10:43,652 And there's only two of us! 852 01:10:44,230 --> 01:10:45,958 Three. 853 01:10:54,573 --> 01:10:56,876 You're making me 854 01:10:56,976 --> 01:10:58,611 beat... up 855 01:10:58,711 --> 01:11:00,178 grass! 856 01:11:02,248 --> 01:11:04,443 The Orb is in my possession, 857 01:11:05,084 --> 01:11:06,652 as I promised. 858 01:11:06,752 --> 01:11:08,387 Bring it to me. 859 01:11:08,487 --> 01:11:12,252 Yes, that was our agreement. 860 01:11:12,524 --> 01:11:14,260 Bring you the Orb, 861 01:11:14,360 --> 01:11:17,963 and you will destroy Xandar for me. 862 01:11:18,063 --> 01:11:22,668 However, now that I know it contains an Infinity Stone, 863 01:11:22,768 --> 01:11:24,870 I wonder what use I have for you. 864 01:11:24,970 --> 01:11:26,705 Boy, 865 01:11:26,805 --> 01:11:29,671 I would reconsider your current course. 866 01:11:30,376 --> 01:11:32,711 Master! You cannot! 867 01:11:32,811 --> 01:11:35,779 Thanos is the most powerful being in the universe. 868 01:11:35,915 --> 01:11:38,042 Not anymore. 869 01:12:00,406 --> 01:12:02,741 You call me "boy!" 870 01:12:02,841 --> 01:12:07,446 I will unfurl 1,000 years of Kree justice on Xandar, 871 01:12:07,546 --> 01:12:11,116 and burn it to its core! 872 01:12:11,216 --> 01:12:13,219 Then, Thanos, 873 01:12:13,319 --> 01:12:15,753 I am coming for you. 874 01:12:17,656 --> 01:12:20,960 After Xandar, you are going to kill my father? 875 01:12:21,060 --> 01:12:22,962 You dare to oppose me? 876 01:12:23,062 --> 01:12:24,864 You see what he has turned me into. 877 01:12:24,964 --> 01:12:29,696 If you kill him, I will help you destroy a thousand planets. 878 01:12:30,002 --> 01:12:31,969 You betray me? 879 01:12:32,438 --> 01:12:33,472 Steal my money? 880 01:12:33,572 --> 01:12:35,474 Stop it! Leave him alone! 881 01:12:35,574 --> 01:12:37,710 When I picked you up as a kid, 882 01:12:37,810 --> 01:12:40,212 these boys wanted to eat you. 883 01:12:40,312 --> 01:12:42,815 They ain't never tasted Terran before. 884 01:12:42,915 --> 01:12:44,583 I saved your life! 885 01:12:44,683 --> 01:12:46,919 Will you shut up about that? God! 886 01:12:47,019 --> 01:12:49,321 Twenty years, you been throwing that in my face, 887 01:12:49,421 --> 01:12:52,124 like it's some great thing, not eating me. 888 01:12:52,224 --> 01:12:55,861 Normal people don't even think about eating someone else! 889 01:12:55,961 --> 01:12:58,497 Much less that person having to be grateful for it! 890 01:12:58,597 --> 01:13:00,155 You abducted me, man. 891 01:13:00,733 --> 01:13:03,035 You stole me from my home and from my family. 892 01:13:03,135 --> 01:13:05,671 You don't give a damn about your Terra! 893 01:13:05,771 --> 01:13:06,839 You're scared 894 01:13:06,939 --> 01:13:09,041 because you're soft in here. 895 01:13:09,141 --> 01:13:10,476 Here, right here! 896 01:13:10,576 --> 01:13:11,644 Yondu! 897 01:13:11,744 --> 01:13:12,945 Listen to me. 898 01:13:13,045 --> 01:13:15,281 Ronan has something called an Infinity Stone. 899 01:13:15,381 --> 01:13:17,316 I know what he's got, girl. 900 01:13:17,416 --> 01:13:19,752 Then you know we must get it back! 901 01:13:19,852 --> 01:13:23,322 He's gonna use it to wipe out Xandar. 902 01:13:23,422 --> 01:13:26,425 We have to warn them. Billions of people will perish. 903 01:13:26,525 --> 01:13:29,161 Is that what she's been filling your head with, boy? 904 01:13:29,261 --> 01:13:30,728 Sentiment? 905 01:13:31,764 --> 01:13:34,027 Eating away your brain like maggots! 906 01:13:38,337 --> 01:13:40,202 That's it. 907 01:13:40,406 --> 01:13:41,807 No! 908 01:13:41,907 --> 01:13:43,075 Sorry, boy. 909 01:13:43,175 --> 01:13:46,745 But a captain's gotta teach his men what happens to those what cross him. 910 01:13:46,845 --> 01:13:48,573 Captain's gotta teach stuff! 911 01:13:50,949 --> 01:13:53,252 If you kill me now, 912 01:13:53,352 --> 01:13:57,879 you are saying goodbye to the biggest score you have ever seen. 913 01:14:02,594 --> 01:14:04,493 The Stone? 914 01:14:04,797 --> 01:14:06,799 I hope you got something better than that. 915 01:14:06,899 --> 01:14:09,993 Because ain't nobody stealing from Ronan. 916 01:14:10,736 --> 01:14:12,104 We got a ringer. 917 01:14:12,204 --> 01:14:14,103 Is that right? 918 01:14:14,773 --> 01:14:17,209 She knows everything there is to know about Ronan. 919 01:14:17,309 --> 01:14:18,610 His ships, 920 01:14:18,710 --> 01:14:20,312 his army. 921 01:14:20,412 --> 01:14:22,709 He's vulnerable. 922 01:14:23,048 --> 01:14:24,350 Hey, what do you say, Yondu? 923 01:14:24,450 --> 01:14:28,477 Me and you, taking down a mark side-by-side, like the old days. 924 01:14:35,727 --> 01:14:37,251 Let him go! 925 01:14:38,530 --> 01:14:41,133 You always did have a scrote, boy! 926 01:14:41,233 --> 01:14:44,429 That's why I kept you on as a young'un. 927 01:14:52,244 --> 01:14:54,279 Captain, the shot was non-damaging. 928 01:14:54,379 --> 01:14:57,040 Attention, idiots. 929 01:14:58,684 --> 01:15:02,521 The lunatic on top of this craft is holding a Hadron Enforcer. 930 01:15:02,621 --> 01:15:04,390 It's a weapon of my own design. 931 01:15:04,490 --> 01:15:05,991 What the hell? 932 01:15:06,091 --> 01:15:08,861 If you don't hand over our companions now, 933 01:15:08,961 --> 01:15:11,330 he's gonna tear your ship a new one. 934 01:15:11,430 --> 01:15:13,265 A very big new one! 935 01:15:13,365 --> 01:15:16,635 - I ain't buyin' it. - I'm giving you to the count of five. 936 01:15:16,735 --> 01:15:19,905 - 5, 4, 3... - No! Wait, hold on! 937 01:15:20,005 --> 01:15:21,840 Rocket, it's me, for God sakes! 938 01:15:21,940 --> 01:15:24,009 We figured it out! We're fine! 939 01:15:24,109 --> 01:15:25,769 Hey, Quill. What's going on? 940 01:15:27,212 --> 01:15:28,847 You call that "figured it out"? 941 01:15:28,947 --> 01:15:31,316 We're gonna rob the guys who just beat us senseless. 942 01:15:31,416 --> 01:15:32,851 You want to talk about senseless? 943 01:15:32,951 --> 01:15:35,220 How about trying to save us by blowing us up? 944 01:15:35,320 --> 01:15:38,157 We were only gonna blow you up if they didn't turn you over! 945 01:15:38,257 --> 01:15:40,125 And how on earth were they gonna turn us over 946 01:15:40,225 --> 01:15:41,760 when you only gave them a count of five? 947 01:15:41,860 --> 01:15:45,364 We didn't have time to work out the minutiae of the plan. 948 01:15:45,464 --> 01:15:47,733 This is what we get for acting altruistically. 949 01:15:47,833 --> 01:15:50,002 - I am Groot. - They are ungrateful. 950 01:15:50,102 --> 01:15:54,173 What's important now is we get the Ravagers' army to help us save Xandar. 951 01:15:54,473 --> 01:15:58,043 So we can give the Stone to Yondu who's just gonna sell to somebody even worse? 952 01:15:58,143 --> 01:16:01,213 - We'll figure that part out later. - We have to stop Ronan. 953 01:16:01,313 --> 01:16:02,781 How? 954 01:16:02,881 --> 01:16:05,451 - I have a plan. - You've got a plan? 955 01:16:05,551 --> 01:16:06,618 Yes. 956 01:16:06,719 --> 01:16:09,140 First of all, you're copying me from when I said I had a plan. 957 01:16:09,241 --> 01:16:12,758 No, I'm not. People say that all the time. It's not that unique of a thing to say. 958 01:16:12,858 --> 01:16:14,760 Secondly, I don't even believe you have a plan. 959 01:16:14,860 --> 01:16:17,663 I have part of a plan! 960 01:16:17,763 --> 01:16:19,298 What percentage of a plan do you have? 961 01:16:19,398 --> 01:16:22,601 You don't get to ask questions after the nonsense you pulled on Knowhere. 962 01:16:22,701 --> 01:16:24,336 I just saved Quill. 963 01:16:24,436 --> 01:16:27,172 We've already established that you destroying the ship that I'm on is not saving me. 964 01:16:27,272 --> 01:16:29,508 - When did we establish it? - Like three seconds ago! 965 01:16:29,608 --> 01:16:31,632 I wasn't listening. I was thinking of something else. 966 01:16:32,277 --> 01:16:35,347 She's right. You don't get an opinion. What percentage? 967 01:16:35,447 --> 01:16:38,679 - I don't know. Twelve percent. - Twelve percent? 968 01:16:40,219 --> 01:16:41,420 That's a fake laugh. 969 01:16:41,520 --> 01:16:43,255 - It's real! - Totally fake. 970 01:16:43,355 --> 01:16:48,026 That is the most real, authentic, hysterical laugh of my entire life 971 01:16:48,126 --> 01:16:50,562 - because that is not a plan. - It's barely a concept. 972 01:16:50,662 --> 01:16:53,265 - You're taking their side? - I am Groot. 973 01:16:53,365 --> 01:16:56,301 So what, it's better than 11%? What the hell does that have to do with anything? 974 01:16:56,401 --> 01:16:59,037 Thank you, Groot. Thank you. 975 01:16:59,137 --> 01:17:03,038 See? Groot's the only one of you who has a clue. 976 01:17:07,613 --> 01:17:09,102 Guys. 977 01:17:09,481 --> 01:17:10,616 Come on. 978 01:17:10,716 --> 01:17:12,718 Yondu is gonna be here in two seconds. 979 01:17:12,818 --> 01:17:15,786 He expects to hear this big plan of ours. 980 01:17:16,688 --> 01:17:19,053 I need your help. 981 01:17:20,325 --> 01:17:23,061 I look around at us. 982 01:17:23,161 --> 01:17:24,650 You know what I see? 983 01:17:25,163 --> 01:17:26,630 Losers. 984 01:17:28,834 --> 01:17:30,435 I mean, like, 985 01:17:30,535 --> 01:17:32,471 folks who have lost stuff. 986 01:17:32,571 --> 01:17:35,198 And we have. Man, we have. All of us. 987 01:17:35,874 --> 01:17:37,636 Our homes, 988 01:17:37,909 --> 01:17:39,740 our families, 989 01:17:40,412 --> 01:17:42,381 normal lives. 990 01:17:42,481 --> 01:17:45,677 And, usually, life takes more than it gives. But not today. 991 01:17:46,051 --> 01:17:47,653 Today, it's given us something. 992 01:17:47,753 --> 01:17:49,354 It has given us a chance. 993 01:17:49,454 --> 01:17:51,251 To do what? 994 01:17:52,691 --> 01:17:54,453 To give a shit. 995 01:17:54,760 --> 01:17:56,662 For once. 996 01:17:56,762 --> 01:17:59,230 Not run away. 997 01:18:01,600 --> 01:18:04,102 I, for one, am not gonna stand by and watch 998 01:18:04,202 --> 01:18:07,728 as Ronan wipes out billions of innocent lives. 999 01:18:08,373 --> 01:18:11,433 But, Quill, stopping Ronan, 1000 01:18:12,077 --> 01:18:14,513 it's impossible. 1001 01:18:14,613 --> 01:18:17,377 You're asking us to die. 1002 01:18:23,588 --> 01:18:25,919 Yeah, I guess I am. 1003 01:18:38,303 --> 01:18:39,895 Quill. 1004 01:18:43,608 --> 01:18:47,407 I have lived most my life surrounded by my enemies. 1005 01:18:50,982 --> 01:18:55,646 I will be grateful to die among my friends. 1006 01:18:59,491 --> 01:19:01,891 You are an honorable man, Quill. 1007 01:19:03,128 --> 01:19:05,789 I will fight beside you. 1008 01:19:06,531 --> 01:19:08,498 And in the end, 1009 01:19:10,001 --> 01:19:12,492 I will see my wife and daughter again. 1010 01:19:18,009 --> 01:19:21,637 I am Groot. 1011 01:19:31,490 --> 01:19:35,187 What the hell. I don't got that long a lifespan, anyway. 1012 01:19:40,732 --> 01:19:43,368 Now I'm standing. Y'all happy? 1013 01:19:43,468 --> 01:19:45,704 We're all standing up now. 1014 01:19:45,804 --> 01:19:49,501 Bunch of jackasses, standing in a circle. 1015 01:19:56,281 --> 01:19:57,849 The Stone reacts to anything organic. 1016 01:19:57,949 --> 01:19:59,985 The bigger the target, the bigger the power surge. 1017 01:20:00,085 --> 01:20:03,322 All Ronan's got to do is touch the Stone to the planet's surface and zap. 1018 01:20:03,422 --> 01:20:05,123 All plants, animals, 1019 01:20:05,223 --> 01:20:07,156 - Nova Corps. - Everything will die. 1020 01:20:07,359 --> 01:20:09,759 So Ronan does not make the surface. 1021 01:20:12,264 --> 01:20:14,299 Rocket will lead a team to blow a hole 1022 01:20:14,399 --> 01:20:16,601 in the Dark Aster's starboard hull. 1023 01:20:16,701 --> 01:20:20,772 Then, our craft and Yondu's will enter. 1024 01:20:20,872 --> 01:20:23,642 Won't there be hundreds of Sakaaran soldiers inside? 1025 01:20:23,742 --> 01:20:27,040 I think of Sakaaran as paper people. 1026 01:20:32,417 --> 01:20:33,852 Once they know we're on board, 1027 01:20:33,952 --> 01:20:37,356 Ronan will isolate himself behind impenetrable security doors on deck. 1028 01:20:37,456 --> 01:20:39,958 Which I can disable by dismantling the power source. 1029 01:20:40,058 --> 01:20:41,760 We'll make it to the flight deck, 1030 01:20:41,860 --> 01:20:45,329 and I'll use the Hadron Enforcer to kill Ronan. 1031 01:20:47,432 --> 01:20:50,902 Once Ronan is dead, we will retrieve the Stone. 1032 01:20:51,002 --> 01:20:53,438 Use these devices to contain it. 1033 01:20:53,538 --> 01:20:55,335 If you touch it, 1034 01:20:55,607 --> 01:20:57,404 it will kill you. 1035 01:20:59,778 --> 01:21:03,014 I'll contact one of the Nova officers who arrested us. 1036 01:21:03,114 --> 01:21:06,208 Hopefully, they'll believe we're there to help. 1037 01:21:06,318 --> 01:21:09,946 There's one more thing we need to complete the plan. 1038 01:21:10,255 --> 01:21:11,915 That guy's eye. 1039 01:21:12,390 --> 01:21:14,960 No! No, we don't. No, we don't need 1040 01:21:15,060 --> 01:21:16,857 that guy's eye. 1041 01:21:17,496 --> 01:21:20,556 No, seriously, I need it! It's important to me. 1042 01:21:24,769 --> 01:21:27,706 Ronan's fleet has been spotted, and will arrive in T-minus 1043 01:21:27,806 --> 01:21:29,708 fifteen minutes. 1044 01:21:29,808 --> 01:21:31,643 Remember, boy. 1045 01:21:31,743 --> 01:21:33,678 At the end of all this, 1046 01:21:33,778 --> 01:21:35,113 I get the Stone. 1047 01:21:35,213 --> 01:21:38,113 You cross me, we kill you all. 1048 01:22:00,305 --> 01:22:02,102 Let's go get 'em, boys! 1049 01:22:11,149 --> 01:22:12,451 This is a terrible plan. 1050 01:22:12,551 --> 01:22:15,110 Hey, you're the one who said you wanted to die among friends. 1051 01:22:19,591 --> 01:22:21,058 Nova Prime. 1052 01:22:22,260 --> 01:22:23,562 I received a transmission 1053 01:22:23,662 --> 01:22:25,356 from one of the Ravagers. 1054 01:22:25,463 --> 01:22:28,099 He says Ronan's in possession of something called an Infinity Stone 1055 01:22:28,199 --> 01:22:29,568 and he's headed toward Xandar. 1056 01:22:29,668 --> 01:22:30,936 Good God. 1057 01:22:31,036 --> 01:22:33,004 It's a trick. He's a criminal. 1058 01:22:33,104 --> 01:22:35,574 Did he say why we should believe him? 1059 01:22:35,674 --> 01:22:37,909 He said his crew just escaped from prison 1060 01:22:38,009 --> 01:22:41,444 so he'd have no other reason to risk coming to Xandar to help. 1061 01:22:41,780 --> 01:22:43,406 He says that he's an 1062 01:22:44,015 --> 01:22:45,317 "a-hole." 1063 01:22:45,417 --> 01:22:46,685 But he's not, 1064 01:22:46,785 --> 01:22:48,520 and I'm quoting him, here, 1065 01:22:48,620 --> 01:22:50,922 "100% a dick." 1066 01:22:51,022 --> 01:22:52,784 Do you believe him? 1067 01:22:52,991 --> 01:22:56,027 I don't know that I believe anyone is 100% a dick, ma'am. 1068 01:22:56,127 --> 01:22:59,528 I mean, do you believe that he is here to help? 1069 01:23:02,767 --> 01:23:04,234 Yeah. 1070 01:23:13,878 --> 01:23:15,680 A fleet approaches. 1071 01:23:15,780 --> 01:23:17,838 They appear to be Ravagers. 1072 01:23:28,460 --> 01:23:30,018 Fire! 1073 01:23:40,905 --> 01:23:42,140 Cover it down. 1074 01:23:42,240 --> 01:23:44,605 Submerge! 1075 01:23:57,088 --> 01:23:58,748 Rocket, hurry! 1076 01:24:04,796 --> 01:24:06,064 All pilots, dive! 1077 01:24:06,164 --> 01:24:07,790 They're beneath us! 1078 01:24:16,174 --> 01:24:17,642 Evacuate the city. 1079 01:24:17,742 --> 01:24:21,700 Our priority is to get our people away from the battle. 1080 01:24:28,219 --> 01:24:29,708 Forward thrust, now! 1081 01:24:42,801 --> 01:24:44,268 Come on! 1082 01:24:45,503 --> 01:24:47,527 Quill! Yondu! Now! 1083 01:25:09,394 --> 01:25:10,962 Hell! 1084 01:25:11,062 --> 01:25:12,564 I'm going down, Quill! 1085 01:25:12,664 --> 01:25:14,466 No more games with me, boy! 1086 01:25:14,566 --> 01:25:15,667 I'll see you 1087 01:25:15,767 --> 01:25:17,962 at the end of this! 1088 01:25:23,808 --> 01:25:25,673 There are too many of them, Rocket! 1089 01:25:25,977 --> 01:25:28,172 We'll never make it up there! 1090 01:25:42,727 --> 01:25:43,928 Peter Quill. 1091 01:25:44,028 --> 01:25:46,464 This is Denarian Saal of the Nova Corps. 1092 01:25:46,564 --> 01:25:49,934 For the record, I advised against trusting you here. 1093 01:25:50,034 --> 01:25:51,736 They got my "dick" message! 1094 01:25:51,836 --> 01:25:53,462 Prove me wrong. 1095 01:26:00,445 --> 01:26:02,776 Yes! 1096 01:26:23,501 --> 01:26:25,059 Yes! 1097 01:26:28,039 --> 01:26:30,166 We're just like Kevin Bacon. 1098 01:26:33,945 --> 01:26:35,513 The starboard kern has been breached! 1099 01:26:35,613 --> 01:26:36,915 We have been boarded. 1100 01:26:37,015 --> 01:26:38,483 Continue our approach. 1101 01:26:38,583 --> 01:26:39,918 But the Nova Corps have engaged. 1102 01:26:40,018 --> 01:26:42,687 None of that will matter once we reach the surface. 1103 01:26:42,787 --> 01:26:43,888 Seal security doors! 1104 01:26:43,988 --> 01:26:45,477 Now! 1105 01:26:46,791 --> 01:26:49,521 Get out of my way! 1106 01:27:00,305 --> 01:27:01,873 Oh, man. 1107 01:27:01,973 --> 01:27:06,411 All Nova pilots, interlock and form a blockade. 1108 01:27:06,511 --> 01:27:10,811 The Dark Aster must not reach the ground. 1109 01:27:22,894 --> 01:27:24,520 Locked in! 1110 01:27:24,929 --> 01:27:26,521 Locked in. 1111 01:27:27,665 --> 01:27:29,132 We're locked in. 1112 01:28:06,971 --> 01:28:09,564 I can barely see. 1113 01:28:35,466 --> 01:28:37,669 When did you learn to do that? 1114 01:28:37,769 --> 01:28:38,937 Pretty sure the answer is 1115 01:28:39,037 --> 01:28:41,061 "I am Groot." 1116 01:28:41,773 --> 01:28:44,741 The flight deck is 300 meters this way. 1117 01:28:47,545 --> 01:28:51,349 I want you all to know that I am grateful for your acceptance after my blunders. 1118 01:28:51,449 --> 01:28:54,144 It is pleasing to once again have 1119 01:28:54,285 --> 01:28:55,752 friends. 1120 01:28:56,387 --> 01:28:59,257 You, Quill, are my friend. 1121 01:28:59,357 --> 01:29:00,625 Thanks. 1122 01:29:00,725 --> 01:29:03,284 This dumb tree, he is my friend. 1123 01:29:04,963 --> 01:29:08,264 - And this green whore, she, too... - You must stop! 1124 01:29:10,702 --> 01:29:16,307 Gamora, look at what you have done. You have always been weak. 1125 01:29:16,407 --> 01:29:18,966 You stupid, traitorous... 1126 01:29:23,715 --> 01:29:26,479 Nobody talks to my friends like that. 1127 01:29:27,151 --> 01:29:31,479 Head to the flight deck. I'll shut down the power to the security doors. 1128 01:29:39,030 --> 01:29:40,899 Yondu Udonta. 1129 01:29:40,999 --> 01:29:44,957 Order your men to turn on the Nova Corps. 1130 01:30:01,285 --> 01:30:02,887 Enough nonsense, Ravager! 1131 01:30:02,987 --> 01:30:05,250 Time to die... 1132 01:30:37,488 --> 01:30:38,977 Nebula, please. 1133 01:30:53,037 --> 01:30:55,840 Enough of this. Necrocraft pilots, 1134 01:30:55,940 --> 01:30:58,465 enact immolation initiative. 1135 01:31:01,546 --> 01:31:03,047 They're dive-bombing the city! 1136 01:31:03,147 --> 01:31:04,983 Denarian Saal, should we break formation? 1137 01:31:05,083 --> 01:31:07,175 No! Hold your positions. 1138 01:31:38,382 --> 01:31:39,851 Keep Ronan up there, Saal. 1139 01:31:39,951 --> 01:31:41,586 We'll take care of the people down here. 1140 01:31:41,686 --> 01:31:44,313 I can't believe I'm taking orders from a hamster. 1141 01:31:47,058 --> 01:31:48,659 Star-Lord. 1142 01:31:48,759 --> 01:31:50,226 Finally. 1143 01:32:00,671 --> 01:32:02,195 You thief! 1144 01:32:13,618 --> 01:32:16,916 You will never make it to Ronan. 1145 01:32:22,193 --> 01:32:24,923 Everybody shoot them before they hit the ground. 1146 01:32:33,104 --> 01:32:34,935 Come on! 1147 01:33:17,315 --> 01:33:21,251 Finger to the throat means death. 1148 01:33:26,624 --> 01:33:28,092 Metaphor. 1149 01:33:28,192 --> 01:33:29,527 Yeah, sorta. 1150 01:33:29,627 --> 01:33:31,253 No. 1151 01:33:58,756 --> 01:34:00,655 Xandar! 1152 01:34:00,858 --> 01:34:03,918 You stand accused. 1153 01:34:04,295 --> 01:34:07,365 Your wretched peace treaty will not 1154 01:34:07,465 --> 01:34:09,066 save you now. 1155 01:34:09,166 --> 01:34:12,863 It is the tinder on which you burn. 1156 01:34:37,028 --> 01:34:38,095 Rocket! 1157 01:34:38,195 --> 01:34:40,424 Hold on, Saal, just... 1158 01:35:06,724 --> 01:35:07,992 Quill, you gotta hurry. 1159 01:35:08,092 --> 01:35:09,727 The city's been evacuated, 1160 01:35:09,827 --> 01:35:12,396 but we're getting our asses kicked down here. 1161 01:35:12,496 --> 01:35:14,395 Gamora hasn't opened the door! 1162 01:35:38,656 --> 01:35:40,123 Nebula! 1163 01:35:41,225 --> 01:35:43,828 Sister, help us fight Ronan. 1164 01:35:43,928 --> 01:35:45,763 You know he's crazy. 1165 01:35:45,863 --> 01:35:47,965 I know you're both crazy. 1166 01:35:48,065 --> 01:35:49,691 No! 1167 01:35:52,136 --> 01:35:53,603 What the? 1168 01:35:54,405 --> 01:35:56,395 Get out! 1169 01:36:37,348 --> 01:36:38,815 You did it! 1170 01:37:04,875 --> 01:37:06,143 I was mistaken. 1171 01:37:06,243 --> 01:37:08,301 I do remember your family. 1172 01:37:08,479 --> 01:37:10,281 Their screams were 1173 01:37:10,381 --> 01:37:12,940 pitiful. I... 1174 01:39:09,633 --> 01:39:11,191 No, Groot! 1175 01:39:11,335 --> 01:39:12,436 You can't. 1176 01:39:12,536 --> 01:39:14,469 You'll die. 1177 01:39:14,572 --> 01:39:16,474 Why are you doing this? 1178 01:39:16,574 --> 01:39:18,507 Why? 1179 01:39:24,682 --> 01:39:26,550 We 1180 01:39:26,650 --> 01:39:28,139 are 1181 01:39:28,319 --> 01:39:30,252 Groot. 1182 01:40:34,218 --> 01:40:36,709 I called him an idiot. 1183 01:40:58,976 --> 01:41:01,376 You killed Groot! 1184 01:41:05,082 --> 01:41:06,810 Behold! 1185 01:41:07,284 --> 01:41:10,721 Your guardians of the galaxy. 1186 01:41:10,821 --> 01:41:13,257 What fruit have they wrought? 1187 01:41:13,357 --> 01:41:17,461 Only that my father and his father 1188 01:41:17,561 --> 01:41:21,198 shall finally know vengeance. 1189 01:41:21,298 --> 01:41:23,993 People of Xandar, 1190 01:41:24,168 --> 01:41:25,970 the time has come 1191 01:41:26,070 --> 01:41:28,939 to rejoice and renounce 1192 01:41:29,039 --> 01:41:31,734 your paltry gods! 1193 01:41:32,109 --> 01:41:35,908 Your salvation is at hand. 1194 01:41:48,192 --> 01:41:50,159 Listen to these words. 1195 01:41:58,769 --> 01:42:00,896 Now bring it down hard! 1196 01:42:03,874 --> 01:42:05,342 What are you doing? 1197 01:42:05,442 --> 01:42:08,467 Dance-off, bro. Me and you. 1198 01:42:11,448 --> 01:42:13,313 Gamora. 1199 01:42:13,884 --> 01:42:16,286 Subtle. Take it back. 1200 01:42:16,386 --> 01:42:18,822 What are you doing? 1201 01:42:18,922 --> 01:42:21,720 I'm distracting you, you big turd blossom. 1202 01:42:37,474 --> 01:42:39,464 No! 1203 01:43:12,976 --> 01:43:16,570 Peter! Take my hand! 1204 01:43:21,518 --> 01:43:23,986 Take my hand, Peter. 1205 01:43:24,454 --> 01:43:26,256 Mom. 1206 01:43:26,356 --> 01:43:28,881 Take my hand! 1207 01:44:22,846 --> 01:44:24,882 You're mortal! 1208 01:44:24,982 --> 01:44:26,316 How? 1209 01:44:26,416 --> 01:44:28,619 You said it yourself, bitch. 1210 01:44:28,719 --> 01:44:31,551 We're the Guardians of the Galaxy. 1211 01:45:00,951 --> 01:45:02,619 Well, well, well. 1212 01:45:02,719 --> 01:45:04,243 Quite the light show. 1213 01:45:06,089 --> 01:45:08,216 Ain't this sweet. 1214 01:45:09,326 --> 01:45:11,862 But you got some business to attend to 1215 01:45:11,962 --> 01:45:14,862 before all the nookie-nookie starts. 1216 01:45:16,099 --> 01:45:18,335 Peter, you can't. Peter. 1217 01:45:18,435 --> 01:45:22,539 You gotta reconsider this, Yondu. I don't know who you're selling this to, 1218 01:45:22,639 --> 01:45:26,868 but the only way the universe can survive is if you give it to the Nova Corps. 1219 01:45:27,244 --> 01:45:29,871 I may be as pretty as an angel, 1220 01:45:31,682 --> 01:45:34,013 but I sure as hell ain't one. 1221 01:45:35,252 --> 01:45:37,219 Hand it over, son. 1222 01:45:53,603 --> 01:45:55,070 Yondu. 1223 01:45:57,708 --> 01:46:01,439 Do not open that Orb. You know that, right? 1224 01:46:01,611 --> 01:46:04,545 You've seen what it does to people. 1225 01:46:14,825 --> 01:46:17,520 Yeah, Quill turned out okay. 1226 01:46:17,928 --> 01:46:20,564 It's probably good we didn't deliver him to his dad 1227 01:46:20,664 --> 01:46:21,665 like we was hired to do. 1228 01:46:21,765 --> 01:46:24,961 Yeah, that guy was a jackass. 1229 01:46:29,373 --> 01:46:33,400 He is gonna be so pissed when he realizes I switched out the Orb on him. 1230 01:46:35,679 --> 01:46:37,976 He was gonna kill you, Peter. 1231 01:46:38,749 --> 01:46:40,876 I know. 1232 01:46:42,285 --> 01:46:44,377 But he was about the only family I had. 1233 01:46:46,823 --> 01:46:48,312 No. 1234 01:46:49,126 --> 01:46:50,786 He wasn't. 1235 01:47:38,575 --> 01:47:40,143 Why would you even know this? 1236 01:47:40,243 --> 01:47:42,980 When we arrested you, we noticed an anomaly in your nervous system, 1237 01:47:43,080 --> 01:47:44,945 so we had it checked out. 1238 01:47:45,782 --> 01:47:47,484 I'm not Terran? 1239 01:47:47,584 --> 01:47:49,152 You are half Terran. 1240 01:47:49,252 --> 01:47:52,956 Your mother was of Earth. Your father, well, 1241 01:47:53,056 --> 01:47:56,827 he's something very ancient we've never seen here before. 1242 01:47:56,927 --> 01:48:00,956 That could be why you were able to hold the Stone for as long as you did. 1243 01:48:01,398 --> 01:48:02,865 Your friends have arrived. 1244 01:48:04,301 --> 01:48:06,870 On behalf of the Nova Corps, 1245 01:48:06,970 --> 01:48:12,568 we'd like to express our profound gratitude for your help in saving Xandar. 1246 01:48:13,944 --> 01:48:16,713 If you will follow Denarian Dey, 1247 01:48:16,813 --> 01:48:20,577 - he has something to show you. - Thank you, Nova Prime. 1248 01:48:28,925 --> 01:48:33,830 Your wife and child shall rest well knowing that you have avenged them. 1249 01:48:33,930 --> 01:48:35,165 Yes. 1250 01:48:35,265 --> 01:48:37,630 Of course, Ronan was only a puppet. 1251 01:48:37,934 --> 01:48:40,561 It's really Thanos I need to kill. 1252 01:48:42,772 --> 01:48:46,002 We tried to keep it as close to the original as possible. 1253 01:48:46,143 --> 01:48:48,577 We salvaged as much as we could. 1254 01:48:51,214 --> 01:48:52,681 I... 1255 01:48:54,217 --> 01:48:55,775 Thank you. 1256 01:48:56,887 --> 01:48:58,955 I have a family. 1257 01:48:59,055 --> 01:49:00,988 They're alive because of you. 1258 01:49:05,228 --> 01:49:07,664 Your criminal records have also been expunged. 1259 01:49:07,764 --> 01:49:12,166 However, I have to warn you against breaking any laws in the future. 1260 01:49:12,335 --> 01:49:14,638 Question. What if I see something that I want to take, 1261 01:49:14,738 --> 01:49:17,407 - and it belongs to someone else? - You will be arrested. 1262 01:49:17,507 --> 01:49:20,110 But what if I want it more than the person who has it? 1263 01:49:20,210 --> 01:49:22,012 - It's still illegal. - That doesn't follow. 1264 01:49:22,112 --> 01:49:24,848 No, I want it more, sir. Do you understand? What are you laughing at? 1265 01:49:24,948 --> 01:49:26,783 Why? I can't have a discussion with this gentleman? 1266 01:49:26,883 --> 01:49:28,785 What if someone does something irksome 1267 01:49:28,885 --> 01:49:31,546 and I decide to remove his spine? 1268 01:49:32,656 --> 01:49:34,214 That's... 1269 01:49:34,858 --> 01:49:37,519 That's actually murder. 1270 01:49:38,862 --> 01:49:41,465 It's one of the worst crimes of all. 1271 01:49:41,565 --> 01:49:44,863 So... also illegal. 1272 01:49:48,004 --> 01:49:49,493 They'll be fine, Dey. 1273 01:49:49,739 --> 01:49:50,974 I'm gonna keep an eye on 'em. 1274 01:49:51,074 --> 01:49:52,541 You? 1275 01:49:55,545 --> 01:49:58,980 Yeah. Me. 1276 01:50:17,500 --> 01:50:19,490 Peter, 1277 01:50:19,603 --> 01:50:23,402 I know these last few months have been hard for you. 1278 01:50:24,241 --> 01:50:26,910 But I'm going to a better place. 1279 01:50:27,010 --> 01:50:29,513 And I will be okay. 1280 01:50:29,613 --> 01:50:33,810 And I will always be with you. 1281 01:50:35,051 --> 01:50:37,787 You are the light of my life. 1282 01:50:37,887 --> 01:50:40,582 My precious son. 1283 01:50:41,091 --> 01:50:44,492 My little Star-Lord. 1284 01:50:44,761 --> 01:50:47,195 Love, Mom. 1285 01:52:47,317 --> 01:52:49,185 So, what should we do next? 1286 01:52:49,285 --> 01:52:50,752 Something good? 1287 01:52:51,321 --> 01:52:52,822 Something bad? 1288 01:52:52,922 --> 01:52:55,014 A bit of both? 1289 01:52:56,192 --> 01:52:59,559 We'll follow your lead, Star-Lord. 1290 01:53:01,364 --> 01:53:02,853 Bit of both. 1291 02:00:26,742 --> 02:00:29,506 What do you let it lick you like that for? 1292 02:00:30,379 --> 02:00:32,403 Gross. 1293 02:00:34,984 --> 02:00:36,551 Yeah! 1294 02:00:36,552 --> 02:00:38,849 But it burns going down.

subtitles.author: lesaigneur
subtitles.subtitles: ï»¿1 00:00:36,920 --> 00:00:37,967 Peter. 2 00:00:39,480 --> 00:00:41,393 Your momma wants to speak with you. 3 00:00:44,639 --> 00:00:45,684 Come on, Pete. 4 00:00:46,529 --> 00:00:48,188 Take these fool things off. 5 00:01:22,640 --> 00:01:25,883 Why have you been fighting with the other boys again, baby? 6 00:01:28,480 --> 00:01:29,686 Peter? 7 00:01:30,160 --> 00:01:32,897 They killed a little frog that ain't done nothing. 8 00:01:34,000 --> 00:01:35,738 Smushed it with a stick. 9 00:01:37,800 --> 00:01:39,909 You're so like your daddy. 10 00:01:41,107 --> 00:01:42,843 You even look like him. 11 00:01:44,200 --> 00:01:45,911 And he was an angel. 12 00:01:47,680 --> 00:01:50,331 Composed out of pure light. Mer? 13 00:01:50,675 --> 00:01:52,509 You got a present there for Peter, don't you? 14 00:01:54,320 --> 00:01:55,680 Of course. 15 00:01:59,040 --> 00:02:00,042 There. 16 00:02:01,880 --> 00:02:03,419 I've got you covered, Pete. 17 00:02:08,080 --> 00:02:10,144 You open it up when I'm gone, ok? 18 00:02:12,568 --> 00:02:13,873 Your grandpa... 19 00:02:14,389 --> 00:02:17,040 is gonna take such good care of you. 20 00:02:17,760 --> 00:02:21,029 At least until your daddy comes back to get you. 21 00:02:25,631 --> 00:02:26,779 Take my hand. 22 00:02:30,360 --> 00:02:31,411 Peter. 23 00:02:33,293 --> 00:02:34,340 Pete, come on. 24 00:02:34,836 --> 00:02:36,030 Take my hand. 25 00:02:42,400 --> 00:02:43,447 Mom? 26 00:02:43,920 --> 00:02:46,810 No! No! No! No! 27 00:02:46,960 --> 00:02:48,246 Mom! No! 28 00:02:48,400 --> 00:02:49,925 Come with me. No! 29 00:02:50,134 --> 00:02:52,062 No! 30 00:02:52,400 --> 00:02:53,698 You've got to stay here. 31 00:02:53,700 --> 00:02:54,732 Please. 32 00:02:54,734 --> 00:02:55,447 No... 33 00:02:56,600 --> 00:02:57,664 Ok? 34 00:03:17,440 --> 00:03:18,375 No. 35 00:03:35,200 --> 00:03:36,964 Mom! 36 00:08:27,280 --> 00:08:28,520 Drop it! 37 00:08:29,718 --> 00:08:30,361 Hey. 38 00:08:31,600 --> 00:08:32,661 Drop it! Now! 39 00:08:32,663 --> 00:08:34,094 Hey, cool man. No problem. 40 00:08:34,121 --> 00:08:35,922 No problem at all. 41 00:08:36,760 --> 00:08:38,285 How do you know about this? 42 00:08:38,360 --> 00:08:39,830 I don't even know what that is. 43 00:08:39,854 --> 00:08:42,521 I'm just a junker, man. I was just checking stuff out. 44 00:08:42,575 --> 00:08:45,278 You don't look like a junker. You're wearing Ravager garb. 45 00:08:45,280 --> 00:08:46,598 This is just an outfit, man. 46 00:08:46,600 --> 00:08:48,377 Ninja Turtle, you better stop poking me. 47 00:08:48,379 --> 00:08:49,278 What is your name? 48 00:08:49,280 --> 00:08:51,792 My name is Peter Quill, ok? Dude, chill out. 49 00:08:51,794 --> 00:08:53,051 Move! Why? 50 00:08:53,330 --> 00:08:55,083 Ronan may have questions for you. 51 00:08:56,055 --> 00:08:58,142 Hey, you know what, there is another name you might know me by. 52 00:09:00,560 --> 00:09:01,566 Star-Lord. 53 00:09:03,226 --> 00:09:03,965 Who? 54 00:09:04,379 --> 00:09:05,872 Star-Lord, man. 55 00:09:05,874 --> 00:09:07,102 Legendary outlaw. 56 00:09:07,834 --> 00:09:09,422 Guys? Move! 57 00:09:10,656 --> 00:09:11,835 Forget this. 58 00:11:03,640 --> 00:11:04,676 Peter? 59 00:11:09,377 --> 00:11:10,378 What happened? 60 00:11:10,941 --> 00:11:11,583 Hey... 61 00:11:14,285 --> 00:11:14,948 I... 62 00:11:15,600 --> 00:11:17,443 Bereet. Bereet! 63 00:11:17,703 --> 00:11:19,320 Look, I'm gonna be totally honest with you. 64 00:11:19,472 --> 00:11:20,709 I forgot you're here. 65 00:11:44,314 --> 00:11:47,345 Scattered riots broke out across the Kree Empire today 66 00:11:47,446 --> 00:11:50,894 protesting the recent peace treaty signed by the Kree Emperor 67 00:11:50,964 --> 00:11:52,940 and Xandar's Nova Prime. 68 00:11:55,822 --> 00:11:57,610 Peter, you have call. 69 00:11:58,040 --> 00:11:59,163 No, wait, don't! 70 00:11:59,383 --> 00:12:00,182 Quill? 71 00:12:02,200 --> 00:12:03,378 Hey, Yondu. 72 00:12:03,758 --> 00:12:05,175 I'm here on Morag. 73 00:12:05,551 --> 00:12:07,228 Ain't no Orb, ain't no you. 74 00:12:07,230 --> 00:12:09,427 Well, I was in the neighborhood. I thought I'd save you the hassle. 75 00:12:09,432 --> 00:12:10,718 Well, where are you at now, boy? 76 00:12:10,720 --> 00:12:13,291 I feel really bad about this, but I'm not gonna tell you that. 77 00:12:13,630 --> 00:12:15,844 I slaved putting this deal together. Slaved? 78 00:12:15,846 --> 00:12:18,037 Making a few calls is slaved? It's really... And now you're gonna rip me off! 79 00:12:18,345 --> 00:12:20,080 We do not do that to each other. 80 00:12:20,105 --> 00:12:22,098 We're Ravagers. We got a code. 81 00:12:22,100 --> 00:12:24,631 Yeah and that code is steal from everybody. 82 00:12:24,720 --> 00:12:26,211 When I picked you up on Terra... 83 00:12:26,277 --> 00:12:28,242 Picked me up. These boys of mine wanted to eat you. 84 00:12:28,244 --> 00:12:28,767 Yeah? 85 00:12:28,782 --> 00:12:30,513 They ain't never tasted any Terran before. 86 00:12:30,759 --> 00:12:33,081 I stopped them. You're alive because of me! 87 00:12:33,317 --> 00:12:34,345 I Will find you, 88 00:12:34,602 --> 00:12:35,361 I Will... 89 00:12:35,794 --> 00:12:37,240 Put a bounty on him! 90 00:12:37,494 --> 00:12:38,561 Forty K. 91 00:12:38,640 --> 00:12:40,358 But I want him back alive. Yeah, Cap. 92 00:12:40,360 --> 00:12:41,870 Alive? That's what I said. 93 00:12:41,953 --> 00:12:43,595 I told you when you picked that kid up, 94 00:12:43,597 --> 00:12:45,368 you should have delivered him like we was hired to do! 95 00:12:45,538 --> 00:12:47,005 He was cargo! 96 00:12:47,120 --> 00:12:48,960 You have always been soft on him. 97 00:12:49,070 --> 00:12:51,411 You're the only one I'm being soft on! 98 00:12:52,159 --> 00:12:54,366 Now, don't you worry about Mr. Quill. 99 00:12:54,903 --> 00:12:56,600 As soon as we get him back here, 100 00:12:57,505 --> 00:12:59,341 I'm gonna kill him myself. 101 00:13:00,309 --> 00:13:01,961 What we do need to worry about, 102 00:13:03,009 --> 00:13:04,895 Is who else out there wants that Orb! 103 00:13:25,907 --> 00:13:27,758 They call me terrorist, 104 00:13:28,734 --> 00:13:31,385 Radical, Zealot, 105 00:13:32,268 --> 00:13:35,916 because I obey the ancient laws of my people, the Kree, 106 00:13:36,510 --> 00:13:39,169 and punish those who do not. 107 00:13:39,817 --> 00:13:42,576 Because I do not forgive your people 108 00:13:42,578 --> 00:13:44,949 for taking the life of my father, 109 00:13:45,742 --> 00:13:46,820 and his father, 110 00:13:47,720 --> 00:13:49,749 and his father before him. 111 00:13:50,993 --> 00:13:55,244 A thousand years of war between us will not be forgotten! 112 00:13:55,557 --> 00:13:56,528 You can't do this! 113 00:13:56,795 --> 00:13:58,745 Our government signed a peace treaty. 114 00:13:59,901 --> 00:14:01,825 My government knows no shame. 115 00:14:03,206 --> 00:14:07,017 You Xandarians and your culture are a disease. 116 00:14:07,440 --> 00:14:08,240 You 117 00:14:08,808 --> 00:14:10,918 will never rule Xandar. 118 00:14:11,365 --> 00:14:12,172 No. 119 00:14:13,056 --> 00:14:15,047 I will cure it! 120 00:14:28,309 --> 00:14:29,390 Ronan, 121 00:14:29,440 --> 00:14:31,283 Korath has returned. 122 00:14:31,285 --> 00:14:34,129 Master, he is a thief, 123 00:14:34,433 --> 00:14:37,133 an outlaw who calls himself Star-Lord. 124 00:14:37,242 --> 00:14:39,518 But we have discovered he has an agreement 125 00:14:39,520 --> 00:14:43,816 to retrieve the Orb for an intermediary known as The Broker. 126 00:14:44,040 --> 00:14:47,522 I promised Thanos I would retrieve the Orb for him. 127 00:14:47,732 --> 00:14:50,512 Only then will he destroy Xandar for me. 128 00:14:51,295 --> 00:14:54,953 Nebula, go to Xandar and get me the Orb. 129 00:14:55,280 --> 00:14:56,506 It will be my honor. 130 00:14:56,520 --> 00:14:58,003 It will be your doom. 131 00:14:59,147 --> 00:15:00,518 If this happens again, 132 00:15:00,520 --> 00:15:03,100 you'll be facing our father without his prize. 133 00:15:03,390 --> 00:15:04,897 I'm a daughter of Thanos. 134 00:15:05,571 --> 00:15:06,558 Just like you. 135 00:15:06,560 --> 00:15:07,991 But I know Xandar. 136 00:15:08,229 --> 00:15:09,798 Ronan has already decreed that I... 137 00:15:09,800 --> 00:15:11,301 Do not speak for me. 138 00:15:13,280 --> 00:15:15,282 You will not fail. 139 00:15:19,197 --> 00:15:20,531 Have I ever? 140 00:15:36,120 --> 00:15:37,531 Xandarians. 141 00:15:37,893 --> 00:15:39,847 What a bunch of losers. 142 00:15:40,193 --> 00:15:44,534 All of them in a big hurry to get from something stupid, 143 00:15:44,600 --> 00:15:46,923 to nothing at all. Pathetic. 144 00:15:46,960 --> 00:15:48,079 Look at this guy! 145 00:15:48,141 --> 00:15:49,679 Can you believe they call us criminals, 146 00:15:49,680 --> 00:15:51,830 when he's assaulting us with that haircut? 147 00:15:52,308 --> 00:15:55,128 What is this thing? Look how it thinks it's so cool. 148 00:15:55,136 --> 00:15:56,454 It's not cool to get help! 149 00:15:56,456 --> 00:15:58,562 Walk by yourself, you little gargoyle. 150 00:15:58,842 --> 00:16:01,028 Look at Mr. Smiles over here. 151 00:16:01,280 --> 00:16:02,712 Where's your wife, old man? 152 00:16:03,024 --> 00:16:05,146 What a class-A prevert. 153 00:16:06,701 --> 00:16:08,414 Right, Groot? Groot? 154 00:16:09,009 --> 00:16:10,638 Don't drink fountain water, you idiot. 155 00:16:10,685 --> 00:16:12,045 That's disgusting! 156 00:16:13,520 --> 00:16:15,559 Yes, you did. I just saw you doing it. 157 00:16:15,560 --> 00:16:16,686 Why are you lying? 158 00:16:20,240 --> 00:16:21,565 Looks like we got one. 159 00:16:22,400 --> 00:16:24,025 Ok humie, 160 00:16:24,326 --> 00:16:26,829 how bad does someone wanna find you? 161 00:16:27,880 --> 00:16:29,808 40,000 units? 162 00:16:29,810 --> 00:16:32,045 Groot, we're gonna be rich. 163 00:16:46,040 --> 00:16:47,292 Mr. Quill. 164 00:16:47,294 --> 00:16:48,009 Broker. 165 00:16:49,157 --> 00:16:50,333 The Orb. 166 00:16:51,600 --> 00:16:52,746 As commissioned. 167 00:16:52,948 --> 00:16:53,878 Where's Yondu? 168 00:16:53,880 --> 00:16:55,019 Wanted to be here. 169 00:16:55,021 --> 00:16:56,921 Sends his love. And told me to tell you, 170 00:16:56,940 --> 00:16:59,381 that you got the best eyebrows in the business. 171 00:17:01,483 --> 00:17:02,614 What is it? 172 00:17:03,080 --> 00:17:05,668 It's my policy never to discuss my clients, 173 00:17:05,738 --> 00:17:06,608 or their needs. 174 00:17:06,610 --> 00:17:08,638 Yeah, well, I almost died getting it for you. 175 00:17:08,640 --> 00:17:11,979 An occupational hazard I'm sure, in your line of work. 176 00:17:11,980 --> 00:17:15,156 Some machine-headed freak, working for a dude named Ronan. 177 00:17:15,960 --> 00:17:17,999 Ronan? I'm sorry, Mr. Quill. 178 00:17:18,000 --> 00:17:19,047 I truly am. 179 00:17:19,049 --> 00:17:22,332 But I want no part of this transaction if Ronan is involved. 180 00:17:24,148 --> 00:17:25,086 Who's Ronan? 181 00:17:25,088 --> 00:17:28,376 A Kree fanatic, outraged by the peace treaty, 182 00:17:28,378 --> 00:17:31,694 who will not rest until Xandarian culture, 183 00:17:31,696 --> 00:17:32,805 my culture, 184 00:17:32,807 --> 00:17:34,431 is wiped from existence! 185 00:17:34,433 --> 00:17:35,135 Come on. 186 00:17:35,137 --> 00:17:37,744 He's someone whose bad side I'd rather not be on. 187 00:17:37,746 --> 00:17:39,082 What about my bad side? 188 00:17:39,084 --> 00:17:40,387 Farewell, Mr. Quill. 189 00:17:42,480 --> 00:17:44,083 Hey, we had a deal, bro! 190 00:17:50,586 --> 00:17:51,446 What happened? 191 00:17:53,320 --> 00:17:55,379 This guy just backed out of a deal on me. 192 00:17:56,400 --> 00:17:58,482 If there is one thing I hate, it's a man without integrity. 193 00:17:58,750 --> 00:18:00,800 Peter Quill. People call me Star-Lord. 194 00:18:02,048 --> 00:18:04,181 You have the bearing of a man of honor. 195 00:18:04,471 --> 00:18:06,767 Well, you know, I would not say that. 196 00:18:07,275 --> 00:18:09,550 People say it about me, all the time, 197 00:18:09,552 --> 00:18:11,796 but it's not something I would ever say about myself. 198 00:18:30,502 --> 00:18:31,663 This wasn't the plan. 199 00:18:34,362 --> 00:18:36,054 Put him in the bag. Put him in the bag! 200 00:18:36,574 --> 00:18:38,727 No! Not her, him! 201 00:18:38,880 --> 00:18:40,543 Learn genders, man. 202 00:18:42,120 --> 00:18:43,729 Biting? That's not fair! 203 00:18:47,099 --> 00:18:48,583 Take it easy! 204 00:19:17,987 --> 00:19:19,748 Fool. You should have learned. 205 00:19:19,956 --> 00:19:21,765 I don't learn. One of my issues. 206 00:19:30,000 --> 00:19:31,200 What the... 207 00:19:35,175 --> 00:19:37,730 Quit smiling, you idiot. You're supposed to be a professional. 208 00:19:39,420 --> 00:19:40,945 You got to be kidding me. 209 00:19:41,309 --> 00:19:41,770 Hey! 210 00:20:00,280 --> 00:20:02,425 I live for the simple things. 211 00:20:02,880 --> 00:20:04,822 Like how much this is gonna hurt. 212 00:20:10,000 --> 00:20:12,106 Yeah. Writhe little man. 213 00:20:14,160 --> 00:20:16,013 It'll grow back, you d'ast idiot. 214 00:20:16,039 --> 00:20:17,066 Quit whining. 215 00:20:25,600 --> 00:20:27,720 Subject 89P13, 216 00:20:27,722 --> 00:20:28,952 drop your weapon. 217 00:20:29,943 --> 00:20:30,831 Crap. 218 00:20:31,338 --> 00:20:33,884 By the authority of the Nova Corps, you are under arrest. 219 00:20:33,886 --> 00:20:34,518 Alright. Come on up. 220 00:20:34,520 --> 00:20:36,926 For endangerment to life and the destruction of property. 221 00:20:36,928 --> 00:20:37,540 Hey! 222 00:20:38,055 --> 00:20:39,613 If it isn't Star-Prince. 223 00:20:40,080 --> 00:20:41,125 Star-Lord. 224 00:20:41,837 --> 00:20:43,141 Sorry. Lord. 225 00:20:43,556 --> 00:20:45,638 I picked this guy up a while back for petty theft. 226 00:20:45,640 --> 00:20:46,821 He's got a code name. 227 00:20:47,231 --> 00:20:48,278 Yeah. Stay out of the way. 228 00:20:48,437 --> 00:20:50,395 Come on, man. It's a... It's an outlaw name. 229 00:20:50,459 --> 00:20:51,436 Just relax, pal. 230 00:20:52,173 --> 00:20:54,365 It's cool to have a code name. It's not that weird. 231 00:20:56,009 --> 00:20:57,072 Fascists. 232 00:21:10,680 --> 00:21:11,919 Ronan is destroying 233 00:21:11,920 --> 00:21:14,279 Xandarian outposts throughout the galaxy. 234 00:21:14,570 --> 00:21:18,306 I should think that would call for some slight response on the part of the Kree. 235 00:21:18,360 --> 00:21:20,054 We signed your peace treaty, Nova Prime. 236 00:21:20,056 --> 00:21:21,133 What more do you want? 237 00:21:21,266 --> 00:21:23,405 At least a statement from the Kree Empire 238 00:21:23,407 --> 00:21:25,696 saying that they condemn his actions. 239 00:21:25,914 --> 00:21:28,244 He is slaughtering children. 240 00:21:28,859 --> 00:21:29,906 Families. 241 00:21:30,174 --> 00:21:32,118 That is your business. 242 00:21:32,229 --> 00:21:34,214 Now, I have other matters to attend to. 243 00:21:35,709 --> 00:21:36,710 Prick. 244 00:21:39,406 --> 00:21:40,538 Some good news. 245 00:21:40,642 --> 00:21:43,525 It looks like we've apprehended one of Ronan's compatriots. 246 00:21:43,951 --> 00:21:45,112 Gamora. 247 00:21:45,165 --> 00:21:48,076 Surgically modified and trained as a living weapon. 248 00:21:48,320 --> 00:21:50,899 The adopted daughter of the Mad Titan, Thanos. 249 00:21:51,475 --> 00:21:54,617 Recently, Thanos lent her and her sister Nebula out to Ronan, 250 00:21:54,636 --> 00:21:57,691 which leads us to believe that Thanos and Ronan are working together. 251 00:21:58,194 --> 00:22:00,743 Subject 89P13. 252 00:22:00,745 --> 00:22:02,229 Calls itself Rocket. 253 00:22:02,473 --> 00:22:05,330 The result of illegal genetic and cybernetic experiments 254 00:22:05,332 --> 00:22:06,646 on a lower life form. 255 00:22:07,220 --> 00:22:08,984 What the hell? 256 00:22:09,377 --> 00:22:10,725 They call it Groot. 257 00:22:10,880 --> 00:22:13,565 A humanoid plant that's been traveling recently 258 00:22:13,567 --> 00:22:16,917 as 89P13's personal houseplant/muscle. 259 00:22:18,229 --> 00:22:20,898 Peter Jason Quill, from Terra. 260 00:22:21,180 --> 00:22:24,192 Raised from youth by a band of mercenaries called the Ravagers, 261 00:22:24,356 --> 00:22:26,078 led by Yondu Udonta. 262 00:22:26,080 --> 00:22:27,133 Oh, I'm sorry. 263 00:22:27,720 --> 00:22:30,049 I didn't know how this machine worked. 264 00:22:30,760 --> 00:22:32,622 What a bunch of a-holes. 265 00:22:33,400 --> 00:22:35,846 Transport all four to the Kyln. 266 00:22:38,890 --> 00:22:41,780 I guess most of Nova Corps wanna uphold the laws, 267 00:22:42,240 --> 00:22:45,608 but these ones here, they're corrupt and cruel. 268 00:22:45,920 --> 00:22:48,196 But hey, that's not my problem. 269 00:22:48,470 --> 00:22:49,957 I ain't gonna be here long. 270 00:22:50,113 --> 00:22:53,282 I've escaped 22 prisons. This one's no different. 271 00:22:53,585 --> 00:22:56,118 You're lucky the broad showed up, because otherwise me and Groot 272 00:22:56,120 --> 00:22:57,963 would be collecting that bounty right now, 273 00:22:58,040 --> 00:23:01,135 and you'd be getting drawn and quartered by Yondu and those Ravagers. 274 00:23:01,361 --> 00:23:03,550 I've had a lot of folks try to kill me over the years. 275 00:23:03,573 --> 00:23:06,960 I ain't about to be brought down by a tree and a talking raccoon. 276 00:23:06,962 --> 00:23:08,503 Hold. What's a raccoon? 277 00:23:08,505 --> 00:23:10,984 What's a raccoon? It's what you are, stupid. 278 00:23:11,086 --> 00:23:13,645 Ain't no thing like me, except me. 279 00:23:14,327 --> 00:23:16,832 So, this Orb has a real shiny blue suitcase, 280 00:23:16,834 --> 00:23:19,729 Ark of the Covenant, Maltese Falcon sort of vibe. 281 00:23:20,320 --> 00:23:22,001 What is it? I am Groot. 282 00:23:22,003 --> 00:23:23,450 So what? What's the Orb? 283 00:23:23,600 --> 00:23:25,804 I have no words for an honorless thief. 284 00:23:26,140 --> 00:23:29,317 Pretty high and mighty coming from the lackey of a genocidal maniac. 285 00:23:29,480 --> 00:23:31,403 Yeah, I know who you are. 286 00:23:31,480 --> 00:23:33,482 Anyone who's anyone knows who you are. 287 00:23:33,508 --> 00:23:34,998 Yeah, we know who you are. 288 00:23:35,240 --> 00:23:37,766 Who is she? I am Groot. 289 00:23:37,840 --> 00:23:39,427 Yeah, you said that. 290 00:23:40,605 --> 00:23:43,085 I wasn't retrieving the Orb for Ronan. 291 00:23:43,160 --> 00:23:44,543 I was betraying him. 292 00:23:44,850 --> 00:23:46,852 I had an agreement to sell it to a third party. 293 00:23:48,880 --> 00:23:50,433 I am Groot. 294 00:23:50,440 --> 00:23:54,915 Well, that's just as fascinating as the first 89 times you told me that. 295 00:23:54,969 --> 00:23:57,241 What is wrong with Giving Tree, here? 296 00:23:57,243 --> 00:23:59,287 Well, he don't know talking good like me and you. 297 00:23:59,360 --> 00:24:03,445 So his vocabulistics is limited to I and am and Groot. 298 00:24:03,520 --> 00:24:05,170 Exclusively in that order. 299 00:24:05,265 --> 00:24:07,734 I tell you what, that's gonna wear real thin, real fast 300 00:24:07,735 --> 00:24:08,447 by now. 301 00:24:09,044 --> 00:24:09,541 Hey! 302 00:24:10,252 --> 00:24:11,207 Put that away. 303 00:24:12,841 --> 00:24:13,349 Hey! 304 00:24:13,880 --> 00:24:16,395 Listen to me, you big blue bastard. You've heard of this. 393 00:30:45,418 --> 00:30:46,345 You've seen this, right? 394 00:30:46,347 --> 00:30:47,802 You know what that is. Yeah. Yeah. 395 00:30:47,804 --> 00:30:49,619 Everyone knows. No, no. 396 00:30:51,676 --> 00:30:54,484 What I'm saying is, you want to keep her alive. 397 00:30:55,200 --> 00:30:56,785 Don't do his work for him. 398 00:31:11,178 --> 00:31:12,962 I like your knife. Holy shit. 412 00:31:44,045 --> 00:31:47,572 That Orb is my opportunity to get away from Thanos and Ronan. 413 00:31:48,280 --> 00:31:49,841 If you free us, 414 00:31:51,400 --> 00:31:52,919 I'll lead you to the buyer directly 415 00:31:52,920 --> 00:31:54,949 and I'll split the profit between the three of us. 416 00:31:55,000 --> 00:31:56,684 I am Groot. 417 00:31:56,960 --> 00:31:58,119 Four of us. 418 00:31:58,252 --> 00:32:02,133 Asleep for the danger, awake for the money, as per fricking usual. 419 00:32:03,288 --> 00:32:05,949 You have been betrayed, Ronan. 420 00:32:06,160 --> 00:32:08,444 We know only that she has been captured. 421 00:32:09,130 --> 00:32:10,922 Gamora may yet recover the Orb. 422 00:32:11,000 --> 00:32:11,773 No! 435 00:32:50,968 --> 00:32:52,266 Lower your tone! 436 00:32:52,268 --> 00:32:53,269 I may be your... 437 00:33:01,783 --> 00:33:05,041 I only ask that you take this matter seriously. 438 00:33:06,560 --> 00:33:10,281 The only matter I do not take seriously, boy, 439 00:33:10,680 --> 00:33:11,966 is you. 440 00:33:12,680 --> 00:33:15,128 Your politics bore me. 441 00:33:15,576 --> 00:33:18,095 Your demeanor is that of a pouty child. 442 00:33:18,520 --> 00:33:20,056 And apparently, 443 00:33:20,498 --> 00:33:23,467 you alienated my favorite daughter, Gamora. 444 00:33:25,328 --> 00:33:28,203 I shall honor our agreement, Kree, 445 00:33:28,973 --> 00:33:31,185 if you bring me the Orb. 446 00:33:31,725 --> 00:33:34,205 But return to me again empty-handed, 447 00:33:34,680 --> 00:33:38,404 and I will bathe the starways in your blood. 448 00:33:40,920 --> 00:33:43,209 Thanks, Dad. Sounds fair. 449 00:33:45,269 --> 00:33:47,519 This is one fight you won't win. 450 00:33:49,080 --> 00:33:50,764 Let's head to the Kyln. 451 00:33:59,280 --> 00:34:00,520 If we're gonna get out of here, 452 00:34:00,522 --> 00:34:02,360 we're gonna need to get into that watchtower. 453 00:34:02,480 --> 00:34:04,251 And to do that, I'm gonna need a few things. 454 00:34:05,221 --> 00:34:06,905 The guards wear security bands 455 00:34:06,960 --> 00:34:09,483 to control their ins and outs. I need one. 456 00:34:09,976 --> 00:34:11,030 Leave it to me. 457 00:34:11,360 --> 00:34:14,210 That dude, there. I need his prosthetic leg. 458 00:34:14,280 --> 00:34:15,930 His leg? Leg. 486 00:35:30,629 --> 00:35:31,281 Prisoner, 487 00:35:31,678 --> 00:35:34,888 drop the device immediately and retreat to your cell, 488 00:35:34,890 --> 00:35:36,467 or we will open fire. 489 00:35:42,360 --> 00:35:44,525 I am 490 00:35:44,883 --> 00:35:47,556 Groot! 491 00:35:47,713 --> 00:35:48,727 Fire! 492 00:36:01,400 --> 00:36:03,767 All prisoners return to your sleeping areas. 493 00:36:09,400 --> 00:36:10,765 You idiot! 494 00:36:10,840 --> 00:36:13,742 How am I supposed to fight these things without my stuff? 495 00:36:19,901 --> 00:36:21,298 The animal is in control. 496 00:36:21,301 --> 00:36:22,767 Fire on my command! 497 00:36:42,576 --> 00:36:43,941 Creepy little beast! 498 00:36:52,417 --> 00:36:53,776 Yeah. 499 00:37:05,920 --> 00:37:07,291 You need my what? 500 00:37:23,973 --> 00:37:25,498 I need this. Good luck. 501 00:37:25,916 --> 00:37:27,242 It's internally wired. 502 00:37:27,244 --> 00:37:28,575 I'll figure something out. 503 00:37:32,585 --> 00:37:33,884 Drop the leg! 504 00:37:34,080 --> 00:37:36,618 Drop the leg and move back to your cell! 505 00:37:51,480 --> 00:37:52,628 Rocket! 506 00:37:55,600 --> 00:37:57,624 Move to the watchtower! 507 00:38:29,358 --> 00:38:30,405 You! 508 00:38:30,773 --> 00:38:32,777 Man who has lain with an A'askavariian! 509 00:38:34,647 --> 00:38:36,122 It was one time, man. 510 00:38:37,880 --> 00:38:40,635 We need all available guards in full combat gear... 511 00:39:02,840 --> 00:39:04,794 Spare me your foul gaze, woman. 512 00:39:05,642 --> 00:39:06,689 Why is this one here? 513 00:39:07,172 --> 00:39:09,719 We promised him he could stay by your side until he kills your boss. 514 00:39:09,985 --> 00:39:11,390 I always keep my promises, 515 00:39:11,392 --> 00:39:12,776 when they're to muscle-bound whack-jobs 516 00:39:12,778 --> 00:39:14,323 who will kill me if I don't. You cannot! 991 01:11:32,520 --> 01:11:35,604 Thanos is the most powerful being in the universe. 992 01:11:35,680 --> 01:11:37,330 Not anymore. 993 01:12:00,160 --> 01:12:02,401 You call me boy! 994 01:12:02,748 --> 01:12:07,044 I will unfurl 1,000 years of Kree justice on Xandar, 995 01:12:07,060 --> 01:12:10,587 and burn it to its core! 996 01:12:10,960 --> 01:12:12,586 Then Thanos, 997 01:12:13,290 --> 01:12:15,258 I am coming for you. 998 01:12:17,400 --> 01:12:20,324 After Xandar, you are going to kill my father? 999 01:12:20,800 --> 01:12:22,643 You dare to oppose me? 1000 01:12:22,800 --> 01:12:24,643 You see what he has turned me into. 1001 01:12:24,720 --> 01:12:25,870 If you kill him, 1002 01:12:25,872 --> 01:12:28,760 I will help you destroy a thousand planets. 1003 01:12:29,760 --> 01:12:31,285 You betray me? 1004 01:12:32,200 --> 01:12:33,318 Steal my money? 1005 01:12:33,320 --> 01:12:35,474 Stop it! 1038 01:14:04,520 --> 01:14:06,488 I hope you got something better than that. 1039 01:14:06,827 --> 01:14:09,478 Because ain't nobody stealing from Ronan. 1040 01:14:10,519 --> 01:14:11,850 We got a ringer. 1041 01:14:11,960 --> 01:14:13,371 Is that right?
