Thank you. 1113 01:16:58,880 --> 01:17:02,327 See? Groot's the only one of you who has a clue. 1114 01:17:07,360 --> 01:17:08,361 Guys. 1115 01:17:09,860 --> 01:17:12,489 Come on. Yondu is gonna be here in two seconds. 1116 01:17:12,491 --> 01:17:14,971 He expects to hear this big plan of ours. 1117 01:17:16,440 --> 01:17:18,363 I need your help. 1118 01:17:20,258 --> 01:17:21,542 I look around at us. 1119 01:17:22,880 --> 01:17:23,927 You know what I see? 1120 01:17:25,364 --> 01:17:26,365 Losers. 1121 01:17:28,560 --> 01:17:30,130 I mean, like, 1122 01:17:30,629 --> 01:17:32,248 folks who have lost stuff. 1123 01:17:32,320 --> 01:17:34,657 And we have, man. We have, all of us. 1124 01:17:35,825 --> 01:17:36,931 Our homes, 1125 01:17:37,775 --> 01:17:38,920 our families, 1126 01:17:40,261 --> 01:17:41,498 normal lives. 1127 01:17:42,240 --> 01:17:44,778 And, usually, life takes more than it gives. But not today. 1128 01:17:45,953 --> 01:17:47,316 Today, it's given us something. 1129 01:17:47,385 --> 01:17:48,955 It has given us a chance. 1130 01:17:49,293 --> 01:17:50,658 To do what? 1131 01:17:52,400 --> 01:17:53,612 To give a shit. 1132 01:17:54,605 --> 01:17:55,460 For once. 1133 01:17:56,520 --> 01:17:57,820 Not run away. 1134 01:18:01,444 --> 01:18:03,840 I for one, am not gonna stand by and watch 1135 01:18:04,133 --> 01:18:06,866 as Ronan wipes out billions of innocent lives. 1136 01:18:08,120 --> 01:18:09,207 But Quill, 1137 01:18:09,755 --> 01:18:11,063 stopping Ronan, 1138 01:18:11,800 --> 01:18:13,199 it's impossible. 1139 01:18:14,360 --> 01:18:15,906 You're asking us to die. 1140 01:18:23,320 --> 01:18:25,209 Yeah, I guess I am. 1141 01:18:38,040 --> 01:18:39,166 Quill. 1142 01:18:43,430 --> 01:18:46,752 I have lived most my life surrounded by my enemies. 1143 01:18:50,720 --> 01:18:52,092 I will be grateful, 1144 01:18:52,781 --> 01:18:54,780 to die among my friends. 1145 01:18:59,427 --> 01:19:01,469 You are an honorable man, Quill. 1146 01:19:02,880 --> 01:19:04,860 I will fight beside you. 1147 01:19:06,428 --> 01:19:07,735 And in the end, 1148 01:19:09,861 --> 01:19:11,909 I will see my wife and daughter again. 1149 01:19:17,760 --> 01:19:20,579 I am Groot. 1150 01:19:31,240 --> 01:19:34,483 Oh, what the hell. I don't got that long a lifespan, anyway. 1151 01:19:40,651 --> 01:19:42,892 Now I'm standing. Y'all happy? 1152 01:19:43,200 --> 01:19:45,098 We're all standing up now. 1153 01:19:45,711 --> 01:19:48,808 Bunch of jackasses, standing in a circle. 1154 01:19:56,040 --> 01:19:57,900 The Stone reacts to anything organic. 1155 01:19:57,947 --> 01:19:59,838 The bigger the target, the bigger the power surge. 1156 01:19:59,840 --> 01:20:03,194 All Ronan's got to do is touch the Stone to the planet's surface and zap. 1157 01:20:03,214 --> 01:20:04,864 All plants, animals, 1158 01:20:04,960 --> 01:20:07,062 Nova Corps. Everything will die. 1159 01:20:07,080 --> 01:20:09,270 So Ronan does not make the surface. 1160 01:20:12,192 --> 01:20:14,308 Rocket will lead a team to blow a hole 1161 01:20:14,310 --> 01:20:16,265 in the Dark Aster's starboard hull. 1162 01:20:16,440 --> 01:20:20,104 Then, our craft and Yondu's will enter. 1163 01:20:20,668 --> 01:20:23,478 Won't there be hundreds of Sakaaran soldiers inside? 1164 01:20:23,480 --> 01:20:25,945 I think of Sakaaran as paper people. 1165 01:20:32,208 --> 01:20:33,640 Once they know we're on board, 1166 01:20:33,642 --> 01:20:37,221 Ronan will isolate himself behind impenetrable security doors on deck. 1167 01:20:37,223 --> 01:20:39,669 Which I can disable by dismantling the power source. 1168 01:20:40,069 --> 01:20:41,529 We'll make it to the flight deck, 1169 01:20:41,726 --> 01:20:44,889 and I'll use the Hadron Enforcer to kill Ronan. 1170 01:20:46,850 --> 01:20:50,286 Once Ronan is dead, we will retrieve the Stone. 1171 01:20:50,830 --> 01:20:52,912 Use these devices to contain it. 1172 01:20:53,694 --> 01:20:55,025 If you touch it, 1173 01:20:55,360 --> 01:20:56,691 it will kill you. 1174 01:20:59,520 --> 01:21:02,543 I'll contact one of the Nova officers who arrested us. 1175 01:21:03,058 --> 01:21:04,898 Hopefully, they'll believe we're there to help. 1176 01:21:06,080 --> 01:21:09,243 There's one more thing we need to complete the plan. 1177 01:21:10,000 --> 01:21:11,206 That guy's eye. 1178 01:21:12,266 --> 01:21:14,798 No! No, we don't. No, we don't need 1179 01:21:14,800 --> 01:21:16,131 that guy's eye. 1180 01:21:17,240 --> 01:21:19,846 No, seriously, I need it! It's important to me. 1181 01:21:24,594 --> 01:21:26,278 Ronan's fleet has been spotted, 1182 01:21:26,280 --> 01:21:27,406 and will arrive in T-minus 1183 01:21:27,560 --> 01:21:29,164 fifteen minutes. 1184 01:21:29,465 --> 01:21:30,798 Remember, boy. 1185 01:21:31,480 --> 01:21:32,993 At the end of all this, 1186 01:21:33,520 --> 01:21:34,806 I get the Stone. 1187 01:21:35,327 --> 01:21:37,773 You cross me, we kill you all. 1188 01:22:00,040 --> 01:22:01,371 Let's go get them, boys! 1189 01:22:10,880 --> 01:22:12,120 This is a terrible plan. 1190 01:22:12,320 --> 01:22:14,720 Hey, you're the one who said you wanted to die among friends. 1191 01:22:20,018 --> 01:22:21,019 Nova Prime. 1192 01:22:22,192 --> 01:22:24,499 I received a transmission from one of the Ravagers. 1193 01:22:24,903 --> 01:22:27,958 He says Ronan's in possession of something called an Infinity Stone 1194 01:22:27,960 --> 01:22:29,325 and he's headed toward Xandar. 1195 01:22:29,400 --> 01:22:30,486 Good God. 1196 01:22:30,533 --> 01:22:32,925 It's a trick. He's a criminal. 1197 01:22:33,159 --> 01:22:35,134 Did he say why we should believe him? 1198 01:22:35,544 --> 01:22:37,758 He said his crew just escaped from prison 1199 01:22:37,760 --> 01:22:40,730 so he'd have no other reason to risk coming to Xandar to help. 1200 01:22:41,786 --> 01:22:42,947 He says that he's an... 1201 01:22:43,760 --> 01:22:44,807 a-hole. 1202 01:22:45,238 --> 01:22:46,338 But he's not, 1203 01:22:46,560 --> 01:22:48,096 and I'm quoting him here, 1204 01:22:48,400 --> 01:22:50,607 100% a dick. 1205 01:22:51,111 --> 01:22:52,319 Do you believe him? 1206 01:22:52,720 --> 01:22:55,803 I don't know that I believe anyone is 100% a dick, ma'am. 1207 01:22:55,880 --> 01:22:58,804 I mean, do you believe that he is here to help? 1208 01:23:02,863 --> 01:23:03,629 Yeah. 1209 01:23:13,600 --> 01:23:14,840 A fleet approaches. 1210 01:23:15,520 --> 01:23:17,124 They appear to be Ravagers. 1211 01:23:28,388 --> 01:23:29,469 Fire! 1212 01:23:40,710 --> 01:23:41,871 Cover it down. 1213 01:23:42,319 --> 01:23:43,332 Submerge! 1214 01:23:56,840 --> 01:23:58,046 Rocket, hurry! 1215 01:24:04,560 --> 01:24:05,766 All pilots, dive! 1216 01:24:05,920 --> 01:24:07,081 They're beneath us! 1217 01:24:15,920 --> 01:24:17,331 Evacuate the city. 1218 01:24:17,480 --> 01:24:20,962 Our priority is to get our people away from the battle. 1219 01:24:28,000 --> 01:24:29,681 Forward thrust, now! 1220 01:24:42,520 --> 01:24:43,521 Come on! 1221 01:24:45,240 --> 01:24:47,197 Quill! Yondu! Now! 1222 01:25:09,160 --> 01:25:10,650 Hell! 1223 01:25:10,800 --> 01:25:12,245 I'm going down, Quill! 1224 01:25:12,400 --> 01:25:14,164 No more games with me, boy! 1225 01:25:14,619 --> 01:25:15,666 I'll see you 1226 01:25:15,816 --> 01:25:17,218 at the end of this! 1227 01:25:23,786 --> 01:25:25,386 There are too many of them, Rocket! 1228 01:25:25,884 --> 01:25:27,464 We'll never make it up there! 1229 01:25:42,480 --> 01:25:43,606 Peter Quill. 1230 01:25:43,901 --> 01:25:46,161 This is Denarian Saal of the Nova Corps. 1231 01:25:46,320 --> 01:25:49,608 For the record, I advised against trusting you here. 1232 01:25:49,687 --> 01:25:51,374 They got my dick message! 1233 01:25:51,560 --> 01:25:52,936 Prove me wrong. 1234 01:26:00,200 --> 01:26:01,293 Yes! 1235 01:26:23,592 --> 01:26:24,673 Yes! 1236 01:26:27,985 --> 01:26:29,569 We're just like Kevin Bacon. 1237 01:26:33,833 --> 01:26:35,530 The starboard kern has been breached! 1238 01:26:35,623 --> 01:26:36,758 We have been boarded. 1239 01:26:36,815 --> 01:26:38,226 Continue our approach. 1240 01:26:38,320 --> 01:26:39,812 But the Nova Corps have engaged. 1241 01:26:39,854 --> 01:26:42,505 None of that will matter once we reach the surface. 1242 01:26:42,520 --> 01:26:43,758 Seal security doors! 1243 01:26:43,971 --> 01:26:44,847 Now! 1244 01:26:46,520 --> 01:26:48,014 Get out of my way! 1245 01:27:00,040 --> 01:27:01,565 Oh, man. 1246 01:27:01,998 --> 01:27:06,248 All Nova pilots, interlock and form a blockade. 1247 01:27:06,357 --> 01:27:09,858 The Dark Aster must not reach the ground. 1248 01:27:22,640 --> 01:27:23,846 Locked in! 1249 01:27:24,640 --> 01:27:25,846 Locked in. 1250 01:27:27,400 --> 01:27:28,401 We're locked in. 1251 01:28:06,680 --> 01:28:08,587 I can barely see. 1252 01:28:35,325 --> 01:28:37,054 When did you learn to do that? 1253 01:28:37,681 --> 01:28:40,009 Pretty sure the answer is I am Groot. 1254 01:28:41,520 --> 01:28:43,922 The flight deck is 300 meters this way. 1255 01:28:46,982 --> 01:28:50,648 I want you all to know that I am grateful for your acceptance after my blunders. 1256 01:28:51,200 --> 01:28:53,407 It is pleasing to once again have 1257 01:28:54,040 --> 01:28:55,041 friends. 1258 01:28:56,120 --> 01:28:57,151 You Quill, 1259 01:28:57,943 --> 01:28:59,011 are my friend. 1260 01:28:59,080 --> 01:29:00,042 Thanks. 1261 01:29:00,691 --> 01:29:02,805 This dumb tree, he is my friend. 1262 01:29:04,720 --> 01:29:06,124 And this green whore she too. 1263 01:29:06,126 --> 01:29:07,565 Oh, you must stop! 1264 01:29:10,526 --> 01:29:11,465 Gamora, 1265 01:29:11,908 --> 01:29:13,406 look at what you have done. 1266 01:29:13,920 --> 01:29:15,601 You have always been weak. 1267 01:29:16,255 --> 01:29:18,288 You stupid, traitorous... 1268 01:29:23,541 --> 01:29:25,862 Nobody talks to my friends like that. 1269 01:29:27,037 --> 01:29:28,118 Head to the flight deck. 1270 01:29:28,244 --> 01:29:30,291 I'll shut down the power to the security doors. 1271 01:29:38,174 --> 01:29:40,251 Yondu Udonta. 1272 01:29:40,760 --> 01:29:44,542 Order your men to turn on the Nova Corps. 1273 01:30:01,040 --> 01:30:03,053 Enough nonsense, Ravager! 1274 01:30:03,186 --> 01:30:04,335 Time to die... 1275 01:30:37,240 --> 01:30:38,783 Nebula, please. 1276 01:30:53,011 --> 01:30:54,257 Enough of this. 1277 01:30:54,259 --> 01:30:55,597 Necrocraft pilots, 1278 01:30:55,599 --> 01:30:57,989 enact immolation initiative. 1279 01:31:01,353 --> 01:31:02,878 They're dive-bombing the city! 1280 01:31:03,013 --> 01:31:04,822 Denarian Saal, should we break formation? 1281 01:31:05,004 --> 01:31:06,654 No! Hold your positions. 1282 01:31:38,120 --> 01:31:39,718 Keep Ronan up there, Saal. 1283 01:31:39,720 --> 01:31:41,324 We'll take care of the people down here. 1284 01:31:41,326 --> 01:31:43,907 I can't believe I'm taking orders from a hamster. 1285 01:31:46,987 --> 01:31:48,227 Star-Lord. 1286 01:31:48,832 --> 01:31:49,833 Finally. 1287 01:32:00,440 --> 01:32:01,487 You thief! 1288 01:32:13,360 --> 01:32:16,204 You will never make it to Ronan. 1289 01:32:22,014 --> 01:32:24,338 Everybody shoot them before they hit the ground. 1290 01:32:32,840 --> 01:32:34,205 Come on! 1291 01:33:17,040 --> 01:33:20,205 Finger to the throat means death. 1292 01:33:26,360 --> 01:33:27,771 Metaphor. 1293 01:33:27,990 --> 01:33:29,102 Yeah, sorta. 1294 01:33:29,790 --> 01:33:30,951 Oh, no. 1295 01:33:58,520 --> 01:33:59,931 Xandar! 1296 01:34:00,350 --> 01:34:03,105 You stand accused. 1297 01:34:04,040 --> 01:34:06,405 Your wretched peace treaty, 1298 01:34:06,485 --> 01:34:08,509 will not save you now. 1299 01:34:09,072 --> 01:34:12,331 It is the tinder on which you burn. 1300 01:34:36,760 --> 01:34:37,761 Rocket! 1301 01:34:37,920 --> 01:34:39,729 Hold on, Saal, just... 1302 01:35:06,440 --> 01:35:07,680 Quill, you got to hurry. 1303 01:35:08,116 --> 01:35:09,558 The city's been evacuated, 1304 01:35:09,560 --> 01:35:11,892 but we're getting our asses kicked down here. 1305 01:35:12,240 --> 01:35:13,685 Gamora hasn't opened the door! 1306 01:35:38,892 --> 01:35:39,893 Nebula! 1307 01:35:41,141 --> 01:35:41,969 Sister, 1308 01:35:42,194 --> 01:35:43,638 help us fight Ronan. 1309 01:35:43,939 --> 01:35:45,512 You know he's crazy. 1310 01:35:45,600 --> 01:35:47,566 I know you're both crazy. 1311 01:35:47,840 --> 01:35:49,001 No! 1312 01:35:51,880 --> 01:35:52,573 What the... 1313 01:35:54,160 --> 01:35:55,685 Get out! 1314 01:36:37,298 --> 01:36:38,299 You did it! 1315 01:37:04,358 --> 01:37:05,689 I was mistaken. 1316 01:37:06,078 --> 01:37:07,906 I do remember your family. 1317 01:37:08,380 --> 01:37:10,109 Their screams were 1318 01:37:10,120 --> 01:37:12,248 pitiful. I... 1319 01:39:09,360 --> 01:39:10,486 No, Groot! 1320 01:39:11,080 --> 01:39:12,206 You can't. 1321 01:39:12,280 --> 01:39:13,770 You'll die. 1322 01:39:14,320 --> 01:39:16,163 Why are you doing this? 1323 01:39:16,320 --> 01:39:17,810 Why? 1324 01:39:24,400 --> 01:39:25,970 We 1325 01:39:26,360 --> 01:39:27,441 Are 1326 01:39:28,040 --> 01:39:29,565 Groot. 1327 01:40:33,960 --> 01:40:35,792 I called him an idiot. 1328 01:40:58,720 --> 01:41:00,643 You killed Groot! 1329 01:41:04,589 --> 01:41:05,512 Behold! 1330 01:41:07,000 --> 01:41:10,482 Your guardians of the galaxy. 1331 01:41:10,560 --> 01:41:12,894 What fruit have they wrought? 1332 01:41:13,120 --> 01:41:15,153 Only that my father, 1333 01:41:15,155 --> 01:41:17,251 and his father 1334 01:41:17,320 --> 01:41:20,564 shall finally know vengeance. 1335 01:41:21,040 --> 01:41:23,281 People of Xandar, 1336 01:41:23,810 --> 01:41:25,574 the time has come 1337 01:41:25,840 --> 01:41:28,650 to rejoice and renounce 1338 01:41:28,800 --> 01:41:31,327 your paltry gods! 1339 01:41:31,840 --> 01:41:35,162 Your salvation is at hand. 1340 01:41:47,920 --> 01:41:49,445 Listen to these words. 1341 01:41:58,520 --> 01:41:59,981 Now bring it down hard! 1342 01:42:03,600 --> 01:42:04,681 What are you doing? 1343 01:42:05,200 --> 01:42:07,771 Dance-off, bro. Me and you. 1344 01:42:11,200 --> 01:42:12,413 Gamora. 1345 01:42:13,640 --> 01:42:15,222 Subtle. Take it back. 1346 01:42:15,924 --> 01:42:18,468 What are you doing? 1347 01:42:18,680 --> 01:42:20,213 I'm distracting you, 1348 01:42:20,215 --> 01:42:21,339 you big turd blossom. 1349 01:42:37,240 --> 01:42:38,730 No! 1350 01:43:12,720 --> 01:43:16,480 Peter! Take my hand! 1351 01:43:21,280 --> 01:43:23,452 Take my hand, Peter. 1352 01:43:24,200 --> 01:43:25,611 Mom. 1353 01:43:26,120 --> 01:43:28,168 Take my hand! 1354 01:44:22,600 --> 01:44:24,102 You're mortal! 1355 01:44:24,720 --> 01:44:26,006 How? 1356 01:44:26,160 --> 01:44:28,303 You said it yourself, bitch. 1357 01:44:28,480 --> 01:44:30,532 We're the Guardians of the Galaxy. 1358 01:45:00,574 --> 01:45:02,144 Well, Well, Well. 1359 01:45:02,480 --> 01:45:04,234 Quite the light show. 1360 01:45:05,840 --> 01:45:07,524 Ain't this sweet. 1361 01:45:09,040 --> 01:45:11,566 But you got some business to attend to... 1362 01:45:11,720 --> 01:45:13,889 before all the nookie-nookie starts. 1363 01:45:15,840 --> 01:45:17,150 Peter, you can't. 1364 01:45:17,830 --> 01:45:20,248 Peter. You got to reconsider this, Yondu. 1365 01:45:20,876 --> 01:45:22,362 I don't know who you're selling this to, 1366 01:45:22,364 --> 01:45:24,437 but the only way the universe can survive 1367 01:45:24,439 --> 01:45:26,276 is if you give it to the Nova Corps. 1368 01:45:27,000 --> 01:45:29,539 I may be as pretty as an angel, 1369 01:45:31,611 --> 01:45:33,500 but I sure as hell ain't one. 1370 01:45:35,000 --> 01:45:36,490 Hand it over, son. 1371 01:45:53,360 --> 01:45:54,361 Yondu. 1372 01:45:57,440 --> 01:45:58,980 Do not open that Orb. 1373 01:45:59,552 --> 01:46:01,024 You know that, right? 1374 01:46:01,461 --> 01:46:03,226 You've seen what it does to people. 1375 01:46:14,560 --> 01:46:16,801 Yeah, Quill turned out ok. 1376 01:46:17,680 --> 01:46:20,286 It's probably good we didn't deliver him to his dad 1377 01:46:20,288 --> 01:46:21,447 like we was hired to do. 1378 01:46:21,520 --> 01:46:24,251 Yeah, that guy was a jackass. 1379 01:46:29,120 --> 01:46:32,849 He is gonna be so pissed when he realizes I switched out the Orb on him. 1380 01:46:35,603 --> 01:46:37,283 He was gonna kill you, Peter. 1381 01:46:38,480 --> 01:46:39,589 Oh, I know. 1382 01:46:42,110 --> 01:46:44,014 But he was about the only family I had. 1383 01:46:46,560 --> 01:46:47,607 No. 1384 01:46:48,880 --> 01:46:50,086 He wasn't. 1385 01:47:38,436 --> 01:47:39,998 Why would you even know this? 1386 01:47:40,000 --> 01:47:43,083 When we arrested you, we noticed an anomaly in your nervous system, 1387 01:47:43,085 --> 01:47:44,450 so we had it checked out. 1388 01:47:45,684 --> 01:47:47,081 I'm not Terran? 1389 01:47:47,320 --> 01:47:48,845 You are half Terran. 1390 01:47:49,000 --> 01:47:50,575 Your mother was of Earth. 1391 01:47:50,852 --> 01:47:52,642 Your father, well... 1392 01:47:52,930 --> 01:47:56,514 he's something very ancient we've never seen here before. 1393 01:47:56,680 --> 01:47:58,175 That could be why you were able 1394 01:47:58,177 --> 01:48:00,241 to hold the Stone for as long as you did. 1395 01:48:01,509 --> 01:48:02,954 Your friends have arrived. 1396 01:48:04,080 --> 01:48:06,321 On behalf of the Nova Corps, 1397 01:48:06,720 --> 01:48:09,793 we'd like to express our profound gratitude 1398 01:48:10,331 --> 01:48:12,500 for your help in saving Xandar. 1399 01:48:13,827 --> 01:48:16,354 If you will follow Denarian Dey, 1400 01:48:16,560 --> 01:48:18,164 he has something to show you. 1401 01:48:18,320 --> 01:48:19,816 Thank you, Nova Prime. 1402 01:48:28,680 --> 01:48:30,952 Your wife and child shall rest well, 1403 01:48:31,453 --> 01:48:33,344 knowing that you have avenged them. 1404 01:48:33,773 --> 01:48:34,652 Yes. 1405 01:48:35,000 --> 01:48:36,923 Of course, Ronan was only a puppet. 1406 01:48:37,680 --> 01:48:39,641 It's really Thanos I need to kill. 1407 01:48:42,520 --> 01:48:45,285 We tried to keep it as close to the original as possible. 1408 01:48:45,880 --> 01:48:47,848 We salvaged as much as we could. 1409 01:48:50,960 --> 01:48:51,961 I... 1410 01:48:53,998 --> 01:48:55,124 Thank you. 1411 01:48:56,600 --> 01:48:58,090 I have a family. 1412 01:48:58,886 --> 01:49:00,376 They're alive because of you. 1413 01:49:04,788 --> 01:49:07,155 Your criminal records have also been expunged. 1414 01:49:07,480 --> 01:49:11,293 However, I have to warn you against breaking any laws in the future. 1415 01:49:12,064 --> 01:49:13,065 Question. 1416 01:49:13,067 --> 01:49:15,863 What if I see something that I want to take and it belongs to someone else? 1417 01:49:15,880 --> 01:49:17,166 You will be arrested. 1418 01:49:17,240 --> 01:49:19,481 But what if I want it more than the person who has it? 1419 01:49:19,960 --> 01:49:21,962 It's still illegal. That doesn't follow. 1420 01:49:21,964 --> 01:49:23,718 No, I want it more, sir. Do you understand? 1421 01:49:23,720 --> 01:49:24,821 What are you laughing at? 1422 01:49:24,823 --> 01:49:26,499 Why? I can't have a discussion with this gentleman? 1423 01:49:26,640 --> 01:49:30,802 What if someone does something irksome and I decide to remove his spine? 1424 01:49:32,400 --> 01:49:33,481 That's... 1425 01:49:34,600 --> 01:49:37,341 That's actually murder. 1426 01:49:38,170 --> 01:49:39,613 It's one of the worst... 1427 01:49:40,115 --> 01:49:41,242 crimes of all. 1428 01:49:41,382 --> 01:49:42,202 So... 1429 01:49:42,857 --> 01:49:44,270 also illegal. 1430 01:49:48,075 --> 01:49:49,407 They'll be fine, Dey. 1431 01:49:49,596 --> 01:49:50,915 I'm gonna keep an eye on them. 1432 01:49:51,105 --> 01:49:52,086 You? 1433 01:49:55,280 --> 01:49:56,256 Yeah. 1434 01:49:56,664 --> 01:49:57,593 Me. 1435 01:50:17,240 --> 01:50:18,553 Peter, 1436 01:50:19,539 --> 01:50:22,614 I know these last few months have been hard for you. 1437 01:50:24,093 --> 01:50:26,175 But I'm going to a better place. 1438 01:50:26,928 --> 01:50:28,435 And I will be ok. 1439 01:50:29,630 --> 01:50:32,755 And I will always be with you. 1440 01:50:34,800 --> 01:50:37,057 You are the light of my life. 1441 01:50:37,640 --> 01:50:39,298 My precious son. 1442 01:50:40,968 --> 01:50:42,804 My little Star-Lord. 1443 01:50:44,715 --> 01:50:45,600 Love, Mom. 1444 01:52:47,040 --> 01:52:48,690 So, what should we do next? 1445 01:52:49,000 --> 01:52:50,364 Something good? 1446 01:52:51,040 --> 01:52:52,166 Something bad? 1447 01:52:52,680 --> 01:52:54,173 A bit of both? 1448 01:52:55,920 --> 01:52:57,539 We'll follow your lead, 1449 01:52:57,611 --> 01:52:58,915 Star-Lord. 1450 01:53:01,284 --> 01:53:02,489 Bit of both. 1451 01:53:16,671 --> 01:53:19,483 By IESAIGNEUR Sync & corrections April 2020 1452 02:00:26,480 --> 02:00:28,801 What do you let it lick you like that for? 1453 02:00:30,160 --> 02:00:31,685 Gross. 1454 02:00:35,175 --> 02:00:36,210 Yeah! 1455 02:00:36,320 --> 02:00:37,856 But it burns going down.

plot: A group of intergalactic criminals must pull together to stop a fanatical warrior with plans to purge the universe.
